初心者でも導入しやすい音声入力とAI文字起こしの手法を使い、短期間で安定した副収入のベースを築けるようになる
通勤時間や家事の合間などのわずかな時間を最大限活用することで、副業の時間管理スキルを強化できるようになる
コンテンツ作成のスピードと質を両立させ、音声入力×AI文字起こしを活用した独自の強みを確立し、将来的なビジネス成長につなげられるようになる

courses.description:
■はじめに
こんにちは、本コースの講師「ないと」です。私は5年間、副業としてAIツールを活用し、限られた時間の中で効率的に成果を出してきました。現在は、本業や家事、育児が忙しくて副業の時間が足りない方のためにAIを使って時短化する方法の講座を提供しています。
この講座では、LINE WORKS AiNote×Gladiaを活用したAI文字起こしを学び、時短化する方法を解説します。さらに、ChatGPTやGoogleドキュメントを使ったコンテンツ作成方法やその管理のやり方まで学べます。
忙しい方でも、スマホとPCを使い分けてスキマ時間を有効活用できる副業術を、ぜひ一緒に習得しましょう！


■このコースの概要説明
「副業の時間がない…」そんな悩みをAI文字起こしで解決！

本講座では、通勤時間や家事の合間など、スキマ時間を活用して音声入力×AI文字起こしでコンテンツを素早く作成する方法を学びます。
LINE WORKS AiNoteを使ってスマホで録音し、Gladiaで高精度に文字起こし。さらに、ChatGPTで文章化し、Googleドキュメントで管理することで、作業を劇的に時短化・効率化します。
AIツールを活用して、最短でコンテンツを完成させるワークフローを、初心者でもすぐに実践できるよう丁寧に解説します！


【コースで学べること】
スマホとPCを使い分けたスキマ時間の活用術
LINE WORKS AiNote×Gladiaで最速のAI文字起こし
ChatGPTで文字起こしデータを読みやすい文章に最適化
Googleドキュメントを使った効率的なコンテンツ管理術
副業を時短するAIワークフローの構築


■コースを受講することで
通勤時間や家事の合間に効率よく作業ができるようになります
タイピング不要で素早くコンテンツを作成できるようになります
AIを活用して、短時間で質の高い記事や台本を作成できます
スマホとPCを組み合わせた最適なワークフローが身につきます


■こんな方が受講に向いています
副業や本業の合間にブログやYouTubeなどのコンテンツを効率的に作成したい方
家事や育児で忙しく、副業の時間がなかなか取れない方
音声入力やAI文字起こしを活用して、作業を大幅に時短したい方
スマホとPCを使い分けて、スキマ時間を最大活用したい方
AIツールに興味があるが、どこから始めればいいかわからない方


■このコースは全部で8セクションです
セクション1：はじめに
セクション2：スキマ時間活用！スマホで簡単文字起こし術
セクション3：自宅で集中！パソコンを使った高精度文字起こし術
セクション4：ChatGPTで効率的に文章を最適化する方法
セクション5：Googleドキュメントで効率的にコンテンツを編集・管理する方法
セクション6：音声入力から文字起こししたデータの活用法
セクション7：まとめ
セクション8：ボーナスレクチャー
2時間のコースで、即実践できるスキルを提供！
各セクションには実践用ワークシートを用意し、ステップバイステップで学習できるようになっています。


■最後に
本講座に興味を持っていただいた方は、ぜひプレビュー動画をご覧いただき、コース登録をご検討ください！
AIを活用したコンテンツ制作をマスターし、副業を効率化する新しい方法を一緒に学びましょう！
コースでお会いできるのを楽しみにしています！

courses.title: Construye tu Marca Personal utilizando tu Currículum
courses.bio: Domina el arte de destacar en los procesos de selección, posiciónate en la mente de los reclutadores y consigue empleo.
objectives: Crear un currículum atractivo y eficiente, optimizado para captar la atención de los reclutadores.
Comunicar el perfil profesional de manera adecuada en el mercado laboral.
Desarrollar contenido relevante y bien estructurado en el CV, evitando redundancias y destacando habilidades, experiencias y logros de manera clara y concisa.
Construir una marca personal sólida mediante la creación de un resumen potente y adaptado a las vacantes específicas reflejando los objetivos profesionales.
Conocer como piensa un reclutador, permitiendo identificar las claves en la elaboración del currículum y abordar situaciones en los procesos de postulación.

Introducción: Desafíos que enfrentamos al buscar trabajo
La importancia de los 3 focos del curso
De la teoría a la práctica
Formato de un CV: Domina la clave del formato de CV
Qué hace un reclutador con tu CV?
Utiliza las plantillas de CV a tu favor
Contenido de un CV: Desarrolla el contenido de tu CV
Conoce tu gestión sobre tu descriptor de cargo
Destaca mostrando tu valor agregado con procesos
Dale acción al descriptor de cargo
Estrategia de un CV: Por qué es importante contar con una estrategia?
Conoce los elementos de un párrafo efectivo
Qué pasa si no ponemos el resumen en el currículum?
Cómo podemos mejorar aún más el Currículum?
Aprende la estrategia del uso de bullets
Cómo transformarte en lo que el reclutador busca
Cómo sacarle el máximo provecho a tu resumen
Conoce el error más común en un CV y aprende a evitarlo
Cómo mejorar los títulos de cargo en tu CV
Adapta tu estrategia según las funciones por vacante
El arte de la persuasión en tu Currículum

requirements: Computador.
Manejo básico de microsoft word.
Conexión a internet.
courses.description:
¿Te gustaría destacar en el competitivo mercado laboral y mejorar tus posibilidades de empleo?


Nuestro curso de empleabilidad te ayuda a desarrollar habilidades esenciales para optimizar tu currículum y construir una marca personal efectiva.
Este curso combina tres módulos clave: FORMATO, CONTENIDO y ESTRATEGIA, que se enfocan en aspectos cruciales de la creación de un currículum atractivo y eficiente.


En el módulo FORMATO, aprenderás a:
Comunicar adecuadamente tu perfil al mercado.
Estructurar y formatear tu currículum.
Pensar como un reclutador para optimizar la presentación de la información.
Además, recibirás consejos para adaptar las plantillas de CV a tus necesidades individuales.


El módulo CONTENIDO te enseñará a:
Desarrollar el contenido de tu CV de manera efectiva, incluyendo cómo evitar adjetivos y redundancias.
Describir funciones específicas de los cargos, destacar la gestión y resultados relevantes.
Utilizar verbos que den acción y dinamismo a tu currículum.
También recibirás consejos para recopilar información y armar las ideas de manera eficiente.


Por último, en el módulo ESTRATEGIA:
Construirás una marca personal efectiva mediante la creación de un resumen potente, elementos de un párrafo efectivo y la adaptación de tu resumen a la vacante específica.
Aprenderás estrategias adicionales como el uso de bullets o viñetas.
Además conocerás:
Cómo sacar el máximo provecho del resumen en la búsqueda de empleo.
Cómo abordar la falta de constancia laboral .
El uso correcto de los nombres de cargos.


A través de este completo curso de empleabilidad, adquirirás las herramientas y conocimientos necesarios para destacar en el mercado laboral y aumentar tus oportunidades de éxito en la búsqueda de empleo.
target_audience: Personas en búsqueda activa de empleo.
Profesionales que deseen mejorar su posicionamiento en el mercado laboral.
Recién graduados que buscan ingresar al mundo profesional.
Aquellos que quieran cambiar de carrera o reingresar al ámbito laboral.
Personas que deseen actualizar y mejorar la calidad de su currículum para aumentar su visibilidad y oportunidades en procesos de selección competitivos.
En resumen, este curso es ideal para cualquier persona que quiera optimizar su perfil y destacar en el mercado laboral.

objectives: 自分が今やることの最優先が見えてきます

4-4 自分にとって大切な３つの事

requirements: インターネットがつながる環境があれば、どなたでも
courses.description:
ネガティブ思考が行動に移せないと感じていませんか？
この講座では、ネガティブ思考を打破し、行動につなげ具体的な目標設定の方法を学びます！


目標設定は、自己成長の一部であり、ネガティブな思考パターンを改善するための強力なツールです。
このコースは、行動を起こすための具体的なステップとともに、目標設定の重要性を強調します。


【この講座で学べること】


ネガティブ思考のパターンを理解し、それがどのように行動に影響を与えるかを認識する方法
自己効力感を高め、行動に移す自信を持つ方法
目標達成に向けた意識を保つ方法




【こんな人におすすめ】


・ネガティブ思考で行動に移せないと感じている人
・自己改善を目指している人
・目標設定の具体的な方法を学びたい人


この講座は誰でも理解できるように作られているので、初めて目標設定を学ぶ方でも安心して学べます。
さあ、ネガティブ思考を乗り越え、行動につながる目標設定の方法を学びましょう！
target_audience: 今年こそ、自分のマインドを変えたい、目標を達成したい方へ

Thương hiệu là gì? Nó có vai trò và tầm quan trọng như thế nào?
Khóa học "Xây dựng thương hiệu cá nhân và doanh nghiệp" sẽ chia sẻ cho các bạn về thương hiệu và tầm quan trọng của thương hiệu.
Cách xây dựng thương hiệu và các bước xây dựng thương hiệu như thế nào. Thương hiệu tốt sẽ giúp bạn gì trong công việc và cuộc sống.
Khóa học này phù hợp cho những người lãnh đạo, và chuẩn bị làm lãnh đạo cũng như tất cả những người muốn công việc của mình ngày càng thăng tiếnThương hiệu là gì? Nó có vai trò và tầm quan trọng như thế nào?
Giảng viên hướng dẫn: NCS. Tiến Sĩ Nguyễn Bá Dương (David Dương) - DOANH NHÂN, DIỄN GIẢ, TÁC GIẢ
Với hơn 14 năm làm việc và quản lý tại ngân hàng Vietcombank và công ty chứng khoán Vietcombank, doanh số giao dịch khớp lệnh hơn 46 ngàn tỷ VNĐ (~ 2 tỷ USD).
16 năm Kinh nghiệm quản lý phân tích đầu tư tài chính trên thị trường chứng khoán, chuyên gia phân tích và hoạch định chiến lược kinh doanh cho doanh nghiệp, bí quyết xây dựng doanh nghiệp thành công, lãnh đạo, bán hàng, xây dựng hệ thống marketing và tự động hóa doanh nghiệp.
target_audience: Giám đốc, chủ doanh nghiệp và những người quản lý.
Tất cả những người muốn xây dựng hình ảnh cá nhân riêng của mình trong mắt người khác.
Dành cho những nghười đang có ý định trở thành một chuyên gia phát triển thương hiệu trong tương lai.
Dành cho những người đã, đang và có ý định khởi nghiệp.
Khóa học tập trung hướng dẫn xây dựng thương hiệu cho các doanh nghiệp start-up, các doanh nghiệp vừa và nhỏ, mới 1-2 năm tuổi, những ng làm về mảng thương hiệu.
Khoá học giúp học viên đi từ khái niệm cơ bản nhất cho tới những mô hình phức tạp nhất trong việc xây dựng và phát triển thương hiệu.  Mục tiêu khóa học

courses.title: Performance Under Pressure - Taking Action
courses.bio: Understand Your Reactions, Take Action, Deal with Colleagues, and Be Always Ready for Potentially Stressful Situations
objectives: avoid overanalysis and overconfidence in high-pressure situations
understand the challenge in a high-pressure situation from emotional reactions
manage your automatic thoughts to optimize perceptions in high-pressure situations
follow appropriate steps in the process of taking action in a high-pressure
take effective action to resolve a challenge in a high-pressure situation

Course Introduction: Course Choice, Skill Development and Prior Knowledge
Identifying Solutions and Taking Action: Practical Activity: A Virtual Pressure Cooker

requirements: No special requirements for this course, but being familiar with the business world will certainly help.
courses.description:
This is the second part of a series of three courses on Performance Under Pressure and focuses on Taking Action. And, in this course, you are going to learn not only how to take action under pressure, but also how to avoid over-thinking and over-confidence, and understand what exactly the challenge is.
Acting effectively in high-pressure situations is not easy. Over-confidence can lead to poor judgment, and over-thinking the situation can lead to paralysis. Also, your perception may become clouded by negative thoughts and emotions in times of pressure. But it's exactly at these times that you need to perceive the challenges most clearly so that you can set appropriate goals and take effective action to achieve them.
This course sets out some principles to help you avoid the dangers of overconfidence and overthinking, which can impair your performance when under pressure. It then teaches a technique for clarifying your perceptions in such situations and creating an action plan to optimize your performance under pressure.
Professionals who want to develop their abilities to manage the stress that comes with working under pressure, and those who want to develop or refine their skills for performing under pressure will benefit from this course.
After completing this course, you will be able to:
avoid over-analysis and over-confidence in high-pressure situations,
understand the challenge in a high-pressure situation from emotional reactions,
manage automatic thoughts to optimize perceptions in high-pressure situations,
use appropriate steps in the process of taking action in a high-pressure situation, and
take action in pressure situations to match every challenge.
So, thank you for considering this course. The course includes video lectures, quizzes, examples and exercises and a small optional course project. All should take you not more than 2 hours to finish.
The course comes with a 30 days, no question asked, guarantee. Now, go ahead and hit that "Take the course" button, and see you on the inside!
target_audience: Professionals who want to develop their abilities to manage the stress that comes with working under pressure, and individuals who want to develop or refine their skills for performing under pressure

courses.description:
The Social Intelligence- Brand of You course is an online course that teaches you how to authentically connect with new people, humbly influence and vigorously thrive in social and professional interactions. In short, it teaches you how to Move Freely into and in every social situation you find yourself in.


Hey you! Yes, you with the face. Welcome to your first achievement, finding your way onto this page!


Have you ever heard the saying, ‘Successful people spend time doing things that unsuccessful people don’t like doing’?. Well you can consider yourself on the yellow brick road to becoming one of those successful people with the Social Brand of You course.


So you’re probably thinking....


Why should I take THIS course?
And...
What makes it different to the 10 million other online courses out there?
Well, clean those ears out and give yourself permission to sit still for 5 minutes while I answer these questions for you.


Here’s 20 Things I wish I had been taught earlier in life:
How to actively and practically build my self esteem so that big challenges become easily achievable
Greater self belief in my capability especially in those moments when I doubt myself, my abilities and whether I even have the skills to successfully achieve that task

How to feel more confident when socialising with strangers at social parties, business events or the bevvy of moms in the school parking lot (LOL)
How to be the star of the show when the time and place calls for it
How to be the most magnetic and attractive person in the room. (This has nothing to do with your looks (thank goodness!) and everything to do with how you mingle)
How to make a jaw dropping entrance into a room (One of my students won the first red rose on The Bachelor for her first impression)
How to be charming so that people simply like me and want to be around me
How to keep a conversation going with people you don’t know very well
How to combat your social anxiety and instead become the sparkle pony at events
How to make other people feel special when they are around you
How to make friends easily even in my adult years
How to join groups of people standing around at events instead of being an, albeit pretty, wall flower
How to stand and sit at events that attract people towards you
Body language that feels natural and not socially awkward

How to flit around the room like a seasoned social butterfly
Become a master socialiser at events - social or business
How to spot people that actually want to talk to you at events
You will learn all these skills and a couple more bonus points!
In one life changing online course you will get:
Proven practical skills you can implement immediately
Make that CV and resume sparkle
Immediate confidence and social sway


Bottom Line:
This course is about YOU, your personal brand, the brand that YOU present to the world, the brand that people buy into, like, support and rally around.

requirements: Die Bereitschaft alte, teils etablierte Denkweisen zu hinterfragen
Achtung: Nach diesem Kurs siehst du das Verhalten deiner Menschen in einem ganz anderen Licht
courses.description:
Spielt es eine Rolle für den eigenen Erfolg ob man wirklich kompetent ist? Alles in uns will diese Frage mit JA! beantworten, doch wir wissen dass es anders ist.
Warum sind also so viele Menschen in verantwortungsvollen Positionen, obwohl andere scheinbar besser qualifiziert wären?


Das liegt daran, dass es einen gewaltigen Unterschied zwischen der realen Kompetenz und der wahrgenommenen Kompetenz gibt.


Erfolg hängt von der Kompetenz ab. Aber eben hauptsächlich von der wahrgenommenen Kompetenz. Fakten, Abschlüsse und rationale Gründe sind nicht entscheidend. Oder glaubst du wirklich, dass wir ohne Medizinstudium die wahre Kompetenz eines Arztes bewerten können?
Nein, aber wir wissen trotzdem, welchem Arzt wir vertrauen. Aber das passiert bestimmt nicht anhand seiner Abschlüsse oder seiner besuchten Seminare.


Du kannst steuern, wie andere dich wahrnehmen!
Wenn du bewusst daran arbeitest, wie andere dich einschätzen, kannst du mit jeder angewandten Technik deinen Status verbessern.


Bringe dein Selbstvertrauen und dein Selbstwertgefühl auf ein neues Level!
Denn du veränderst nicht nur die Meinung von anderen, sondern auch deine eigene Meinung über dich. Das ist der Weg zu einer ganz anderen, besseren Selbstwahrnehmung. Das ist in jeder zwischenmenschlichen Beziehung wichtig, denn nur wenn du dir vertraust, vertrauen dir auch andere. Wenn du zu 100% hinter dir selbst stehst, ist es ein leichtes beliebt bei den Freunden und respektiert in der Karriere zu sein.


Fundiertes Wissen hilft dir weiter
Der Kurs ist auf dem aktuellsten Stand der Psychologie. Damit kannst du mit nonverbaler und verbaler Kommunikation dafür sorgen, dass du selbstsicher in jedes Date, aber auch in jedes Bewerbungsgespräch gehst. Denn egal ob du flirten oder verhandeln willst, schon bevor du zwei Sätze gesagt hast, macht sich dein Gegenüber auf einer unterbewussten Ebene ein Bild von dir. Deswegen ist es uns auch wichtig, dir zu zeigen, wie du bereits Selbstsicherheit und Fähigkeit ausstrahlst, obwohl du noch kein Wort gesagt hast.
Denn so kannst du dich optimal verkaufen. Außerdem gehören Angst vor dem Bewerbungsgespräch oder vor einem Vortrag so der Vergangenheit an.




Gunther Lekies und Benjamin Schollän haben gemeinsam die entscheidenden Techniken gesammelt, zusammengetragen und so aufbereitet, dass jeder diese Techniken anwenden kann. Denn mit der richtigen Selbstdarstellung schaffst du es, dass deine Kompetenz wahrgenommen wird.
Hole dir die Werkzeuge um mit den besten Techniken aus Körpersprache, Redetechnik und Psychologie dein Auftreten zu verbessern und genau dann zu überzeugen, wenn du es dir wünscht.


Sichere dir den Platz im Leben, den du wirklich verdienst!
target_audience: Selbstständige, die eine bessere Außendarstellung wollen
Angestellte, die das nächste Level erreichen möchten
Jeder, der vor einem wichtigen Vortrag oder einer wichtigen Präsentation steht
Alle, die trotz eines guten Abschlusses nicht weiterkommen

courses.title: Manipulationskurs - Manipulation mit und ohne Worte
courses.bio: Wie du dich vor Manipulation schützt und das bekommst, was du möchtest - Psychologie der Sprache und Körpersprache
objectives: Glasklare Strategien um Manipulation im Alltag zu erkennen und zu stoppen
1 zu 1 Anleitungen um Blender sofort zu entlarven
Manipulation ohne Worte – mehr bekommen durch subtile Gestik und Mimiksignale
Keine Dinge mehr tun, die du später bereust - Grundüberzeugungen verändern mit Hypnotischen Sprachmustern
Premium Videokurs mit 1 zu 1 Checklisten
Sofortiger Zugang und Risikolos - Geld zurück bei keinem Erfolg
BONUS: Manipulation im Job, Familie und Beziehungen

Grundlagen: Primacy / Recency - Erinnerungen im Gehirn verankern
Konditionierung - So verbindet der Mensch etwas positives mit dir
Foot-in-the-door - Mit einem Fuß in der Türe

requirements: Browser, Ton - Kein fachliches Vorwissen nötig
courses.description:
Schluss mit Psycho-Spielen - Manipulation durchschauen
Premium-Videokurs - Manipulation stoppen
Nach dem Bestsellerkurs "Körpersprache - Sehen, was Menschen nicht sagen", ist Psychologe Matthias Niggehoff zurück mit einem neuen Kurs und einem pikanten Thema: Wie merke ich eigentlich, wenn ich manipuliert werde? Denn: Wir alle werden, praktisch jeden Tag manipuliert, im Job, im Alltag, sogar in Familie und Beziehung gibt es viele Fälle von Manipulation. Die meisten von uns bekommen es ihr leben lang nicht mit und lassen sich manipulieren, lenken und ausnutzen.
Nach diesem Kurs wirst du dein Umfeld mit anderen Augen sehen. Du wirst Manipulationen durchschauen, wissen, wie du auf Versuche der Manipulation reagieren kannst und (im moralischen Rahmen) das ein oder andere selbst anwenden können.

Matthias Niggehoff, ist Betreiber des größten deutschen Psychologie Podcasts, Top Speaker und Business Trainer. Er vermittelt ausschließlich wissenschaftlich fundiertes Wissen mit direktem Praxisbezug so, dass du es nach diesem Kurs gleich anwenden kannst.


Was Matthias' Teilnehmer sagen:

"Fachlich sehr gut vorgetragen, gefällt mir sehr und ich habe echt was dazu gelernt -DANKE u. LG." - Johann Schöller

"Der Mann ist super!" - Oliver Kunert

"Wunderbare Erklärungen die alltagstauglich sind" - Stephanie Zschocke




Was dich im Kurs erwartet:

Modul #1 Grundlagen der Manipulation
Entschlüssle die Grundprinzipien der Manipulation
Erkenne die unbewussten Trigger, die Menschen geradezu "fernsteuern" lassen.
Lerne die glasklaren Signale kennen, um Blender sofort zu entlarven.
Schütze dich vor den besten Manipulationstechniken der Psychologie und lasse dich nicht mehr manipulieren.
Modul #2 Manipulation ohne Worte
Manipulation ohne Worte – mehr bekommen durch subtile Gestik und Mimiksignale.
Bestimme Veränderungen der eigenen Gestik und Mimik aktivieren direkt spezielle Gehirnbereiche bei deinem Gesprächspartner. Zum Beispiel mehr Sympathie und Ehrlichkeit oder auch Vertrauen.
In dem Modul lernst du alle subtilen non-verbalen Tricks kennen, um mehr zu überzeugen und Menschen ohne Worte zu steuern.
Modul #3 Manipulation mit Worten
Du lernst, wie du mittels Priming-Techniken die Gedankengänge deiner Mitmenschen beeinflussen kannst -
Bringe sie auf andere Gedanken und steuere ihre Gefühlswelt.
Wie du einfach die Grundüberzeugungen deiner Mitmenschen mit Hypnotischen Sprachmustern verändern kannst. Im Alltag überzeugen und erfolgreich durchsetzen.
Gewinne Diskussionen in Meetings immer mit der Manipulation der Argumentation. Schütze dich gleichzeitig in Gesprächen vor schwarzer Rhetorik.
Modul #4 Psycho-Spiele im Alltag
Viele Menschen spielen Psycho-Spiele im Alltag. Sie bringen dich dazu Dinge zu tun, die danach bereust. Subtil aktivieren sie bei dir Mitleid oder spielen Opfer-Spiele.
So stellen sich Menschen extra dumm, damit du ihre Arbeit machst.
In dem Modul lernst du über 15 verschiedene manipulative Psycho-Spiele kennen und weißt genau, wie du sie stoppst.
Lasse dich nicht zu Dingen bringen, die du nicht möchtest. Schütze dich im Alltag.
Modul #5 Bonus
Du bekommst ganz konkrete Empfehlungen und glasklare Signale für Manipulation in den Bereichen Job (Meetings, Verhandlungen, im Team etc.), in der Familie und in Beziehungen.
target_audience: Für Menschen, die im Leben nicht das bekommen, was sie eigentlich verdienen.
Für Menschen, die sich weniger ausnutzen lassen wollen.

courses.description:
PRECISO PREOCUPAR COM A MINHA IMAGEM?
Com certeza! Tem gente que acredita que não é necessário se preocupar com o que os outros estão pensando a seu respeito. Falam o que tem que falar. Se expressam da maneira como é conveniente pra si, magoam, ofendem e atropelam as pessoas sem se preocupar com as emoções dos outros.
Cada vez mais as pessoas estão sendo demitidas pelas suas incompetências comportamentais. Por não possuírem inteligência emocional para lidar com as pessoas, criam uma imagem negativa a seu próprio respeito.
Tem gente que é muito boa tecnicamente, possui todas as competências técnicas que a empresa precisa, porém são chatos, reclamam de tudo, são sempre pessimistas, enfim, criam uma imagem negativa a seu próprio respeito.
Sim! É preciso você cuidar da sua imagem URGENTE.
E A ETIQUETA?
Etiqueta corporativa significa você conhecer hábitos e atitudes que condizem com a empresa, com o ambiente de trabalho, atendendo a critérios e requisitos necessários para atendimento de comportamentos esperados pelo mercado corporativo.
Neste sentido preparamos pra você um curso prático repleto de DICAS de Etiqueta e Marketing Pessoal que vai turbinar a sua carreira e ajudar você a criar uma imagem positiva a seu respeito. Te interessa?
É UM CURSO SOBRE MODA?
Não! Mas iremos lhe oferecer dicas sobre maneiras que você NUNCA deve se vestir em determinadas ocasiões no meio empresarial. Será que posso usar um decote? Pintar as unhas de azul? Preciso fazer a barba todos os dias? Posso mostrar a minha tatoo?
NA PRÁTICA O QUE VOCÊ IRÁ APRENDER?
Inicialmente você fará uma avaliação dos seus padrões comportamentais e das suas atitudes atuais. Através dos segredos e das dicas de MARKETING PESSOAL que o curso oferece, você fará uma validação do que você precisa ajustar ou mudar. Assim você aprenderá os grandes segredos para você fazer o “seu marketing” sem exageros e ganhar o espaço que merece no mercado corporativo.
Com foco nas regras e dicas de ETIQUETA você irá aprender maneiras de se comportar em reuniões, abordagens específicas em relacionamentos profissionais, estratégias adequadas para interação com a equipe, além de regras e dicas de precedência.
Além disso, iremos abordar regras de etiqueta na internet, redes sociais, celulares e e-mails.
É um curso sobre postura, comportamentos e atitudes que vão potencializar a sua imagem!
target_audience: Todos aqueles que desejam desenvolver e potencializar a sua carreira
Líderes que preocupam-se com a sua imagem
Profissionais de diversas áreas em que a imagem é importante

objectives: Crear una marca personal sólida y valiosa que permita al alumno alcanzar las metas profesionales deseadas.
Aprender a potenciar y comunicar el talento
Convertirse en un referente en su sector profesional
Revalorizarse como profesional
Establecer una estrategia de crecimiento profesional

Introducción: ¿Qué es el Personal Branding o Marca Personal?
Fases de creación de la marca personal: Fases de la marca persona. Autoconocimiento
Fases de la marca personal. Focalización de objetivos
Ejercicio. La fórmula de la marca personal
Fases de la marca personal. Elevator Pitch y Storytelling
Fases de la marca personal. Habilidades comunicativas off-line

courses.description:
En este curso, el alumno encontrará vídeos, ejercicios y material complementario que le ayudarán a construir una marca personal sólida y valiosa que serán esenciales para convertirse en un referente en su sector o bien ser elegido en un proceso de selección.Para ello, se recurrirá a herramientas del autoconocimiento, la estrategia empresarial, el marketing y la tecnología.
La marca personal es la huella o el recuerdo que cada persona deja en la mente de los demás cuando se ha ido. Es nuestra identidad y reputación.
En una sociedad altamente competitiva y saturada de perfiles profesionales homogéneos, la marca personal permite identificar, definir y comunicar aquellos valores que nos hacen diferentes de los demás y que nos permiten destacar sobre el resto. Una marca personal positiva consigue convertirnos en la opción preferida entre varias posibilidades.
Hoy en día, igual de importante es tener las destrezas técnicas para desarrollar nuestro trabajo como las habilidades para saber comunicarlas. Por ello, en el Curso Intensivo de Personal Branding trabajaremos en el desarrollo de una estrategia que nos permita potenciar nuestro talento y comunicarlo con honestidad y eficacia a través de los canales de comunicación existentes (tanto on-line como off-line).
target_audience: - Profesionales que desean conocer los principios básicos para construir una marca personal sólida que les permita  vivir de aquello que les apasiona.
- Emprendedores y freelance que deseen posicionarse como la mejor alternativa para sus clientes dentro de su sector.

- Personas interesadas en conocer las nuevas herramientas y valores del mercado laboral (redes sociales, blogs, networking, Inteligencia Emocional…). Tener una marca personal positiva es la mejor manera para acceder a una entrevista de trabajo y obtener retos personales y laborales motivadores.
- Profesionales que deseen reorientar su carrera profesional.

- Personas conscientes de que el empleo “para toda la vida” está en vías de extinción y por ello, hay que invertir en crear una marca personal fuerte acorde con nuestras aspiraciones y habilidades. Los trabajos son pasajeros pero el valor personal es permanente.

courses.title: Building Your Brand As A Thought Leader
courses.bio: How To Develop A Robust Thought Leadership Strategy?
objectives: Understand the concept and significance of thought leadership
Develop strategies to effectively engage with and understand your target audience
Create a comprehensive content strategy for thought leadership
Measure and refine the impact of your thought leadership efforts

III. Identifying Key Topics and Themes: III. Identifying Key Topics and Themes
VI. Measuring the Impact of Your Thought: VI. Measuring the Impact of Your Thought Leadership Efforts
VII. Building a Sustainable Thought Lead: VII. Building a Sustainable Thought Leadership Program

requirements: Basic knowledge of the industry or field: Participants should have a foundational understanding of the industry or field in which they aim to establish themselves as thought leaders.
Familiarity with content creation: It would be beneficial for participants to have some experience or familiarity with creating content, such as writing blog posts, articles, or creating videos.

Understanding of target audience: While the course covers audience research and buyer personas, having a basic understanding of who their target audience is and what their needs and preferences might be will enhance the learning experience.

Access to technology and online platforms: Since this is an online course, participants should have access to a reliable internet connection and the necessary technology (e.g., computer, smartphone) to access the course materials and engage in online discussions or activities.
courses.description:
This online course "Building Your Brand As A Thought Leader" is designed to equip individuals and professionals with the knowledge and strategies to establish themselves or their organizations as influential thought leaders in their respective industries.
In today's competitive business world, thought leadership plays a pivotal role in shaping industry trends, driving growth, and gaining a competitive edge. This course provides a comprehensive framework to develop a compelling thought leadership strategy that resonates with target audiences, engages with them effectively, and creates a lasting impact.
Through a series of modules, participants will explore the fundamentals of thought leadership, including its definition, significance, and the benefits of becoming a recognized thought leader. They will learn how to identify their target audience, conduct audience research, and develop buyer personas to better understand their audience's needs and preferences.
Participants will gain insights into identifying key topics and themes that align with their expertise and resonate with their target audience. They will discover techniques for researching industry trends, staying up-to-date with hot topics, and positioning themselves as knowledgeable leaders in their field.
The course will guide participants in creating a comprehensive content strategy tailored to their thought leadership goals. They will learn how to develop a content calendar, choose the right channels and formats for content distribution, and engage with their audience effectively.
Measuring the impact of thought leadership efforts is crucial for refining and optimizing strategies. Participants will explore key metrics, tools, and data-driven approaches to track and evaluate the effectiveness of their thought leadership content. They will gain insights on using data to refine their strategies and make informed decisions for continued growth and success.
Building a sustainable thought leadership program is essential for long-term success. Participants will learn tips for maintaining momentum, scaling their thought leadership efforts, and adapting strategies as their business evolves.
By the end of the course, participants will have the knowledge and skills to establish themselves or their organizations as thought leaders, effectively engage with their target audience, create compelling thought leadership content, and measure the impact of their efforts.
Join us in this transformative course and unlock your potential as a thought leader, making a lasting impact in your industry and beyond.
target_audience: Entrepreneurs
Executives
Marketers
Content Creators
Professionals seeking to enhance their influence and credibility.
Individuals looking to establish themselves or their organizations as thought leaders.
Those interested in expanding their impact and visibility in their respective industries.

courses.title: YouTube's Journey - Tu Guía Completa hacia YouTube
courses.bio: Aprende los Mayores Secretos para lanzarte con Éxito en YouTube!
objectives: Crea con éxito tu canal de Youtube
Encuentra tu voz en Youtube
Haz Mejores Videos
Despega tu Canal
Haz crecer a tu Marca Personal
Encuentra tu Audiencia

Introducción: La vida que puedes llegar a vivir.
Comunidad & Monetización: Encuentra a otros Youtubers o Influencers

requirements: Conexión a Internet y ganas de Aprender!
courses.description:
Imagínate poder aprender de gente que ya haya llegado al éxito, poder conocer sus aciertos sus errores, sus rituales para conseguir millones de visitas. Piensa hasta dónde podrías llegar si aplicaras esas lecciones en tu propia vida (en vez de dedicar años para cometer sus mismos errores).
En este curso aprenderás justo eso. Cubriremos en gran profundidad los secretos y estrategias mejor guardados por las mentes más brillantes y más exitosas de la plataforma de Youtube.
¡Lánzate ahora y tendrás acceso de por vida a un curso que cambiará para siempre tu forma de crear en Youtube! En el que aprenderás todo lo que necesitas para lanzarte en la plataforma, desde las estrategias para obtener millones de visitas y subscriptores hasta cómo poder vivir de tu pasión.
Youtube es la plataforma del momento. Todo el mundo quiere crearse un canal. Pero.... ¿Qué te va a diferenciar del resto? ¿Qué te va a hacer que destaques?
Durante mucho tiempo, yo mi hice la misma pregunta... Durante mucho tiempo intenté crear muchos canales de diferentes temáticas, pero ninguno con éxito. Con el tiempo me dí cuenta, que el problema no era la cantidad de vídeos que publicaba, ni la cámara, ni el ordenador, sino... La Experiencia.
Mi nombre es Dani y soy un cineasta. Llevo creando vídeos para YouTube desde el 2007 pero sin ningún éxito hasta que hace unos años decidí abandonar mi casa y lanzarme a vivir a Londres para perseguir mi pasión: ser un cineasta.
Desde ese momento, mi vida cambió por completo ya que tras mucho trabajo tuve la oportunidad de trabajar bajo uno de los canales de entrevistas más grandes de la comunidad inglesa! De un día para otro, pasé de trabajar en un restaurante como limpia platos, a conocer alguna de las mentes más brillantes del planeta. Durante mi tiempo trabajando pude conocer todo tipo de personas, desde canales con millones de seguidores, a escritores de best-sellers a millonarios, astronautas, científicos, etc.

Aunque no lo sabía en ese momento, muchos de sus consejos cambiaron radicalmente mi forma de pensar. Pude comprobar esto cuando tiempo después decidí dejar atrás mi trabajo y lanzarme a crear mi propio canal de Youtube: Dani Bonilla. Ya que en menos de un año conseguí lo que jamás había conseguido con ningún otro canal que había creado, poder tener una comunidad que disfrutara de mi contenido.
Ahí es donde me dí cuenta de que si realmente quieres tener un canal de éxito, necesitas tener los conocimientos y experiencia de alguien que ya haya estado ahí. O si no puedes pasarte años cometiendo los mismos errores una y otra vez, sin saber que estás haciendo mal.

Ya que para aprender todo esto por tu cuenta, requiere tiempo. En mi caso ha sido casi una década (aún aprendiendo de otros) y en el de muchos otros Youtubers mucho más! Esa es la razón por la que he decidido crear este curso, para poder devolver todo lo que he aprendido de una forma más rápida y eficaz.
Para que no tengas que cometer los mismos errores que yo y otros cometimos, para que puedas conseguir éxito con tu canal de YouTube mucho antes que cualquier otro!

Gracias a la tecnología, ya no tienes que pasarte años leyendo libros o aprendiendo de ensayo y error. Puedes prácticamente acceder a la mente de otras personas para aprender de su experiencia, de sus errores.
A esto lo llamamos aprendizaje acelerado! En unas pocas horas puedes aprender lo otros han tardado años en descubrir por su cuenta.
Y este curso es exactamente esto, en menos de 6 horas he comprimido todo lo que te hará falta para empezar y sacar hacia adelante tu canal de YouTube con éxito. Todo lo que necesitas para poder vivir de lo que realmente te apasiona y poder ayudar e inspirar a otros como tú.
Y por supuesto, respaldado bajo la experiencia de canales ya establecidos que viven a tiempo completo de su pasión y la experiencia que he tenido creando mis canales.
Por ello, si quieres realmente lanzarte y dar el paso. Si realmente estás preparado para comenzar en este camino... ¿A que esperas? ¿Cuál es tu excusa para todavía no haber empezado?
Un abrazo, Dani.
Nos vemos dentro!
target_audience: Quieres empezar en Youtube
Quieres crear tu marca personal
No consigues crecer en Youtube
Quieres lanzarte a vivir de tu pasión
Quieres conseguir dinero de tu canal en Youtube

courses.title: Dijital İş Dünyasında Öne Çıkmak; LinkedIn Eğitimi
courses.bio: LinkedIn Eğitimi ve İş Dünyasında LinkedIn Kullanımı
objectives: LinkedIn Nasıl Kullanılır
LinkedIn Profili Nasıl Hazırlanır ve Nasıl Zenginleştirilir

requirements: Başlangıç Seviyesinde LinkedIn Kullanımı, Bilgisayar, Tablet veya Akıllı Telefon
courses.description:
LinkedIn, iş dünyasında profesyonel ağ kurma, iş bulma ve işbirliği yapma amacıyla tasarlanmış güçlü bir platformdur. LinkedIn eğitimi, bireylere profil oluşturma, ağlarını genişletme, sektör içindeki gelişmeleri takip etme ve kariyer hedeflerine ulaşmak için stratejiler geliştirme konularında rehberlik sağlar.
LinkedIn, kullanıcılarına CV'lerini dijitalleştirme ve profesyonel deneyimlerini vurgulama fırsatı sunar. Bu, iş arayanlar için iş bulma sürecini kolaylaştırırken, işverenlere de potansiyel adayları daha etkili bir şekilde bulma imkanı tanır. Ayrıca, sektörel gruplara katılım ve içerik paylaşımı gibi etkinliklerle profesyonel bilgi ve görüş alışverişi de teşvik edilir.
LinkedIn'in iş dünyasında kullanımı, kurumsal marka bilinirliğini artırma, iş bağlantılarıyla iletişimi güçlendirme ve sektörel trendleri yakından takip etme açısından kritiktir. Doğru stratejilerle kullanıldığında, LinkedIn, profesyonellerin kariyerlerini şekillendirmelerine ve iş dünyasındaki etkileşimlerini artırmalarına yardımcı olur.
Bu eğitim, kullanıcılarına LinkedIn'in potansiyelini en iyi şekilde nasıl değerlendirecekleri konusunda bilgi verir ve iş dünyasında etkili bir dijital varlık oluşturmanın önemini vurgular.
LinkedIn eğitimi, profesyonellerin dijital ağlarını güçlendirmelerine odaklanarak, etkili iletişim becerileri kazanmalarını ve kariyer hedeflerine ulaşmalarını destekler. Ayrıca, LinkedIn'in güncel özelliklerini kullanarak iş dünyasındaki güncel gelişmeleri takip etme ve sektörel bilgilerini artırma fırsatı sunar. Profesyoneller, etkileşimli içerik paylaşımları ve düzenlenen etkinliklere katılım yoluyla sektördeki liderlerle bağlantı kurabilir, bilgi alışverişi yapabilir ve iş fırsatlarını genişletebilir. LinkedIn, iş dünyasında etkileşimi artırmak ve profesyonel gelişim için benzersiz bir dijital platform sunarak, kullanıcılarını başarıya doğru yönlendirir.
target_audience: Şirket Çalışanları, Kendi İşini Yönetenler, Dış ticaret uzmanı, ithalat uzmanı, ihracat uzmanı, satınalma sorumlusu, tedarik sorumlusu, dış ticaret müdürü, ithalat müdürü, ithalat operasyon sorumlusu

Instagram é uma rede social online de compartilhamento de fotos/vídeos entre seus usuários e que tem mais de 1 bilhão de usuários ativos no mundo.

O objetivo do curso é ensinar você a utilizar um robô escrito em Python para conseguir seguidores reais e segmentados para alavancar o alcance da seu perfil , seja uma empresa, um perfil pessoal ou ambos.
A estratégia
Por meio de curtidas e comentários em fotos e seguindo perfis alvos, vamos dizer para nosso robô divulgar nosso perfil para uma quantidade enorme de usuários e atingir nosso objetivo.
O que vamos aprender?
Iremos aprender a interagir via código escrito em Python e utilizar localização, feed, hashtags, comentários e curtidas.
E sabe o que é melhor?
O melhor é que tudo será feito de forma automática, com agendamento automático de tarefas, utilizando técnicas que vão acabar com a sua concorrência.

courses.description:
Presentation Skills for any occasion. Imagine giving an acceptance speech in front of the people you respect the most (or perhaps the whole world) and you are brief, funny, thoughtful, and insightful. Wouldn't it be great if you could leave a fantastic impression on people during your brief acceptance speech?
In this How to Give an Acceptance Speech - Presentation Skills course you will learn the following:
* How to say thanks in a genuine and memorable way
* How to avoid the most common blunders made by award winners
* How to appear poised and relaxed
* How to rehearse on video
* How to master Presentation Skills
This course is delivered primarily through spoken lecture. Because the skill you are learning is speaking related, it only makes sense that you learn through speaking and practicing presentation skills.
The skill you will learn in this class is not primarily theoretical or academic. It is a skill that requires physical habits. That is why you will be asked to take part in numerous exercises where you record yourself speaking on video, and then watching yourself. Learning presentation skills is like learning how to ride a bicycle. You simply have to do it numerous times and work past the wobbling and falling off parts until you get it right.
This presentation skills course contains numerous video lectures plus several bonus books for your training library.
TJ Walker has been coaching and training people on their presentation skills for 30 years. Now, through the power of Udemy's online platform, he is able to give you the same high quality training that he gives in person to CEOs, Fortune 500 executives, and Presidents of countries. Only you can now receive the training at a tiny fraction of the normal fee for in-person training.
How long this course takes is up to you. The longest part of the course involves you speaking on video, critiquing yourself, and doing it over until you like it. But if you get to the point where you love how you look and sound when you present it will be well worth the time spent. And having this skill will save you time for all future presentations in your life.
You can begin improving your presentation skills right now. You may have an opportunity to speak out as soon as tomorrow, so why waste another day worried that your presentation skills are not up to high standards. Enroll in this course today.
"TJ has some really good instructions and advice when it comes to speaking at something like this. Watching these lectures can keep you from making a TOTAL fool out of yourself and probably even end up helping you set a great impression, instead!!" Teresa Trimm

There is a 100% Money-Back Guarantee for this presentation skills course. And the instructor also provides an enhanced guarantee.
TJ Walker has more than 100,000 courses enrollments from more than 14,000 online students around the globe.

courses.description:
Esta es la tendencia:  93% de las empresas buscan sus candidatos con redes sociales, el 92% usa LinkedIn, el 60% Facebook  y el 54% Twitter.
Aprende con la instructora Florángela Murcia  a estructurar tus perfiles con excelencia, a sacar el mayor provecho y estar vigente en el mercado laboral. Muchas universidades de alto nivel confían en ella para la preparación de los egresados para la empleabilidad.


La función de LinkedIn es unir a candidatos y a empresas o otros oferentes de empleo o trabajos remotos, por horas, por proyecto o freelance. Esta res puede ser utilizada desde los 16 años y es para todos los niveles de escolaridad.


¿Por qué usar LinkedIn? 70% de las empresas consiguen candidatos con redes sociales, porque es más rápido (20%) y logran mejorar la calidad de los candidatos (42%). De manera saber usar las redes sociales es fundamental para lograr un nuevo empleo, fortalecer tu marca profesional y personal y consolidar tu éxito profesional. Si no tienes un perfil en LinkedIn o no está bien construido, perderás oportunidades de ser llamado por empresas, de enterarte de posibilidades, conocer tendencias, tips, consejos, y tener en tu lista de contactos a gente interesante con quien pueden ayudarse mutuamente en sus objetivos.


No pierdas ventaja frente a otros, hoy en día la tecnología y la globalización exigen actualización y conexión  y reflejarlo  profesionalmente.


Con el curso aprenderás:
1. El funcionamiento de la Red LinkedIn
2. Cómo usar tus redes sociales para lograr tus metas de empleo
3. Como crear un excelente perfil en LinkedIn
4. Cómo escribir el título y el extracto en LinkedIn
5. Cómo tomar una fotografía para LinkedIn
6. Usar referencias, competencias y otras secciones de LinkedIn
7. Cómo usar la red para llegar a nuevos empleos
target_audience: Personas que se encuentren sin empleo

courses.title: How to Pick a Bestselling Book Title Before Writing a Book
courses.bio: Don't waste your time writing a book nobody wants. Learn how to choose a winning nonfiction book topic in easy steps.
objectives: How to pick a nonfiction book title that readers want to buy
How to choose a general topic for your book (using a simple framework)
Strategies to narrow down the topic for a targeted audience and outcome
How to choose a title and subtitle combination that attracts attention

Step 1: Choose a General Topic: Overview of how to choose a general topic
Step 2: Narrow it Down: Overview of how to narrow down your topic

A Quick Note (Before You Finalize Your Title)

requirements: Interested in writing a nonfiction book and becoming a published author
Note: This course does NOT explain how to choose fiction book titles (it only focuses on nonfiction titles)
courses.description:
**This is a simple course that gives you everything you need to know about how to find a book title that sells, even if you're a first-time author**
A step-by-step plan that saves you from the frustration of spending months on writing a book that no one wants to buy.


Simple Tips That You Can Implement Straightaway
How to find book topic ideas that people want to read
How to use Amazon's data (such as positive and negative reviews) to refine your book's topic
How to choose a title and subtitle combination that attracts attention
How to find topics to write a book about even if you have no idea where to start


Write a book that customers want BEFORE you spend time on writing it
Most authors go with their "gut feel" or intuition when they choose a book topic and title. They focus on picking a smart or catchy title that sounds attractive but ends up confusing their readers.
Moreover, most readers are bombarded with hundreds of book titles every day, so if your book topic is not crystal clear (to someone who glances at it in 2 seconds), then you might be losing sales.
Given that there are many free research tools available (including Google and Amazon), there is absolutely no reason why authors should waste their time and energy on a book that doesn't sell.
After taking this course, you'll learn how to craft the perfect book title that is descriptive AND persuasive before you start writing it. You'll end up with a book that grabs attention and turns more people into buyers.


Content and Overview
The course includes over 25 lectures and 1.5 hours of content. It is designed for anyone who is interested in writing a nonfiction book.
The focus of the course is on self-publishing Amazon Kindle books, but the ideas can be used for publishing on any platform.
The content includes four main steps, and each step includes simple tips that you can follow.
The course is delivered in a format that is easily digestible for busy professionals (each video lecture is around 2 to 7 minutes long).
Here's are the steps that are covered in the course:


STEP 1 Choose a General Topic
STEP 2 Narrow It Down
STEP 3 Choose a Title and Subtitle
STEP 4 Test and Iterate


Tips from a 7X Amazon Bestselling Author
My name is Hassan Osman and I understand how it feels to write a book that doesn't sell. When I wrote my first book back in 2006, I spent every weekend for a year at a local coffee shop typing away at my book. When it finally got published, I thought that all that hard work was going to pay off immediately after launch. Unfortunately, it flopped and barely anyone bought it. I learned the hard way that I should have focused on marketing before I wrote a single word.
Picking the right topic and title before I wrote the book was how I should have approached it.
Today, I'm the author of 14 books, including seven Amazon No.1 Bestsellers. I wrote all those books while working a full-time job at Cisco Systems (note: views are my own), so you can follow this simple process without spending a ton of time on it.
I'm also the podcast host of "Writer on the Side" where I help employees become nonfiction authors.
In this course, you'll get simple tips about picking the right title from someone who's done this multiple times.


An easy process to follow:
Take the course
Pick your book title
Write your book


That's it!


There are no other requirements necessary to enroll in the course, and you can learn the material at your own pace.


30 Day Money Back Guarantee
If you are not satisfied with the course for any reason, you may return the course within 30 days of the purchase date.


Ready to Start?
Click on the "Buy Now" or "Enroll Now" button in the top right corner of this page and get immediate access to start learning how to pick a bestselling book title.
target_audience: New authors who want to write their first nonfiction book
Experienced authors who want to modify titles of their existing books (or want to write their next book)

Today in this New Normal, things are changing rapidly. What is required today is to project yourself as a Brand. This is the only way one can keep himself/herself ready to face pandemic like crisis in future too. Professionals sometimes wonder that they despite of being so intellectual and efficient, still do not get due appreciation and recognition. Actually, they don’t know how to Translate their ‘Efficiency’ in to ‘Effectiveness’. This ‘Effectiveness’ is the pivot of this module. Organizations are not interested in what you are? They are interested to know What you can do and how effectively can you do prove your worth.
About this course:
· You will learn to Change the mind mapping and will be able to execute the shift in paradigm
· It will help you to Unlearn the old habits and learn new ones

· This course will enable you to write the powerful script of your future story

If we keep doing…

So, if you want to get something more and different; you will have to become a different professional altogether. Hence, a ‘Big Transformation’ is required in your current way of working in your profession. I.e. Self Branding

requirements: That students be in a position or role where they want to open up more opportunities from live or online networking events.
courses.description:
So, what do you do?
It seems like a simple enough question.
But it's actually so difficult, awkward, confusing, or uncomfortable, that you don't even answer it.  You just throw out your job title and hope the other person understands what you do.
Or, on the other extreme, you go into a long, convoluted Elevator Pitch that, in the context of a personal conversation, seems contrived, disingenuous, and not authentic at all.
And you wonder why no one is interested in what you do?


It may be because you didn't have an Intriguing Introduction.  One that naturally resonated with people, peaked their curiosity, and made them want to ask you questions and engage.
How you introduce yourself is one of the key business communication skills.  It can open up huge opportunities for you, or close them before the conversation even gets going and damage your personal brand.
And let's not forget those introductions to small groups, and even whole rooms of people at organizations and events where you have anywhere from 10 seconds to a whole minute to introduce yourself...  It's both an opportunity and a risk, but at scale.

If you are a:
Business Owner, or
are in Sales,
Marketing,
Branding
Business Development,
Community Engagement
Fundraising
...or are in any other role where you have to be out meeting new people and making connections, this course is for you.


You may be a natural networker wherever you go, or focus on organizations like the local Chamber of Commerce, Non-Profit Board, Civic Club, or Referral Groups like BNI.
Or you may be doing Organic Outreach and "networking" on social channels like LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, or TikTok.
Regardless of where you need to introduce yourself, if you have an Intriguing Introduction you will Open Opportunities to build relationships and promote your products and services.


When you apply the frameworks, models, and principles in this course, you'll be able to...
Give introductions that are:
3-5 seconds
15-30 seconds
30-60 seconds
Or any length in between...
...Deliver those introductions to:
Individuals, one to one
Small Networking Groups
Huge Audiences
And anybody Online on the Internet...
...For the purposes of:
Lead Generation
Nurturing Opportunities
Referrals
Or Strategic Partnerships


I put this course together because I’ve been “that guy.” That guy that was paying a lot of money to go to networking events to meet people and grow my business, but wasn’t getting any traction because every time someone asked me what I did, I rambled through an answer or said something that left people completely confused.

But you don’t have to be that guy.
Checkout some of the preview lectures, then register.  You’ll be really glad you did.
target_audience: Business Owners, Professionals, Salespeople, Marketers, Fundraisers, or others that regularly generate confused looks, blank stares, or the silent nods of people that are pretending to understand your explanation of what you do.
People that would like others to be interested in what they do

Pre-Interview Preparation: Master the steps for thorough preparation before any media appearance.

Practical Application: Practice these techniques in a course-project scenario to build confidence and proficiency.
requirements: In today's fast-paced, information-driven world, engaging in media interviews is a critical skill for researchers, business founders, and more. There is no necessary background or skills to take this course, but we recommend learners have some sort of device they can record themselves on for the Practice module. This could be a cellphone, or even an audio-only recording device.
courses.description:
About this Class
In today's fast-paced, information-driven world, engaging in media interviews is a critical skill for researchers, business founders, and more. So, if you expect to ever find yourself on a podcast or in a video interview, this course is for you. Many of these strategies are, of course, helpful outside of media interactions and applicable for in-person presentations, boardrooms, and more.


Ready to take control of and transform your messaging?
Whether it's to promote groundbreaking research, highlight business achievements, or manage a crisis, the ability to effectively communicate with the media can significantly impact your reputation and success.
Designed for startup founders, researchers, and other professionals, this class will help you boost your visibility, credibility, and influence through effective media engagement strategies.


Why Take This Class:
Media skills are essential for anyone looking to amplify their professional presence and influence. In today's media-driven world, knowing how to effectively communicate with the press can open doors to new opportunities and collaborations. The skills you’ll learn in this course will not only help you shine in interviews but also enhance your overall communication strategy. Of course, skills like these can be used beyond just interviews, but are useful for boardrooms, and beyond.


Who I am:
With over 15 years of media-production experience, conducting more than 100 interviews a year, I bring a wealth of knowledge and practical insights to help you master the art of media interaction.
I have worked with more than five University Presidents, actors including Dwayne Johnson, Ariana Grande, and William Shatner (and more), and thought leaders and scientists including Katie Bouman (who helped develop the algorithm that created the first-ever image of a black hole), Pieter Cullis (who developed the lipid nanoparticle drug delivery platform used in mRNA vaccines), and Suzanne Simard (known for her work on how trees interact and communicate using below-ground fungal networks), and countless more.


What You'll Learn:
Understanding Media Engagement Benefits: Learn the importance of media engagement and how it can elevate your professional profile.
Crafting Key Messages: Use techniques like the Three W’s and the Inverted Pyramid to package your messages into clear, concise, and compelling statements.
Pre-Interview Preparation: Master the steps for thorough preparation before any media appearance.
Interview Control Techniques: Develop skills such as bridging to maintain control and steer the interview in your favour.
Practical Application: Practice these techniques in a course-project scenario to build confidence and proficiency.
Downloadable Resources: With a number of downloadable resources and worksheets, you’ll have ready to use tools at your fingertips including a list of important bridging phrases, templates for key-message prep, and more.
target_audience: Whether it's to promote groundbreaking research, highlight business achievements, or manage a crisis, the ability to effectively communicate with the media can significantly impact your reputation and success.  Designed for startup founders, researchers, and other professionals, this class will help you boost your visibility, credibility, and influence through effective media engagement strategies.
This course is great for anyone who expects to be interviewed such as in a podcast or video.

Die Bestandsaufnahme - Wer bin ich? (ein: Wie entwickle ich eine Personal Brand Identität?

Welche Stärken und Kompetenzen habe ich?

Wie kann ich meine Botschaft einfach und schnell vermitteln?
Wie kann ich meinen Auftritt visuell umsetzen?

Wie kann ich im Bereich Social Media Akzente setzen?

Benötige ich eine eigene Webseite und/oder einen Blog?
Was haben Keywords und Suchmaschinenoptimierung mit Personal Branding zu tun?
Ist Old School Networking noch “en vogue”?
Die Evaluierung - Bin das noch ich? (die: Ist die Strategie noch richtig und wirkungsvoll?
Was sind die entscheidenden Erfolgsfaktoren beim Personal Branding?

requirements: Es sind für diesen Kurs keine speziellen Voraussetzungen oder Kenntnisse erforderlich.
courses.description:
Herzlich Willkommen zum Kurs: Personal Branding – Zeige, wer du bist!
In diesem Kurs möchte ich dir zunächst einen grundlegenden Einblick ins Personal Branding geben. Mit dieser Grundlage wird umgehend ersichtlich, wie wichtig und dringlich es im digitalen Zeitalter ist, das eigene Auftreten aktiv selbst zu steuern. Nach dem Einführungsabschnitt zeige ich dir, wie du in vier Schritten deine eigene Personal Brand aufbauen und umsetzen kannst. Dabei werden wir folgende Themen behandeln:
Was ist Personal Branding?
Warum ist Personal Branding wichtig?
Welche Vor- und Nachteile kann es mit sich bringen?
Wie kann ich eine eigene Personal Brand-Identität entwickeln?
Wie kann ich eine persönliche Strategie entwickeln und umsetzen?
Wie prüfe ich den Erfolg meiner Personal Brand?
Was sind die entscheidenden Erfolgsfaktoren beim Personal Branding?
Mir ist wichtig, dass dieser Kurs kein theoretisches Geschwafel ist, sondern eine praxisorientierte Anleitung, die dir schon während dem Kurs hilft, in puncto Personal Branding loszulegen. Du bekommst einen konkreten Leitfaden, der dir hilft, eine eigene Personal Brand aufzubauen. Gleichzeitig bekommst du aber auch genügend Hintergrundinfos, damit du selbst einschätzen lernst, was für Aktionen für dich überhaupt wichtig sind und welche nicht.
target_audience: Der Kurs richtet sich an alle, die nach Zufriedenheit, Erfolg und Chancenreichtum im Berufsleben streben.
Alle Personen, die im Berufsleben stehen oder in absehbarer Zeit ins Berufsleben eintreten werden.
Personen, die aktuell arbeitslos und auf Jobsuche sind.
Personen, die eine berufliche Änderung planen.
Alle Personen, die beruflich selbständig sind oder planen, sich selbständig zu machen.

Der Kurs richtet sich nicht an Branding-ExpertInnen, sondern an all jene, die bisher nichts explizit mit Personal Branding zu tun hatten bzw. dem gesamten Personal Branding Auftritt mehr Struktur und Professionalität verleihen wollen.

courses.description:
Research has shown that over 80% of people who dreamed of writing a book never did…
Instead, they actually die with their stories still locked up inside of them…
It’s a tragic statistic ...that you don't want to be apart of.....
And if you’re a...

- Entrepreneur
- Service Professional
- Consultant
- Or anyone who has a story to tell....even if you've experienced setbacks/challenges and want to share your story to inspire others...
then you NEED a simple and easy way to finally
write your boo
k!
So let me share with you a little bit about how writing my first book changed my life forever...
I Always Dreamed Of Writing A Book...And When I Finally Did, My Life Changed Forever!
When I was a little girl, I always dreamed of writing a book…
But no matter how hard I tried, life always seemed to get in the way…
- First, I got pregnant at age 16…
- And then my Dad died.
- I struggled with his death for a long time, as I just couldn’t stop thinking, “Why ME?”...
But eventually, I found a way through it…
Which is when I began to learn the lessons that formed the basis for my first book, 'Overcoming Your Setbacks'…
It was a profoundly enlightening experience...and once I began to start writing about what I had learned…
My life changed FOREVER!
The feeling of being able to flip the pages of my very own hard-copy book was the most exhilarating thing I’ve ever experienced…
And my journey didn’t stop there either...
Because pretty soon, I scored an opportunity to write for one of the BIGGEST writing platforms in the world...The Huffington Post!
That’s when I realized that writing a book was the best possible way to become an EXPERT in your field…
Writing A Book Is
The Best Way
To Build Authority And Become An Expert In Your Field
Here’s something you probably don’t realize…
Right NOW
is the BEST possible time
to write your book...
And that’s because, in today’s world, thanks in large part to Amazon and the spread of eBooks all over the world...
Writing a book
builds your authority
and establishes YOU as an EXPERT in your field in a way that
nothing else can
!
Here's why...
Readers automatically assume that if you’ve written and published a book, you MUST know what you’re talking about
It provides massive value for a very low cost
It proves you have the dedication and work ethic to write a book from start to finish (and actually have it published!)
It pre-frames your readers to buy more from you
Essentially, your book serves as your front-end offer…
It helps you attract NEW followers to your audience…
...and then convert those new followers into
paying customers
.
All while being able to make money from the sale of your book at the same time!
Sounds good, right?
The only problem then, is figuring how to actually WRITE your book…
(especially if you’re not a writer!)
But that’s why my team and I have been hard at work putting together a simple, step-by-step course that can teach ANYONE how to write their first book…
Even if you’ve never done ANY formal or professional writing before…
So you can
build your authority
and
become an expert in your field
!
It’s called The Expert Author Blueprint...
Introducing The Expert Author Blueprint:
The Simplest And Easiest Way To Write Your First Book (Even If You’re Not A Writer!)
...a step-by-step system for budding authors!
Here’s what you’ll learn when you enroll in the course:
How to achieve the right mindset necessary to see your book through to actually being published
The 3 different ways you can get your book written and published
How to come up with a catchy and memorable title for your book
How to craft a perfect outline that makes writing each chapter easier than you thought possible
How to avoid writer’s block and actually finish your book on time
How to create “buzz” around your book launch and market it to your audience successfully
And Much More...
What Past Students Are Saying...
13-Year Old Author...
I am 13 years old. I am the author of the upcoming book, ‘Youths On Fire: Take The Right Action Today To Be The Best Of Yourself Tomorrow.’ My book is as a direct result of taking this course. I was able to go through the course with ease. It is written in simple language and a person of any age can go through this course to write their own book. If at 13 I am able to go through this book writing course and complete my book, you can too!
Terrence Fagan Jr.
Sophia’s Course is Phenomenal...
Sophia is a very talented and amazing writer and individual. Sophia’s book writing course provides a step by step process to getting it completed. I was able to go through the course with ease as it was easy to understand and very helpful. Sophia’s course not only helped me with my book writing  but with my mindset as well. I am now able to see myself as an author before my book even gets published. I really started believing in becoming an author thanks to her help and her book writing course.
Sophia’s book writing course is phenomenal, I highly recommend anyone who is serious about becoming an author to take this course.
Randeep Mann


TURN YOUR WRITING DREAMS INTO REALITY!
STARTING NOW...
If you’ve ever dreamed of writing a book and successfully becoming a published author…
NOW is the time!
So enroll in The Expert Author Blueprint today and become an expert in your field…

Introduction
In today's digital age, personal branding is essential for career advancement and professional recognition. This course will guide you through the principles of building and managing a strategic personal brand online. You will learn how to effectively present yourself in a way that aligns with your professional goals and values.
Everyone is always seeking for his / her own charismatic and unique style and how to be different , successful and impactful on others . To know how efficiently you can build your personal branding in a strategic way just attend this session.


Why some people seem to have a persona and a grand reputation that makes you be in owe of them before you have even met them? How does image relate to a person’s success?
Today, with the breath-taking advances in information technology, we are more connected than ever before. There is also a lot more competition and people all over the planet are competing with one another to provide products and services. In such a competitive work, what comes to define a person’s output is their brand. Much like branding being a crucial part of a company’s marketing strategy, personal branding is just as important to anyone operating in any market.
Many come to think of personal branding as something for the self-employed or those working in the creative industry such as actors, singers or musicians. In reality, personal branding is essential for everyone. If you are working for someone else, you still need to provide your services and consultation to your co-workers. To get better results and succeed, you need to be able to popularise your ideas and become well-known. Personal branding can help you build your image and spread your ideas.
Personal branding follows the same principles of branding and marketing though it is applied to an individual. This course provides a structured approach to help you define, plan and execute a branding strategy. The course contains numerous guidelines as suggested by facilitator as well as plenty of examples.

courses.description:
Questo corso unisce per la prima volta il mondo dell'audiovideo con quello della comunicazione. Un percorso a 360° per imparare a fare i video in maniera indipendente e imparare a comunicare davanti alla telecamera, con tanti training specifici dedicati al public speaking. Per questo la definiamo un'esperienza che tocca le basi delle varie materie in maniera ampia e molto versatile: teoria, tecnica e pratica, tutto insieme.
GESTISCI AL MEGLIO QUELLO CHE STA DIETRO E  DAVANTI ALLA TELECAMERA!
Se sei un libero professionista questo corso ti insegnerà a gestire al meglio il linguaggio video per comunicare meglio il tuo messaggio.
Se sei docente, insegnante, coach questo percorso ti insegnerà a fare ottimi video per la formazione.
Se sei influencer, youtuber questo percorso ti aiuterà a fare video eccezionali per i tuoi fan o per i tuoi clienti.


COSA FARAI CON CRISTIANA
Può essere difficile stare di fronte alla telecamera, e ci sono diverse cose da vedere ed esercizi che si possono fare prima, per prepararsi al meglio e sentirsi comunque a proprio agio. Per arricchire le tue potenzialità oratorie scopriremo come esprimerle, liberarle e usarle a tuo vantaggio. Per perfezionare il nostro linguaggio verbale e non verbale, e comunicare in modo efficace la tua unicità professionale, partiremo dalla respirazione, a mio avviso la perfetta chiave di accesso che apre molte porte, e impareremo insieme a gestirla correttamente.
COSA FARAI CON FABRIZIO
Anche se non hai mai preso in mano una telecamera scoprirai i segreti dell'audiovisivo che ti permetteranno di essere indipendente nel creare i tuoi video per la tua realtà, divertendoti. In queste lezioni imparerai a realizzare video professionali e belli esteticamente rendendo la tua immagine e i tuoi contenuti funzionali alle tue esigenze. Per gestire i tuoi progetti in maniera serena ed efficace, affronteremo insieme tanti argomenti con un approccio interdisciplinare e con molto senso pratico, questo ci permetterà di essere diretti, brillanti e comprensibili da tutti.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
Vuoi avere altri contenuti oltre a quelli di questo corso?
Digita “Cool - Cristiana Raggi” nella barra di ricerca di Youtube, troverai tanti tutorial e risorse gratuite dedicati alle tecniche del public speaking / parlare in pubblico e alla dizione.
E ancora corsi, esercizi, consigli per vincere la paura e la timidezza di parlare davanti ad altre persone: dagli amici, sino alle grandi platee. Ogni mese rispondo alle domande e dubbi degli iscritti con un video che entra nel programma del corso.
Iscriviti e non perdere nessun aggiornamento per capire come usare la voce al meglio, in ogni occasione.
target_audience: A chi vuole imparare in un unico corso le basi tecniche dell'audiovisivo.
Chiunque abbia bisogno di imparare ad utilizzare al meglio il linguaggio audiovisivo per proporre la propria professionalità al meglio.
Imprenditori, insegnanti, medici, liberi professionisti...
Youtuber, blogger, influencer...

courses.description:
Building a personal brand will earn you more money, give you better career options and make you virtually unemployment proof.
Yet most of us depend on strategies devised in the 1980s rather than utilize some of the new networks and technologies that exist today.
Learn how to turn your passions into a well recognized brand from a best selling book author and Forbes columnist that has done it himself. Mark will walk through the process of identifying and growing your personal brand, including building a powerful network, developing thought leadership, creating compelling content, and connecting with influencers. Mark also pulls in the best ideas from some of the most influential people in business today and presents it in an easy to follow and easy to execute style.
In this course Mark shares the latest strategies and technologies, with a focus on what is practically important and useful for developing a personal brand.
Among the topics you will learn:

By building a recognizable personal brand, you'll find that opportunities find you effortlessly. Whether it's at work or at play, you will literally become a magnet for the opportunities you're most interested in.
So are you ready to get started?
Do you want to become unemployment proof?

requirements: Khóa học hoàn toàn phù hợp với người mới bắt đầu. Nếu bạn chưa từng kể một câu chuyện chuyên nghiệp trước đây, đừng lo lắng – chúng tôi sẽ hướng dẫn bạn từng bước để tự tin và thành thạo hơn. Hãy bắt đầu hành trình kể chuyện của bạn mà không lo ngại bất kỳ rào cản nào!
courses.description:
Bạn đã bao giờ nghe một câu chuyện khiến bạn cảm thấy xúc động, được truyền cảm hứng, hoặc muốn thay đổi cách bạn nhìn nhận một điều gì đó chưa? Storytelling chính là một trong những công cụ mạnh mẽ nhất để làm điều đó.
Khóa học này được thiết kế dành cho những người mới bắt đầu nhưng muốn học cách sử dụng câu chuyện để giao tiếp tốt hơn, tạo dấu ấn cá nhân và ảnh hưởng đến người khác.
Hãy tưởng tượng mỗi câu chuyện bạn kể giống như việc mở ra một cuốn sách, và ánh sáng bên trong cuốn sách chính là những ý tưởng, cảm xúc, và kết nối mà bạn tạo ra.
Trong suốt hành trình này, chúng ta sẽ cùng nhau khám phá sức mạnh của storytelling – từ cách xây dựng một câu chuyện hấp dẫn, làm chủ cảm xúc, đến việc sử dụng giọng nói, ánh mắt và cử chỉ để trình bày câu chuyện hiệu quả. Nhưng điều quan trọng nhất mà bạn đã học được là: Storytelling không chỉ là một kỹ năng, mà còn là một cách để bạn tạo ra sự kết nối, cảm hứng, và thay đổi tích cực trong cuộc sống và công việc.
Vậy, các bạn đã sẵn sàng để mở ra cuốn sách của chính mình chưa? Hãy bắt đầu ngay nhé!
target_audience: Nếu bạn muốn học cách kể những câu chuyện đầy cảm xúc, kết nối mạnh mẽ với người khác, và để lại dấu ấn trong lòng khán giả, khóa học này chính là dành cho bạn. Hãy tham gia và bắt đầu hành trình kể chuyện của mình ngay hôm nay!

Khóa học hoàn toàn phù hợp với người mới bắt đầu. Nếu bạn chưa từng kể một câu chuyện chuyên nghiệp trước đây, đừng lo lắng – chúng tôi sẽ hướng dẫn bạn từng bước để tự tin và thành thạo hơn. Hãy bắt đầu hành trình kể chuyện của bạn mà không lo ngại bất kỳ rào cản nào!

courses.bio: Stil Danışmanlığı, İmaj Danışmanlığı, Renk Danışmanlığı, Styling
objectives: Özgün Bir Stil Oluşturmak
Vücut ve Yüz Şeklimizi Tanımak
Cilt Alt Tonumuzu Öğrenerek Renklerimizi Bulmak
Gardırop Düzenleme ve Alışveriş Tüyoları
Kişisel İmajımızı Güçlendirmek

İmaj ve Stil/Moda: Stil Nedir? Stil ve Moda Farkı

requirements: Modayı değil, kendini taşımak isteyenler herkes için...
Kişisel imajını güçlendirmek isteyenler için...
Moda tasarım, stilistlik, modelistlik eğitimlerinden mezun olanlar için...
courses.description:
Moda endüstrisinin dikte ettiği "trend ve moda" olan akımları değil de kendini dönüştürmeyi, yaratmayı, yansıtmayı amaçlayan herkes için.
Stil danışmanı, imaj danışmanı, gardırop danışmanı, kişisel alışveriş danışmanı, hediye danışmanı gibi alanlarda kendini geliştirmek isteyenler için.
Stil, içten dışa bazen ise dıştan içe bir olgudur. Siz, konuşmasanız da stiliniz konuşur. Stil sahibi olmak, güçlü bir imajın olmazsa olmazıdır. Stiliniz, görünüşünüzün üslubudur. Stil sahibi olmak ve stil sahibi kalmak bir süreçtir. Ve bu eğitimde, tüm gereken teorik bilgileri bulabileceksiniz...
Bu eğitimden sonra vücudunuzun tipini ve şeklini, yüz şeklinizi, cilt alt tonunuzu, size uygun olan renkleri, moda kimliğinizi, giyim stilinizi, size göre olan kokuyu bulabileceksiniz. Evrensel giyim kodlarını öğrenerek, davetlere daha bilinçli katılacaksınız. Renkleri nasıl kombin edebileceğinizi öğreneceksiniz. Giyinme tüyolarıyla daha bilinçli seçimler yapabileceksiniz. Yatırım gardırobu oluşturma ve akıllı alışveriş hakkında bilgiler edineceksiniz.


Bu kursta detaylarıyla:
1. İmaj Nedir?
2. Stil ve Moda Nedir?
3. Vücut Tipleri ve Şekilleri
4. Yüz Şekilleri ve Aksesuar Seçimleri
5. Renk Bilgisi ve Renk Kombinleri
6. Mevsimsel Cilt Analizi | Renklerinizi Bulmak
7. Moda Kimlikleri, Giyim Tarzları ve Kodları
8. Nasıl Giyinmeli?
9. Koku ve Parfüm | Parfüm Seçimi
10. Gardırop Düzenleme ve Akıllı Alışveriş


Kursun içinde çeşitli testler, ödevler ve detaylı ders notları da olacak.
Şimdiden iyi dersler :)

courses.title: How to Build a Successful Political Brand
courses.bio: Political Branding
requirements: No previous skills or experience needed. This course gives you all the details you need to know about the topic!
courses.description:
A brand is the “name, term, design, symbol, or a combination of them, intended to identify the goods or services of one seller or group of sellers and to differentiate them from competitors” (Khan, 2009). It can be considered as a seller’s promise to deliver a specific set of features, benefits, and services consistently to the buyers.
Brand, as a term, has become so popular. It is used not only for goods, services, corporations, organizations, and celebrities but also for cities, nations, and even private individuals.
With the boom of commercial marketing tools and techniques, political leaders are today treated just like brands!
This Political Branding program will assist you in creating and ‘selling’ a perfect political brand to the public.
This program is composed of a theoretical and a practical part.
The theoretical part includes a brief introduction to the concept of branding and a detailed definition of political branding and rebranding, and numerous branding elements and concepts. Additionally, this part provides a detailed process to brand a political figure successfully.
The practical tools part offers you many must-ask questions that will help you develop an extraordinary political brand.
This program along with its case studies will be your perfect guide to brand successfully and lead effectively!
target_audience: Passionate about Branding and Politics

The Secrets To Passion Monetization


The Secrets to Passion Monetization is a transformative course designed to provide clear answers to your questions and equip you with lasting strategies to create a unique personal brand.


Discovering the secrets of self-fulfillment requires dedication, including generating ideas, building self-confidence, pursuing your passions, conducting research, continuously seeking knowledge, embracing creativity, and so much more.


A heartfelt acknowledgment goes to God Almighty and to all the digital creators who have harnessed their passions to educate and inspire others through social media. May God bless you abundantly for your impact—Amen.


Success often overshadows the struggles behind it. People celebrate your achievements but rarely inquire about the journey that led there. This course is born out of my own experiences, and I’m sharing it to inspire and empower others to achieve their goals.


Unleash your potential and build your legacy by turning your passion into action. Every day, countless opportunities await online that align with your interests and talents. Learn how to identify these opportunities, stand out, and brand yourself effectively. The world is eagerly waiting for you to showcase your unique gifts.


This course is dedicated to all those who are passionate about using their knowledge to make a positive impact on the world. Let’s turn your passion into a lasting legacy.
