courses.description:
Confidence: Techniques for Personal Impact
Personal branding: keys to unforgettable presence and energy


Are nerves or insecurity holding you back from making meaningful connections? Today you can learn the tools to overcome those barriers, fostering stronger relationships and facilitating positive change in your professional and personal life.


Welcome to your guide to building an unforgettable presence and energy in professional and personal situations. Led by renowned expert Zara Mandalia, this course empowers you to become a standout individual who effortlessly commands attention and leaves a lasting impression.


Through a structured process, you'll explore three learnable "superpowers" – Self-Awareness, Understanding Others, and Mental Resilience – which combine to form the acronym IMPACT. These powers are your roadmap to transformative change, helping you harness your inner energy and project it outward to captivate everyone you encounter. You'll also gain insights into your individual strengths, and learn how to navigate the spectrum between introversion and extroversion. Zara empowers you to maximise the impact your life makes, and leverage your unique qualities for maximum effect.


Zara is a trained and certified Life & Performance Coach and Psychometric Personality Profiler who has worked with hundreds of clients globally. She's trained in counselling skills and positive psychology leading to her producing courses covering human behaviour, emotional intelligence and how we can have better impact on our own and others’ lives.


Discover the nuances of mental resilience, adaptability, and assertiveness, essential skills for navigating today's competitive business landscape. Whether you're looking to grow your business, advance your career, or simply improve your work and personal relationships, this course offers practical strategies to help you thrive.


Sign up to "Confidence: Techniques for Personal Impact" today and unlock your full potential as a confident, influential leader in your field. The world is waiting for your brilliance – are you ready?

courses.title: 自分らしさを輝かせるファッション講座：起業家のためのセルフブランディング入門
courses.bio: 「現状と目標の把握」をもとに、「似合うもの診断」「ファッションの基礎知識」を通じて、「TPOに合わせた理想のスタイル」を自分自身で構築
objectives: ファッションにもきちんとした理論があります。基本的な知識を身につければ、流行に振り回されずに、自分らしいスタイルを考えてつくれるようになります。
色や形、素材、シルエットなど、洋服選びに必要な診断をすべて講座の中で体験できるので、他で診断を受けなくても“本当に似合う”が手に入ります。
コーディネートはもちろん、ワードローブの整え方やシーンに合ったスタイルづくり、魅せ方のテクニックまで、ブランディングに必要なノウハウをトータルで身につけられます
「ビジネスだけでなく日常の装いも、ただ似合うだけでなく“心にしっくりくる”心地よさがあるから、装うことが自然と楽しくなります。。

パート1: 自分を知る基礎: レクチャー1: コース概要と自己紹介：服選びの哲学「服選び＝生き方」
レクチャー2: 自己分析：外見と内面から現在の自分を知る
レクチャー3: お洒落に魅せる要素とは：憧れの人から学ぶ

レクチャー2: 色の心理的効果と見え方：色が与える印象とイメージ戦略

requirements: "このコースには特別なスキルや経験は必要ありません。 ボトム・トップスなど基本的なファッション用語を知っていれば、どなたでも学べる内容になっています。  講座の中で簡単なワークをやっていただきますので、 ・パソコンを使わない人は、ペンとノート、そして切り貼りしても良いファッション雑誌など ・パソコンを使える人は、サイトを検索したり、PawerPointで画像挿入や文字入力ができる  このような準備をして頂くと、スムーズに受講していただけます。 "
courses.description:
この講座では、外見と内面の自己分析を通じて「本当に自分に似合うファッション」を見つけ出し、理想の自分をカタチにしていくセルフブランディングを学びます。




外見や体型、顔立ちといった特徴だけでなく、なりたい人物像をもとに、服の選び方に表れるご自身の価値観まで深く掘り下げていきます。




講座内では、パーソナルカラーや骨格診断に加え、似合う柄や素材、襟元の見せ方、色の心理効果など、さまざまな角度から「似合う」を分析。感覚ではなく、理論にもとづいたファッションの見極め方を身につけます。




さらに後半では、それまでに学んだ知識とテクニックを活かし、スタイリングの組み立て方やワードローブの揃え方、写真映えする見せ方まで丁寧に解説。外見を通じた自己表現に、しっかりとした戦略性を持たせていきます。




「洋服はその人の人生を語る」と言われるように、自分自身を装いで表現できる力は、一生の財産です。


この講座でスタイリングの基礎を身につけ、自分らしい人生をファッションで描く第一歩を踏み出してみませんか。
target_audience: これから起業する人や起業したてでセルフブランディングを必要としている人
今の仕事での自分の魅せ方を変えたい人
お金を掛けずに自分で（見た目を）セルフブランディングしたい人

At the end of this course you will understand the A,B,C, & D of your Professional / Personal Brand and how critiically important it is to your success at all times.
requirements: What students will need before enrolling is first a completely open mind and ability to accept things as they are not as they should be. Also, know what's in your personal wardrobe so you can be make the best decisions possible for the outcome you want to achieve.
courses.description: Ladies & Gentlemen this course will improve your confidence and also have a wardrobe that's both incredible and multifuncition all at the same time. From average to fabulous in 15 or less without spending a small fortune. In this course you will learn the basics on style and the only materials you'll need is an open mind, pen, and paper.  More importantly you will learn the A, B, C, D of professional/personal dress and just how much it effects everything your life.  This is a real world structured course that will allow students to immediately begin to use the knowledge they gain from each course in their every day lives.
target_audience: Take this course if you want to improve your first impressions and increase your chances of winning. If you believe you already know how to, and have the data proof that, you know how best to market yourself then this course isn't for you. It's for the other 95% of the population.

Who should not take this course? If you are close minded and really know you dislike the fact that a persons appearance can make or break any situation. It won't matter what I teach here if you are not willing to learn.  Also if you are a part of that 3%-5% of the population that already has a well defined personal brand.  Think of people like Marilyn Manson, Jimi Hendrix, or anyone who would fall into that category. However, they are proof that personal branding works.

requirements: 自分が商品化したい専門分野で3年以上の経験があること
courses.description:
なぜ「自分商品化プロジェクト」を公開したかというと、自分を商品化する力、言い換えると自分で稼ぐ力を身につけることが、先が見えない今を生き抜くために欠かせないと考えたからです。
一部上場企業など大きな組織に属していても、世の中の情勢が変われば一生安泰とはいえません。
昨今のコロナウイルス感染拡大のように、全く予想していなかった事態に遭遇しても生き残るためには、自分で稼ぐ力を身につけて発揮する必要があります。
そのために必要なコツとノウハウを「自分商品化プロジェクト」として体系化しました。

自分商品化プロジェクトは3部構成です。
第1部：知る
第2部：作る
第3部：伝える

なぜ、第1部を「知る」にしたかというと、自分の商品化に必要な強みを見つけるために最初に取り組む必要があるのが「知る」だと考えたからです。
とくに自分とお客さま、この2つをよく「知る」ことで商品に変わる強みが見つけやすくなります。
なお、「第2部：作る」と「第3部：伝える」は自分収益化プロジェクトという講座名で公開しています。

レクチャーはご自身が学びやすいスタイルを選べるように動画版とテキスト（文字）版の2パターンを用意しました。
紹介しているレクチャーを順番にやる必要はありません。
ご自身のやりやすいものから取り組んでくださってOKです。

自分商品化プロジェクト「知る～あなたの価値がお金に変わる6つのレッスン～」一緒に取り組んでまいりましょう。

courses.title: The Ultimate Personal Branding
courses.bio: Step-by-step practical system for building a strong, unique, and memorable brand for entrepreneurs and professionals
objectives: Personal Branding
Expert Image
Brand Management
Career Management
Career Development
Business Branding
Professional Image
Executive Presence
Self-confidence
requirements: Be able to watch the lectures and download the worksheets.
Have an open mindset to explore and live your full potential
Openness and courage to being seen in new ways
Willingness to put some time and effort into shaping your brand
courses.description:
Master your Personal Branding strategy with this easy step-by-step system for building a strong, unique, and memorable brand. Learn how to utilize your professional equity and assets to leverage your expert image, and advance in your career.
What do You get?
This course contains 15 episodes, over 70-minute video lectures and complementary worksheets to help you reflect on your brand and put the branding strategy on paper. The course is based on years of practice with individual clients and group workshops. All materials come from the trainer's "Ultimate Personal Branding Workbook".
Is this course for You?
The course is designed for entrepreneurs and professionals that want to build a strong, recognizable brand, and leverage their professional image and build better meaningful relations in business and life.
What methodology is used?
We will follow the author's Personal Branding 3D+ methodology divided into 3 parts: Discover, Define and Deliver
– Discover: focused on the assessment of your brand attributes, skills, strengths, weaknesses, personality traits etc.
– Define: focused on defining your professional goals, your message, audience and channels of communication
– Deliver: focused on planning the cohesive exposure for your brand (online and offline) and career planning
Additionally, the course offers an introduction to the topic of Personal Branding and Executive Image.
target_audience: young professionals
experts
public speakers
starting entrepreneurs
coaches
solo  entrepreneurs
executives
sales executives
looking for new job
looking to accelerate your career

This course covers business communication, positive confident body language at the workplace.
The course covers listening in communication, Vocal Communication and Conversational skills, Social skills and more.
You will be able to successfully adapt a professional look, behaviour and professionalism at the workplace.

Introduction: Overview of the Course The Professional Edge - Series I and Series II

requirements: The course is highly interactive with learning and engaging activities and instructor led training videos, audio visuals, action plans and quizzes.  You will need to keep a note pad and pen handy.
This course has been designed to give you a complete 'Think-Feel-Do' experience as you proceed.
courses.description:
This is a value packed course for young professionals, especially for those who are about to start work soon. Also, this course is for business professionals who need to enhance themselves professionally. This course is available in two series. Series II covers The importance of Communication at the workplace, Listening in Communication, Speaking in Communication, Body Language and Rapport building at the workplace, Vocal Communication, Conversation Starters, Professional behaviour on social media, Positive Attitude at the workplace, etc. At the end of the course, you will be able to successfully begin to communicate professionally using the learning from the course and regular practice. This course has been designed to give you a complete 'Think-Feel-Do' experience as you proceed. There are video lessons, quizzes, practice activities based on what is taught in the course and action plans, that will help you chalk out your new path after completion of this course.
On completion of the course, you will be awarded a certificate.
Remember to check the drop-down menu in each section of the curriculum. This will give you a glimpse of the chapters that have been lined up for you. Doing the course in a sequential manner and attempting all the quizzes and practice sessions will give you a holistic experience. You will also be able to check your understanding as you proceed in the course. Do not forget to look up Series I, too.
So, jump right in the course and enjoy the session.
Wish you the best!
Sandra Barros
Certified Image Management Consultant and Soft Skills Trainer
target_audience: This program will benefit Corporate or Business Professionals.
This program will benefit Job Ready or graduating students, Young Entrepreneurs and all individuals looking at building confidence and a professional image at the workplace.

courses.title: Quiromancia e o Aperto de Mãos
courses.bio: Aprenda a importância de um bom aperto de mãos.
requirements: Não é necessário ter pré requisitos
courses.description:
Este é um fragmento do meu curso completo de Leitura de Mãos, também publicado nesta plataforma, junto com outros que trazem variáveis sobre o mesmo tema principal. Trata-se de um pequeno deleite para que você possa melhorar a sua performance em entrevistas de empregos, em oportunidades de negócios, em encontros sociais e familiares, ou mesmo em novos relacionamentos afetivos. O curso traz exatamente aquela informação que a gente acha que já sabe, mas que se surpreende quando escuta o conteúdo mais detalhado, sob a ótica milenar da quiromancia.
Entenda o que o outro espera de você, e performe melhor em sua próxima entrevista de trabalho. Conheça a essência, a natureza das pessoas em poucos segundos, apenas durante o aperto de mãos. Profissionais de RH podem identificar a personalidade de seus entrevistados, e ver se eles estão sendo sinceros nas entrevistas, assim como quem está participando de um processo seletivo pode entender o que o entrevistador "quer ouvir"...
É fundamental entender que não é necessário ter "dons", fazer parte de um grupo étnico, ou estar associado a religiões específicas. Qualquer pessoa pode aprender a identificar a personalidade através do aperto de mãos.  Um mundo novo vai se abrir diante dos seus olhos.


“Linhas não são escritas nas mãos humanas sem razão, elas vêm de influências celestiais e da própria individualidade do homem”
Aristóteles


“Muitas vezes as mãos resolverão um mistério com o qual o intelecto lutou em vão.”
Carl Jung
target_audience: Para todas as pessoas interessadas. Você não precisa ter um "dom" ou "talento" espiritual para isso

requirements: مفيش أي خبرة سابقة مطلوبة... الكورس معمول مخصوص علشان يساعدك تبدأ من الصفر وتبني لنفسك اسم على لينكدإن بأسلوب بسيط وعملي.
courses.description:
الكورس ده معمول مخصوص لكل حد نفسه يبني براند شخصي قوي على لينكدإن ويبرز نفسه بطريقة صح ومميزة، ويخلي الناس تفتكره وتفتكر شغله، ويفتح لنفسه أبواب ماكانش يتخيلها.
لو انت:
طالب أو لسه متخرج وعايز تخطف فرص عمل وتبان قدام الناس صح
محترف جديد في سوق الشغل وعايز تبني حضورك وتفتح لنفسك أبواب فرص أكتر
فريلانسر وعايز تكسب عملاء وتوسع شبكتك وتثبت وجودك في مجالك
مش عارف تبدأ إزاي تبني البروفايل بتاعك أو تعمل محتوى يخلي الناس تلاحظك وتثق فيك
أو حتى لو حاسس إن موضوع البراندينج معقد ومش عارف تأخد الخطوة الأولى بسبب الزحمة أو قلة الوقت
يبقى الكورس ده معمول ليك يا فزلـــــوك!
هتعرف إزاي تبني بروفايل علي لينكدان يشد الانتباه ويبين شغلك ومشاريعك بطريقة تخلي أي حد يقرأ يفتكر إسمك، وكمان هتتعلم تكتب محتوى بسيط وواضح يعبر عنك ويوصل فكرتك بسهولة، من غير ما تحس إنك محتاج تكون كاتب محترف أو عندك آلاف المتابعين.
هتعرف إزاي تتعامل مع الناس على لينكدإن، تبني علاقات حقيقية، وتفتح لنفسك فرص شغل وتدريب وتعاونات وعلاقات قوية تفرق في مستقبلك.
الكورس مش معقد ولا نظري، كله عملي وسهل، متقسم على خطوات واضحة وبأسلوب بسيط، من قلب حد زيك فاهم ظروفك وحابب يساعدك تبني نفسك صح، وتبدأ تشتغل على صورتك قدام العالم.
لو نفسك تفرق في عالم لينكدإن وتوصل لمستوى تاني… يبقى أنت في المكان الصح.
ابدأ الرحلة دي دلوقتي وخليك فزلوك
target_audience: طالب وعايز تبرز مهاراتك وتعزز ظهورك علي لينكدان

courses.title: How to Build a Strong Personal Brand: A step by step guide
courses.bio: Learn how to create a strong personal brand for yourself, leading to more opportunities and more influence
objectives: After taking this course you will understand personal branding and the importance of it. You'll understand how to setup your own platforms and digital footprint. You'll understand the offline aspects to personal brand and how you can leverage opportunities from them.
requirements: None. All you need is the enthusiasm and passion to improve your own personal brand
courses.description:
Your personal brand is what people say about you when you're not in the room - Jeff Bezos, Amazon
Having started my own company at the age of 19 and never worked for anyone else, I've successfully built and used my personal brand to drive company growth over the 20 years we've been in business. We are now a team of just under 20 turning over just shy of a million GBP a year. Much of that growth can be attributable to opportunities I've developed through my own brand.
I've been a blogger since the mid 2000's and run my own YouTube channel which in one single year I uploaded entrepreneurship tips every day for a complete year. I've been coaching and speaking all over the UK and Europe on the topic of personal branding for the last five years and this course is an amalgamation of the main areas I cover time and time again.
I guest lecture on Exeter and London Business School MBA programs as well as teaching students up and down the country how to develop and use their own brand value to increase their chances of employability.
I'm incredibly passionate about this subject and regularly use stories that have come from my very own journey.
target_audience: Anybody who wishes to use their personal brand to get ahead in life. It might be that you're searching for that perfect job, or generate more opportunities for your business or be seen as the expert in your field. These are all areas which this course will help you with

courses.title: Tunne ennast - kes ma olen ja mida päriselt tahan teha?
courses.bio: Avasta enda anded ja tugevused
objectives: Mõista paremini enda tegelikku olemust
Loo ülevaade enda elus toimuvast ja vajalikest muudatustest
Loo selgust enda oskustes ja annetes
Loo nägemus, mida päriselt tahad enda elus teha
requirements: Valmidus teha kaasa harjutusi ja kirjutada iseenda kohta
courses.description:
See kursus aitab Sul õppida tundma iseennast - mõista, mis on Sul hästi välja tuleb ning mida tahad päriselt teha. Kuna vastused peituvad Sinus endas, ei ütle see kursus, mida peaksid enda eluga peale hakkama, vaid aitab küsida õigeid küsimusi, et saaksid iseendas selgusele jõuda. Siit leiad küsimused ja harjutused, mille abil enda andeid ja huvisid mõista ning oma kutsumust avastada.
Kursuse lisamaterjalidest saad laadida alla spetsiaalse töövihiku, kus loovharjutuste abil enda mõtted ja tunded sõnadesse panna. Kirjutamine loob selguse ning ühtlasi on hea materjal, mille juurde tagasi pöörduda, kui enda suund ja kirg kipub argitoimetuste käes hägusaks muutuma.
Kursusel käsitleme:
Kuidas mõista, kes ma olen?
Kuidas leida enda anded ja tunda ära see oma rada?
Kuidas unistada ja luua köitev tulevikuvisioon?
Millised harjumused toetavad enda tundmaõppimist?
Millised piirangud hoiavad meid tagasi ja kuidas neid ületada?
Kursus sisaldab:
2 tundi videoloenguid
Alla laetavad slaidid
Alla laetav helisalvestus kogu kursusest
Alla laetav (ja prinditav) töövihik harjutuste tegemiseks
Kursuse juhendaja Harald Lepisk on loova eneseteostuse uurija ja koolitaja. Haraldil on üle 14 aasta koolitamiskogemust enam kui 1000 õppesündmusel 18 riigis. Tema e-kursustel on üle 20 000 õpilase enam kui 160 riigist üle maailma. Ta on Inspiratsioon_ee arengukeskkonna looja, "Elu looming" taskuhäälingu saatejuht ja raamatu "Minu elu kutse" kaasautor.
Sinus on peidus erakordsed anded. Ära jäta maailma sellest kingitusest ilma. Avasta oma kutsumus ja rakenda tegelik potentsiaal.
target_audience: Keskkooli ja kõrgkooli õppijatele
Töötavale inimesele, kes soovib teha "kirehooldust" ehk vaadata üle, milliseid muutusi enda elu ja karjäärivalikutes teha

courses.bio: Promuovi il tuo Brand con efficacia e stile realizzando autonomamente i tuoi video di presentazione
objectives: Comprendere l'importanza della promozione personale per il proprio business
Definire la tua unicità e imparare a comunicarla efficacemente online
Seguire lo stile comunicativo di altri influencer

Fondamenti dell'Identitá Personale: Comprendere l'importanza della promozione personale per il proprio business
Definire la tua unicità e imparare a comunicarla efficacemente online
Seguire lo stile comunicativo di altri influencer
Trovare il giusto equilibrio tra esser se stessi e adattarsi al proprio pubblico
Tecniche di Storytelling per la Promozio: Approfondire l'arte del racconto per coinvolgere il nostro pubblico
Luce, Camera, Azione!: Come gestire autonomamente la luce in scena
Strategie Efficaci sui Social Media: Come scegliere le piattaforme giuste per il proprio pubblico
Affrontare le Sfide e le Critiche: Sviluppare la fiducia in se stessi e affrontare le critiche in modo costruttivo

requirements: Non é necessario nessun requisiti specifico, ma per poter mettere in pratica le lezione del corso é fondamentale avere almeno uno strumento di ripresa (Smartphone o Fotocamera) e una minima conoscenza dell'editing video.
courses.description:
Sei un imprenditore? Hai un'attività commerciale? Sei un libero professionista? Hai un'idea di business che vuoi sviluppare? Se la risposta a una di queste domande è "sì", allora è fondamentale che tu impari a promuovere efficacemente te stesso e il tuo business sui social media. In un'epoca in cui la presenza online è cruciale per il successo di qualsiasi iniziativa, sapersi distinguere e comunicare il proprio valore è più importante che mai.
Il videocorso che ti presentiamo rappresenta l'opportunità perfetta per acquisire queste competenze indispensabili. Ti guiderò personalmente attraverso l'arte dell'autopromozione, mostrandoti come creare contenuti accattivanti che catturino l'attenzione del tuo pubblico, gestire la tua presenza online in modo efficace e promuovere il tuo brand personale in modo che risuoni con la tua audience.
Imparerai strategie e tecniche testate per aumentare la tua visibilità, coinvolgere il tuo pubblico e costruire una community fedele attorno al tuo brand. Questo corso è progettato per darti gli strumenti e la conoscenza per navigare con sicurezza nel mondo dei social media, permettendoti di mettere in luce il tuo unico valore e di distinguerti dalla concorrenza.
Non avrai bisogno di affidarti a specialisti esterni perché ti fornirò tutte le competenze per gestire in autonomia la tua immagine e la tua comunicazione online. Che tu stia iniziando da zero o che tu voglia migliorare la tua strategia attuale, questo videocorso è il trampolino di lancio che ti aiuterà a raggiungere i tuoi obiettivi con sicurezza ed efficacia.
target_audience: Questo corso é rivolto a chiunque debba creare dei contenuti per una propria identitá personale o aziendale.

courses.title: Marcas personales
courses.bio: Desarrolla tu marca personal y posiciónate en el mercado
requirements: No se necesita experiencia previa en marketing. Aprenderás todo lo que necesitas saber para promover tu mejor activo: ¡Tu persona!
courses.description:
En este curso de Marcas personales aprenderás todo lo que necesitas saber para vender tu mayor activo: ¡Tu persona!


En la actualidad muchas personas están intentando participar en el mundo de los negocios, muchas veces a través de una propia iniciativa o emprendimiento. Para lograr sobresalir o diferenciarte de los demás hay que anticiparte al mercado y tomar la delantera, el objetivo siempre será ir 5 pasos adelante que la competencia.


El primer paso para crear una marca personal es conocer sus bases, de que se compone, como construirla y que tomar en cuenta para iniciar a promoverla de la mejor manera. Iniciaremos con definir como es que queremos participar en el mundo de los negocios:
• Inventor
• Emprendedor
• Intrapreneur
• Equipo de soporte
• Solopreneur
• Influencer
• Ventas
• CEO / Fundador


Posteriormente para desarrollar tu marca personal es necesario tomar en cuenta todo nuestro alrededor, como nos visualizamos nosotros mismos y lo que la gente piensa y ve de nosotros, para conformar un todo más completo.


Sabiendo esto aprenderás a construir tu mensaje principal, es decir que es lo que te mueve, cuál es tu meta o el objetivo de la construcción de tu marca personal y que va a aportar a la comunidad.
Otro de los puntos a tomar en cuenta es definir que imagen vas a mostrar al público, para que esta sea consistente y constante a lo largo del tiempo, logrando que se vuelva parte de tu esencia en todos los lugares en los que expongas.
Por último, aprenderás a cómo llegar a la audiencia indicada y por el canal adecuado. La correcta combinación de canales ayudara a que tu comunidad se fortalezca con mayor rapidez.


Recuerda que no solo es necesario una exposición constante en los medios que seleccionaste previamente, sino que también el contenido que generes debe de ser de valor e interés para tu mercado meta, por lo que estructurar una estrategia global de comunicación será ideal para poner todo lo aprendido en marcha.


¡Comencemos!
target_audience: Lideres: Toda persona que desee posicionarse dentro de un ámbito de conocimiento como experto
Emprendedores: Fundadores de un negocio, iniciativo u ONG
Profesionistas de mercadotecnia, comunicación o relaciones públicas que requieran el conocimiento para posicionar a un cliente o a sí mismo.

courses.title: Cómo triunfar en LinkedIn después de tus 40
courses.bio: Haz de tu experiencia, tu fortaleza.
requirements: Tener una cuenta de LinkedIn... y muchas ganas de romper estereotipos para sacarle todo el provecho!
courses.description:
Este curso está diseñado para profesionales de 40 años o más que desean aprender a usar LinkedIn estratégicamente para potenciar su carrera. Reconocemos el esfuerzo y la dedicación que has invertido en tu carrera y entendemos el valor que tu experiencia acumulada aporta. Nuestro enfoque se centra en enseñarte a utilizar esta experiencia de manera estratégica en LinkedIn, especialmente a través de la publicación de contenido fácil y rápido. Además, ofrecemos dos bonos adicionales para optimizar tu perfil y ampliar tu comprensión sobre LinkedIn, ayudándote a convertirte en una autoridad en tu campo.


Objetivos del Curso:


Estrategia de publicaciones en LinkedIn: Te enseñaremos a compartir contenido que refleje tu trayectoria y experiencia, mostrando cómo tu valor profesional aumenta con los años, en tan solo 5 días.
Inicio rápido en publicaciones: Proporcionarte un paso a paso para que comiences a publicar en LinkedIn, aprovechando tu experiencia y conocimientos. Es el primer paso para iniciar tu presencia digital.
Valor de LinkedIn en tu carrera profesional: Ayudarte a entender cómo LinkedIn es una herramienta clave para impulsar tu carrera, destacándote como una autoridad en tu industria.


Beneficios del Curso:


Aprenderás a utilizar tus años de experiencia para crear una presencia digital que proyecte autoridad.
Podrás combatir el edadismo en el ambiente laboral, utilizando LinkedIn para cambiar la narrativa y mostrar tu valía.
Conectarás con otros profesionales, compartirás tus logros y demostrarás que tu experiencia es invaluable.
Sabrás cómo posicionarte en LinkedIn como una autoridad gracias a tu edad.
Tendrás tus primeros posts para publicar listos cuando termines este curso.


Este curso te proporcionará los conocimientos necesarios para hacer de LinkedIn un aliado en tu desarrollo profesional. Es tu oportunidad de demostrar que tu larga trayectoria es una fortaleza y no un impedimento. ¡Aprovecha tu momento y destaca en el mundo digital!
target_audience: Profesionales experimentados cuya edad parece ser un problema para quienes contratan, pero que en realidad están listos para posicionarse online como los expertos que son offline para cambiar esa percepción errónea.

courses.title: 守山菜穂子×笠原なつみ『好きを仕事にするパーソナルブランディング』〜会社員から独立起業するってどういう感じ？全て話します
courses.bio: ～会社員から独立起業した２人の著者が、 成功と失敗の裏側、お金の話、 ぜんぶ話します！～
objectives: 好きなこと・得意なことを仕事にして生きていくポイント
パーソナルブランディングの重要性
独⽴起業して成功するコツ
独⽴起業してからの失敗事例
売り上げや利益の作り方
本の出版に向けてどう取り組めば良いのか

好きを仕事にする パーソナルブランディング: 【テーマ1】２⼈は、どうやって会社員から独⽴したの？
【テーマ2】好きを仕事にしたいなら、 ブランディングで圧倒的な差がつく理由
【テーマ3】独⽴起業して成功したポイント・売り上げや利益はどのように作っているの？
【テーマ4】独⽴起業してからの失敗の裏側
【テーマ5】どうやって著者になったの？本を出すまでのエピソード
【テーマ6】さらに「好きを仕事に」！これからの夢、やってみたいこと
【ボーナスレクチャー】講座のレジュメ: 【ボーナスレクチャー】講座のレジュメ
ボーナスセクション：守山菜穂子の書籍『選ばれる人になる「パーソナル・ブランディン: 【ボーナスセクション】守山菜穂子の書籍『選ばれる人になる「パーソナル・ブランディング」の教科書』紹介ムービー

requirements: 起業や事業立ち上げの経験は不要です。必要なマインドや考え方を学習できます。
courses.description:
大手マスコミ企業から38歳で独立した守山菜穂子さん。
10年間に渡り、毎年50以上のセミナー・企業研修・講演に登壇するなど、指名が相次いでいます。また超大手企業からの指名のコンサルティング依頼が後をたたず、ビジネスは絶好調といった様子。


一方、大学事務をしていた25歳のときに白血病を患い、28歳で埼玉から香川へ移住して、料理家になった笠原なつみさん。
30歳すぎて乳製品アレルギーになった経験から「しんどい」「お疲れ気味」の心に寄り添う、優しいレシピとエッセイをお届けし、幅広い世代から人気を博しています。
さらには自身が主宰する料理教室「ふんわり糀家」では多数の講師を養成し、2024年には、2つの出版社から2冊の本を立て続けに発売。さらにブログプラットフォーム「note」の発信を資産にする使い方を教えるなど、料理家の枠を超え、ビジネスの才覚も発揮。


しかし有名でもない、取り立てて華やかな容姿や、特別な人脈がある訳でもない彼女たちが、
会社員から身一つで独立して、一体どのように成功の道を歩んだのか？
どこからどのようにお客様を得ているのか？
本イベントではその秘訣をお話しいただきます。


笠原なつみ著『人生「リセット」から「スタート」した「好き」を仕事にする生き方』（オレンジページ）と、
守山菜穂子著『選ばれる人になる「パーソナル・ブランディング」の教科書』（三笠書房）、
２冊の最新刊のエッセンスをギュッと詰め込んだスペシャルトークイベントです。


※この動画は、2024年7月4日に実施されたトークイベントのアーカイブです。
target_audience: 好きなこと・得意なことを仕事にして生きていきたいと考えている人
いつか起業したい、起業したばかり、起業したけれどまだ軌道に乗っていない人
起業後に成功するためのポイントを知りたい人
同業者と差がつくパーソナルブランディングについて知りたい人
起業後の売り上げや利益の作り方について知りたい人
将来、本を出版したい！と考えている人

courses.title: Creating your Professional Brand on LinkedIn
courses.bio: Your Professional Brand on LinkedIn can be a vital part of being discovered by your target audience.
objectives: Explore key areas of LinkedIn useful for Professional Branding activities.
Identify the best practices for sharing content on LinkedIn in different ways.
Discover different ways to engage with your LinkedIn Network and the best tactics for doing so.
Identify unique and new ways to engage with your target audience in order to build a stronger professional brand.

Introduction: Why is Social Engagement important on LinkedIn.
LinkedIn Branding Philosophies and Best: Using your LinkedIn Profile for Branding
Networking to build a Professional Brand
Preparing to Start Building your Brand through LinkedIn
Live view of LinkedIn and Branding Best: Branding with your LinkedIn Profile - Live View
Branding through your Providing Services page - Live view
Social Listening as a brand building tool - Live view
Curate or Create Content for LinkedIn - Live view
Branding through your LinkedIn Posts - Live View
Branding through Social Engagement - Live View
Branding through LinkedIn Messaging - Live View
Branding while Connecting on LinkedIn - Live View
Branding through LinkedIn Groups - Live View
Branding through LinkedIn Pages - Live View
Introduction to LinkedIn Creator Mode - Live view
Closing Remarks: Measuring your Professional Brand on LinkedIn - Live view

requirements: ach student will need to have basic computer skills, an understanding of web browsers, and basic website navigation skills to attend this course.
Each student will need to have a LinkedIn Profile (account) in order to participate in this course.
courses.description:
“It all starts with a Conversation”
Having a well-built LinkedIn Profile is an important first step when using LinkedIn as a business tool. Growing and continuing to grow a relevant LinkedIn Network is another important step.
However, these are only two of the important steps you need to fully create value using LinkedIn as a business tool.
The third step is to build a Professional Brand through engagement on LinkedIn.


As in any other area of our lives, including our careers and businesses, our brands and our reputations, are developed through our actions and words. When people see what we share, read our words, and see how we engage on LinkedIn, our personal and professional brand begins to develop, whether we like how it’s developing or not. Therefore, it becomes important to pay attention to what we are doing, saying, and engaging with on LinkedIn and beyond.


Our professional reputation is the backbone of our success in life, career, and business. Investing time to develop and manage this reputation is critical for us to continue achieving our career and business goals. This work extends beyond Face-Face, but also to our social media presence and engagement.
In this course, I will give you the foundation needed to develop your professional brand on LinkedIn and show you how to measure how your brand is developing.
We will look at the many different areas of LinkedIn and the related activities you can use to grow your professional brand.
target_audience: College students moving into their career journey.
Business Developers seeking stronger business relationships with their LinkedIn Network.
Business Professionals who want to discover new business opportunities throught LinkedIn.

requirements: 希望將自己的知識和經驗轉化為系統化課程，並通過教學創造額外收入的專業人士。
courses.description:
從零到一的聲音變現之路，一起成為受歡迎的聲音講師
無論你是完全沒有教學經驗的新手，還是已經具備一定教學經驗但希望進一步提升技能的從業者，我們的課程都專為你量身打造。我們深知成為一名優秀的講師需要多方面的技能，因此我們將從最基礎的知識入手，幫助你全面掌握講師所需的核心技能。課程涵蓋範圍廣泛，包括如何設計具有吸引力和結構性的課程內容、使用多樣化的教學方法來激發學生的學習興趣、以及如何有效管理課堂上的學生互動。此外，我們還會深入介紹線上教學技術，從選擇合適的教學平台到錄製高質量的課程影片，確保你能夠在網路時代中得心應手地授課。


通過系統化的學習和實戰演練，你將逐步建立自信，不僅學會如何打造吸引人的課程內容，還能有效地將你的專業知識傳遞給不同背景和學習風格的學生。我們的課程不僅僅是傳授理論知識，更強調實踐應用。我們將分享成功講師的實際案例和經驗，提供具體的操作步驟和策略，幫助你少走彎路。此外，你將有機會參與模擬教學環節，獲得即時反饋，讓你在教學的每一個階段都能夠持續進步。無論你的目標是成為專業講師，還是將教學作為提升個人品牌的一部分，我們的課程都將為你提供不可或缺的支持，讓你迅速成長為一名受歡迎且高效的講師。
target_audience: 想要分享專業知識和經驗，但不知道如何開始的人。
已經在進行內容創作（如播客、有聲書）的人，希望進一步利用教學作為變現方式。
想要通過教學創造額外收入的專業人士。
已經從事教育工作，希望提升線上教學能力並掌握更豐富的教學工具和技術。

requirements: A notepad & pen to take notes
An open mind to learn something new
courses.description:
Personal Branding– Attract Consistent Flow of Clients Without Spending Hours Freelancing!
Did you know that 92% of consumers trust an individual's branding over a company's?
The absence of a solid personal brand is more than just a missed opportunity.
But when it comes to personal branding, the road is highly unclear and you’d find yourself paralyzed by the first decision.
On top of that, you risk losing countless hours and wasting financial resources making blind efforts with zero returns in the form of leads.
Turns out…the road to becoming a social media influencer is more than just throwing random posts on your social media.
Without the right strategy in hand, you risk losing your voice in the noise, making content that doesn’t resonate, losing on potential clients and falling in the trap of misdirected efforts.
The Result?
Countless hours spent with little to no engagement, stagnant growth and builtup frustration.
If that wasn't enough, the grind of constant content creation can cause severe burnout, leading to inconsistent posts and waning audience engagement.
All these missteps can be contributed to reduced reach and engagement, further diminishing your brand's potential.
But with a detailed guidance on the right strategy to personal branding on Tiktok, Instagram or even YouTube, you can amplify your reach and influence, paving the way for a steady stream of new clients and growth in freelancing; all while spending LESS Time and Effort!


How Personal Branding Strategy can help you?


Efficiency and Focus: By understanding your brand's core message and audience, you eliminate the guesswork, ensuring every move is intentional and impactful.
Elevate Credibility: A consistent and authentic personal brand boosts your reputation as a Content Creator, making you the go-to social media influencer in your field.
Drive Organic Growth: A well-crafted brand strategy acts as a magnet, attracting followers, clients, and opportunities naturally, without the constant need for paid promotions.
Maximized ROI: Every content piece, every campaign, every interaction becomes an investment with assured returns, thanks to a clear branding strategy.
Resonate and Retain: Connect deeply with your audience, fostering loyalty and ensuring they become not just followers, but also brand advocates.
Safeguard Against Trends: While trends come and go, a strong personal brand remains resilient, ensuring your relevance in an ever-evolving digital landscape.


This means, saying goodbye to…


Wasted Resources: No more pouring time and money into tactics that don't yield results.
Audience Mismatch: Eliminate the frustration of your message falling on the wrong ears.
Stagnation and Burnout: Break free from the cycle of effort without progress and the exhausting content grind.
Inconsistent Branding: Say farewell to a disjointed brand image that confuses your audience.
Unpredictable Outcomes: End the era of hit-or-miss strategies.
Low Engagement and Reach: Overcome the barriers that keep your content from making the impact it deserves.


Master the Art of Personal Branding


In this comprehensive course, you will:


Discover Personal Branding Essentials: Dive deep into the world of personal brand creation, ensuring you stand out and make an impact.
Narrate Your Unique Story as a Content Creator: Harness the power of storytelling, crafting a narrative that sets you apart.
Harness Instagram and TikTok Marketing Techniques: Maximize your influence on the most dynamic social media platforms, including Instagram, Tiktok and YouTube, driving engagement and growth using proven methods.
Engage Your Target Audience on YouTube: Master secret techniques to identify and captivate your audience, turning casual viewers into loyal subscribers and fans.
Construct a Cohesive Personal Brand Image: From photographer to YouTuber, ensure consistent branding that enhances recognition and trust across platforms.
Strategize Like a Social Media Influencer: Understand the intricacies of major platforms, optimizing your content and strategy for maximum impact.
Leve-up your Freelancing with a Robust Brand: Learn how a strong personal brand can be a freelancer's most potent tool, attracting clients and establishing credibility.


Why Trust this Course?
Engaging & Dynamic Presentation: Unlike other courses, this course is delivered with genuine enthusiasm and engagement, ensuring participants remain attentive and inspired throughout– no more dozing while you watch!
Advanced & Structured Curriculum: Tailored for both new and seasoned professionals, our course content is carefully structured, avoiding repetition and offering relevant, actionable insights for all job grades.
Practical & Research-Driven: Our course is grounded in thorough research, presenting up-to-date industry knowledge. Beyond theory, we prioritize real-world applications, ensuring participants can immediately implement what they've learned.


This Course Is For You If:
You're an Aspiring Professional or Entrepreneur: Learn to craft a compelling personal brand that elevates your presence in any industry.
You're an Influencer or Content Creator: Master the art of resonating with audiences and navigating the intricacies of social media algorithms.
You're a Design Enthusiast: Dive deep into the visual elements that make a brand stand out.
You're Undergoing a Career Transition: Position yourself effectively and confidently with a strong personal brand.
You're Passionate About Personal Growth: Embrace the journey of self-improvement, starting with understanding your unique 'why' and mission.


About Your Personal Branding Instructor:
Meet Itzel Garrido, a master of personal branding who uniquely combines her expertise as a photographer, marketer, and environmentalist. Drawing inspiration from her deep love for nature and travel, Having done it for herself, Itzel understands the art of capturing and presenting one's essence in the vast digital landscape. With over 9 years of digital marketing experience, including a significant role at Ford Credit, she knows firsthand the power of a compelling personal brand. Whether through visuals, narratives, or strategic outreach, Itzel is passionate about empowering individuals to sculpt and refine their story, ensuring their brand resonates creatively and authentically with their target audience.


Requirements
A notepad
A pen
An open mind
Explore Personal Branding with Total Confidence!
Seize this opportunity to sculpt a brand identity that echoes your uniqueness in today's competitive era!


See you inside!
-Itzel and Phil

courses.description:
Những người có nhân hiệu và có kiến thức luôn ý thức được rằng xuất bản sách vừa là để lại một giá trị nhân bản cho bản thân và cho cộng đồng, vừa để nâng thương hiệu lên một tầm cao khác.
Và khóa học "Tự Xuất Bản Một Cuốn Sách Những Điều Cần Biết" là hành trình chi tiết đi từ việc nảy sinh ý tưởng cho đến khi cuốn sách đến tay độc giả. Giảng viên Ngọc Anh người đã tích lũy nhiều năm kinh nghiệm đã đưa ra những bước đi cụ thể và chiến lược thông minh giúp mọi người tự xuất bản tác phẩm của mình.
Sách bắt đầu bằng việc  lên ý tưởng và viết kế hoạch, xây kế hoạch tổng thể, phát triển nội dung, xây khung giàn ý. Sau đó hướng dẫn học viên xuất bản sách chi tiết từng việc từ lựa chọn dịch vụ in ấn, làm việc với nhà xuất bản đến việc xác định mục tiêu tiếp thị và phân phối.
Với sự kết hợp giữa kiến thức sâu rộng và kinh nghiệm thực tế, khóa học cung cấp những lời khuyên chân thành và chi tiết cho mọi người kiến thức để tự thực hiện ước mơ tự sáng tạo và xuất bản cho riêng mình một cuốn sách, không hề khó.
target_audience: Cho bất cứ ai muốn tự xuất bản cho mình một cuốn sách, dấu ấn cuộc đời

courses.description:
あなたは、こんな悩みを抱えていませんか？


■資格を取ったけどどうやって仕事にしていけばいいのかわからない
■好きなことで起業してSNS発信やブログを始めたけど、思うように売上が伸びない…
■起業後、生活できるくらいには稼げているけれど、もっとビジネスを大きくしたい…
■自分も輝いて、お客様の役に立てるような仕事がしたい！


もし、１つでもピンとくるものがあれば、このプログラムはアナタのためのものです。
このプログラムに参加することであなたは…


■セルフブランディング起業の基本
■長く深く愛され高くても売れる強いブランドになるための秘訣
■「ぜひあなたから買いたいです！」と言われる売れる商品コンセプトの作り方


というノウハウを手に入れることが出来ます。


書籍『愛されてしっかり稼ぐ！セルフブランディング起業術』（同文館出版）の著者であり、これまで約1000名の起業家にアドバイスし、約300名の起業家のブランディングをプロデュースした起業ブランディングプロデューサーである私が、「自分らしく起業するために本当に役立つやり方」と、「活用事例」を紹介します。


もしあなたが、「広めたい思いや技術はあるけれど、男性的な理詰めのマーケティングや集客法がどうにもしっくりこない」、「市場のニーズからではなくて自分や本当にやりたいことからビジネスを作っていきたい」という悩みを抱えているなら、今すぐ、このプログラムに参加してください。


自分のやりたいことや、差別化できる特徴を言語化して、理想のお客様を引き寄せ、起業を通して理想のワークライフスタイルを叶える方法を今すぐ手に入れてください。




【セルフブランディング起業術を実践した方の変化】
・差別化できず集客に悩んでいたピラティス講師が、ブランディングができたことで
SNSの発信にも勇気が持てて、高単価のコースレッスンを販売できるようになった！


・リアルのサロンのみで経営が不安定だったセラピストが、２年間作ることができなかった自分らしいコンセプトでオンラインダイエットプログラムを作成、販売することができた ！


・出産直後で体力も気力もなかった主婦が、セルフブランディングによって自分が変化する様子をSNSでワクワク発信していただけで、占い師として独立して家族で上京できた！


・海外在住、育児、フルタイム勤務だったコーチが、本当にやりたいこと＝コーチングで起業して１年で会社を辞め、家族と海外で過ごしながら仕事ができるようになった！

Markanıza Özen Gösterme ve Markanızı Bes: Müşterilerinizin Markanıza Bağlılık Yemini Etmesini Sağlamak
Marka Değerinizi Marka Uzatma ve Lisans Anlaşmalarıyla Güçlendirme
10 (On) Kural: Markalaşma ile İlgili 10 Doğru, 10 Yanlış ve Markaların 10 Özelliği

requirements: Programa deneyim gerekmez
courses.description:
Tebrikler! Markanızın kontrolünü ele almak üzeresiniz.
Eğer "bir markam bile yok" diye düşünüyorsanız, o halde bu ders kesinlikle sizin için. Aynı zamanda daha iyi bir marka yaratmak, zarar görmüş bir markayı düzeltmek, bir markanın gücünü daha da yaygınlaştırmak ya da sıfırdan başlayıp yeni bir marka yaratmak isteyenler için hazırlanmış bir eğitim.
Markalaşma her zaman ateşli bir konu oldu. Ancak günümüzün rekabetçi iş dünyasında bu durum daha da ön planda. Tüketiciler kuruluşunuzun adını duyduklarında, ne düşündükleri ve nasıl satın aldıklarını etkileyen anlar zihinlerinde canlanıyor. İsminizi, insanlar tanıyorsa, o halde markanın temeline sahipsiniz demektir. Bu eğitimin bütün amacı, sahip olduğunuz markanın istediğiniz marka olduğundan emin olmanızı sağlamak.
Markalaşmanın bugün pazarlamada tek ve bir numaralı moda sözcük olmasının sağlam bir gerekçesi var. Markalar pazarlama başarısına götüren yolu açıyor. Etrafınızdaki büyük, markalı dünyada başarılı bir şekilde rekabet edebilmeniz amacıyla konunun sırlarını çözmek ve daha iyi, daha güçlü bir markaya yönelmek için bu eğitime güvenin.


KISIM 1: Markalaşma hakkında hep bilmek istedikleriniz
Marka inşa etmek ev inşa etmeye çok benzer. Sağlam bir temelle işe koyulmalısınız.


KISIM 2: Adım adım marka yaratma
Bu kısım marka inşa kılavuzunuzdur. Ürününüzü kimin ve niçin aldığı, hangi tür rekabetle karşı karşıya olduğunuz, sunumunuzun nasıl daha farklı ve daha iyi hale geleceği ve hangi ayırt edici özellikleri markalaştırmanız gerektiğini bulmanızı sağlayacak esas araştırma evresinde size eşlik edecek.


KISIM 3: Yeni markanızı lanse etme
Bu kısım bütünüyle marka yaratma stratejinize işlerlik kazandırmakla ilgili


KISIM 4: Markanıza özen ve markanızı besleme
Bu kısım markanızın değerinden verim sağlamanıza yardımcı oluyor.


KISIM 5: Markanızı koruma
Markanızı saldırılara karşı nasıl koruyacağınızı adım adım öğrenmenizi sağlayacak bir bölüm


KISIM 6: On kural bölümü
Bu son kısım sizleri on kısımdan oluşan üç listeye yönlendirecek. Marka yaratmanın 10 yasası, marka yaratma sürecinde yapılan 10 hata, dünyanın en değerli markalarının 10 özelliği
target_audience: Marka olmak isteyen herkese yönelik

courses.title: １時間でわかる！ ビジネスパーソンのための「パーソナル・ブランディング」基礎講座〜あなたが専門家として認められるために
courses.bio: パーソナル・ブランディングの専門家による講義を聞きながら、自分自身を考えるたくさんのワークに取り組む。自分を深く考えるための、究極の１時間講座です。
objectives: パーソナル・ブランディングとは何をすれば良いのか、どういう意味なのかがわかる
「ブランディングできていない状態」を知ることができる
「ブランディングできている状態」は、どのようなメリットがあるのか理解できる
ブランディングの定義を学ぶ
楽しいワークを解きながら、自分を深く知ることができる
自分がやるべきこと、今後やってはいけないことがわかる
SNSやブログに何を投稿すべきか、決めることができる
服装やポートレート写真について、自分がどうするべきか、考えることができる
requirements: 初めてでも大丈夫！ ブランディングや自分探しの経験が全くなくても問題ありません。
年齢・役職・職業などを問わず、すべての方に学んでいただけます。
BtoC、BtoB、どちらのビジネスをしている方も対応しています。
courses.description:
自分に求められる役割が何かズレている、違うと感じる
いつも、自分が本当にやりたいこととは違う仕事が依頼される
周囲にあまり評価されていないと感じる
自分の代わりはいくらでもいると感じる
色々やりすぎて「何屋かわからない」とよく言われる
…こんなあなた、もしかすると、ブランディングができていないかもしれません。


初めまして、ブランドコンサルタントの守山菜穂子（もりやま・なおこ）です。
私は大学時代に美術大学で「個性とは何か」を学びました。
その後、広告会社と出版社で、14年間、広告宣伝の仕事に従事。数多くのタレント・クリエイターとお仕事をご一緒し、また企業トップや有識者、開発者などの取材や撮影をした経験があります。
2014年に独立した時、決めたことがあります。
「個人のパーソナル・ブランディングを支援したい」。
当時まだ、日本におけるパーソナル・ブランディングとは、有名人やインフルエンサーだけのもの、いわゆる「意識高い系」のものでした。
しかしこの10年で、時代が大きく変わりました。AIが実用化されて来たことも大きいと思います。誰もがパーソナル・ブランディングに取り組む時代がやっと来たと感じています。


ブランディングがうまく行くと、その人の個性が無理なく輝き、ラクに生きていけるようになります。
また周囲の人から認められ選ばれるので、昇級や昇格、転職などもうまくいくようになります。
起業したい人には、見つけてもらうために必須のスキルといえます！


この講座は、約１時間のカリキュラムの中で、自分のパーソナル・ブランディングを考えられるワークがたくさん入っています。
ぜひ落ち着いた環境で、好きなお茶でも用意していただき、自分に集中する１時間を作ってください。


講座終了後、びっくりするくらい新しい自分に出会えることを保証します。ぜひ、楽しんでご受講くださいね。


【他の講座と異なる独自のポイント】
◎講師は、美術大学を卒業後、マスコミ業界を経てブランドコンサルタントとして独立したという経歴。憧れられる人物の魅せ方、個性の作り方を熟知しています。
◎10年間に渡り、パーソナル・ブランディング講座を開催し、人気講座に育て上げた実績があります。
◎2024年には著書『選ばれる人になる「パーソナル・ブランディング」の教科書（三笠書房）』が発売されました。
◎講師自身も、2014年に全くの身一つで独立後、ブランディングを継続しなががら、大型の講演、企業研修、メディア出演、著書の出版などを経験。自身が工夫しながら獲得したノウハウも詰まっています。
◎講座には、ワークが入っているので、受講後は日々の不安やモヤモヤを、スッキリ解消することができます。


【講座内容】
ブランディングの重要性
ブランディングの定義
自分のブランディングをしてみよう
説得力のワーク
比喩のワーク
あなたの姿を発信する
哲学のワーク
SNS・ブログ発信のワーク
不足しているものを考える
あなたは、どう見えているか
服装のワーク
ポートレート写真のワーク
パーソナル・ブランディングのまとめ（終わりのワーク）
target_audience: 自分に求められる役割が、何かズレている、違うと感じている人
自分が「本当にやりたいこと」とは違う仕事が依頼されて、困っている人
専門性が低い仕事をしていて、自分の代わりはいくらでもいると感じている人
AIに仕事を奪われる恐怖がある人
「何が得意なの？」と聞かれる、「何屋かわからない」と言われたことがある人
「誰も自分のことをわかってくれない」と感じる場面がある人
名指しで、自分に合う仕事だけが来たらいいのに、と思う人
お客様や、仕事を選びたい人
クライアント、お客様、上司や家族など、周囲の人を安心させたい人
転職したい、昇格したい、起業したい考えがある人
もっとクリエイティブに自分の人生を作っていきたい人

courses.title: Personal Branding
courses.bio: This course introduces the personal branding concept and helps people to learn how to successfully promote themselves
requirements: Desire to learn and improve their personal brand
Open mind
courses.description:
Personal branding is the process of developing a “mark” that is created around your personal name or your career. The main goal of personal branding is to develop one reputation and grow successfully by networking in a way that interests others. The course is structured as following: The first Unit is dedicated to the general ideas about personal branding. The second Unit provides self-assessment skills for a successful personal branding management. The third Unit is highlights the keys aspects of personal branding and how to set the objectives and lever in our strengths to achieve our goals.. The fourth Unit describes the online reputation in relation with personal branding. Finally, the fifth Unit analyses the personal branding as a tool for career management.
In all units, we will see real cases of students (personal interviews) to show specific examples of the best practice of personal branding techniques.
target_audience: EU Youth
Jobseekers
HIgher education students
Vocational education and training students
Anyone who wants to improve their referrals and increase their employability

courses.title: Segredos da Influencia | O poder da Linguagem não Verbal
courses.bio: Aprimore suas habilidades de comunicação e atendimento ao cliente com o curso de Linguagem Não Verbal.
objectives: Domine a Linguagem Não Verbal: Aprenda a dominar a linguagem não verbal e adquira habilidades poderosas de comunicação.
Decifre Expressões Faciais: Descubra como decifrar expressões faciais para compreender as emoções e intenções por trás delas.
Construa Rapport Eficaz: Domine as técnicas para construir rapport e ganhar a confiança dos outros.
Interprete Linguagem Corporal: Desenvolva a capacidade de interpretar a linguagem corporal, seja ela aberta, fechada, submissa ou dominante.
Sorria com Confiança: Aprenda a distinguir sorrisos genuínos de sorrisos falsos para melhorar sua percepção nas interações.
Identifique Olhares Significativos: Identifique e compreenda diferentes tipos de olhares e seu impacto na comunicação.
Aprimore suas Habilidades de Persuasão: Domine técnicas de persuasão subliminar e influência para alcançar resultados excepcionais.
Utilize Metáforas na Comunicação: Explore o uso de metáforas na linguagem não verbal para uma comunicação mais envolvente.
Gestos e Expressões Corporais Eficazes: Saiba como os gestos e expressões corporais podem afetar a percepção e o humor nas interações.
Aplicação nos Negócios: Descubra como aplicar a linguagem não verbal em reuniões de negócios, liderança e negociações estratégicas.
Perguntas Estratégicas: Aprenda a usar a linguagem não verbal para desvendar as necessidades do cliente nas negociações.
Além disso, desfrute de bônus exclusivos e e-books para aprofundar seus conhecimentos.

Introdução à Linguagem Não Verbal: O Poder da Linguagem nas Vendas

requirements: Acesso Universal: Não há pré-requisitos estritos para este curso, tornando-o acessível a todos, independentemente de sua formação anterior.
Aberto a Todos os Níveis: Este curso é adequado para estudantes iniciantes e experientes, não sendo necessário conhecimento prévio em linguagem não verbal ou persuasão.
Para Curiosos e Profissionais: Seja você um curioso sobre comunicação ou um profissional que busca aprimorar suas habilidades, este curso atende às necessidades de todos.
Comece a Aprender Imediatamente: Não é necessário ter conhecimento prévio, pois o curso o guiará desde o básico até níveis avançados de compreensão.
Explore Novos Horizontes: Mesmo se você não tiver experiência anterior em comunicação não verbal, este curso oferece uma oportunidade emocionante para aprender e crescer.
Aproveite a Jornada de Aprendizado: Independentemente de onde você esteja em sua jornada de aprendizado, estamos aqui para torná-la acessível, envolvente e valiosa.
courses.description:
O curso de Linguagem Não Verbal é uma oportunidade única para quem busca aprimorar suas habilidades de comunicação e atendimento ao cliente. Com foco na psicologia da linguagem não verbal, este curso oferece uma compreensão profunda dos aspectos não verbais da comunicação, incluindo a linguagem corporal, gestos, expressões faciais e tom de voz.


Ao longo do curso, você aprenderá a identificar e interpretar os sinais não verbais de seus clientes, compreendendo suas emoções e necessidades de forma mais completa. Além disso, você descobrirá como utilizar a linguagem não verbal de forma estratégica para criar empatia, estabelecer confiança e melhorar a qualidade do atendimento prestado.


O curso aborda também atividades práticas para ajudar a desenvolver suas habilidades de comunicação verbal e não verbal. Você aprenderá técnicas de comunicação não verbal masculina e feminina, incluindo a linguagem corporal de atração. Compreender a linguagem corporal masculina e feminina é essencial para criar uma conexão genuína com seus clientes e colaboradores.


Ao final do curso, você estará apto a aplicar suas habilidades de linguagem não verbal para melhorar sua performance no atendimento ao cliente e em outras áreas da sua vida pessoal e profissional. Este curso é ideal para profissionais que trabalham em atendimento ao cliente, vendas, gestão de equipes e liderança, bem como para estudantes e pesquisadores da psicologia e comunicação.


Não perca a oportunidade de desenvolver suas habilidades de linguagem não verbal e se tornar um comunicador mais efetivo e confiante. Matricule-se agora mesmo no curso de Linguagem Não Verbal.
target_audience: Profissionais de Vendas e Marketing: Este curso é essencial para profissionais de vendas, marketing e comunicação que desejam melhorar suas habilidades de persuasão.
Gestores e Líderes de Equipe: Gestores e líderes de equipe podem usar as técnicas deste curso para liderar com mais eficácia e influenciar positivamente suas equipes.
Empreendedores e Empresários: Empreendedores e empresários podem aumentar a eficácia de suas comunicações para impulsionar seus negócios.
Profissionais de Recursos Humanos: Profissionais de RH podem usar as habilidades adquiridas neste curso para avaliar candidatos e melhorar a comunicação dentro da organização.
Estudantes de Comunicação: Estudantes de comunicação e psicologia podem expandir seu conhecimento prático das interações humanas.
Qualquer um Interessado em Persuasão: Mesmo que você não tenha experiência anterior, se você é curioso sobre como a comunicação não verbal e a persuasão funcionam, este curso é adequado para você.

courses.description:
Dec 28th Update: Almost 1000 students now! Thank you!
Jan 22nd Update: Many people have been asking me for the link to my personal website. I should've included it earlier! Here's the link: sunnytrochaniak[dot]com

Creating your own website is one of the most powerful things you can do for yourself and your personal brand. According to the Huffington Post, over 80% of employers Google search applicants before inviting them to an interview, and almost 50% of them have said they changed their mind based on what they found online. This is only trending upwards; this is just the beginning.
Most people scramble to simply change their Facebook name and remove their drunken photos, and while and this may be an effective hiding strategy, you need to ask yourself this question: you are competing for a position with tens, hundreds, or even thousands of other people. Do you really want to be hiding? This is your opportunity to stand out from the crowd.
When it comes down to it, having a personal website is great at 3 things:
Landing your dream job. When employers Google your name, a stunning personal website can be the icing on the cake. A resume simply demonstrates that you're qualified; a personal brand website tells your story, showcases your personality, and demonstrates why you'd be a great fit at that company.
Creating new opportunities. You never know who might stumble across your site. Having a personal website can open doors you never knew existed. You have no idea the number of times I've been contacted by a complete stranger, because they read about something on my website. You'll be able to start evaluating and actually choosing which career path you want to take.
Establishing yourself as an expert in your field. Sharing your thoughts and experiences gives you an opportunity to showcase your knowledge. By demonstrating your expertise, you begin to build credibility, not just through your words but by your actions. Both people and companies will start coming to you for your expert opinion.
The other great thing about having a website is that it's online 24/7. Take a little bit of time to set up your site right now, and you will reap the rewards it provides. Your website will be at work for you even while you sleep.
"Sunny, this sounds great and all, but I don't think it's going to work for me, I've never created a website before!"
Perfect, that's exactly the reason I created this course. The lessons are so simple that a baby could understand.
Not only that, I'll show you how you can make one in just a couple of sittings.
What are you waiting for, let's start building your personal brand powerhouse right now! It's time to make a name for yourself.
*You have my personal promise that you will get every penny's worth out of this class. If you put in the effort, your career will change for the better. If not, you have 30 days to get a full refund. No questions asked :)
---
Details
We'll be making it on Wordpress (completely free, easy to edit, and has some awesome plugins)
In this class, I'll be using a premium Wordpress theme ($55). You can definitely use a free theme, although using a premium theme will put your site on the next level, and is definitely worth it in my opinion. I'll show you some great options of course.
You'll also need hosting ($5-10/month). To make it easy for you, I've set one up specifically for students of this course. I'll walk you through setting it up.
Your own domain. This is $10/year just about everywhere.
target_audience: You're looking to stand out from the crowd
You're willing to experiment and try something new
You want to make a name for yourself
You're aware of the value of having an impeccable personal brand
You're looking to land your dream job
You're open to new opportunities

courses.title: Pass MLA-C01 AWS Certified Machine Learning Exam in 3 Days
courses.bio: MLA-C01AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer Associate | Real Questions | Detail Explanations | Covers All Exam Topics
courses.description:
MLA-C01 AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer Associate Exam Practice Test Course
Free Sample Question 1 out of 3:
The customer analytics team at TelCo Solutions is developing a churn prediction model to proactively offer incentives, given that the cost of losing a customer is significantly higher than providing an incentive. The model produces the following confusion matrix after evaluating on a test dataset of 100 customers: Based on the model evaluation results, why is this a viable model for production?
A. The model is 86% accurate and the cost incurred by the company as a result of false negatives is less than the false positives.
B. The precision of the model is 86%, which is less than the accuracy of the model.
C. The model is 86% accurate and the cost incurred by the company as a result of false positives is less than the false negatives.
D. The precision of the model is 86%, which is greater than the accuracy of the model.
Correct Answer: C
Explanation:
The question states that the cost of churn is far greater than the cost of the incentive. Therefore, the model is viable if the cost of false positives (FP) is less than the cost of false negatives (FN).
*   Accuracy: The accuracy of the model is (True Positives + True Negatives) / Total predictions = (10 + 76) / 100 = 86%.
*   False Positives (FP): The model predicts the customer will churn, but they don't. The company offers an incentive unnecessarily. In this case FP = 10.
*   False Negatives (FN): The model predicts the customer will not churn, but they do. The company does not offer an incentive, and the customer churns. In this case FN = 4.
Since the problem states "the cost of churn is far greater than the cost of the incentive," incurring 10 FPs is more acceptable than incurring 4 FNs. Option C reflects this understanding.




Free Sample Question 2 out of 3:
The Machine Learning team at Innovate Solutions is configuring SageMaker training jobs with built-in algorithms and needs to know the essential parameters for submission. Which common parameters MUST be specified? (Choose three.)
A. The training channel identifying the location of training data on an Amazon S3 bucket.
B. The validation channel identifying the location of validation data on an Amazon S3 bucket.
C. The IAM role that Amazon SageMaker can assume to perform tasks on behalf of the users.
D. Hyperparameters in a JSON array as documented for the algorithm used.
E. The Amazon EC2 instance class specifying whether training will be run using CPU or GPU.
F. The output path specifying where on an Amazon S3 bucket the trained model will persist.
Correct Answer: ACF
Explanation:
The common parameters that MUST be specified are: the training channel identifying the location of training data, the IAM role that SageMaker can assume, and the output path for the trained model.




Free Sample Question 3 out of 3:
The Data Insights team at "ScaleMetrics" needs to improve the query performance of their Amazon Athena analytics, which currently struggles with the 1 TB of metrics data generated every minute. What storage format in Amazon S3 will best improve query performance?
A. CSV files
B. Parquet files
C. Compressed JSON
D. RecordIO
Correct Answer: B
Explanation:
Parquet is a columnar storage format optimized for analytical queries in services like Amazon Athena. It allows Athena to read only the necessary columns, significantly reducing the amount of data scanned and improving query performance compared to row-based formats like CSV or JSON.






Are You Ready to Ace the AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer - Associate Certification?
Our AWS Certified Machine Learning Engineer - Associate Practice Test Course is designed to help you master key ML concepts on AWS and confidently pass the exam. With realistic, exam-style questions covering all critical topics, this course ensures you're fully prepared to succeed!
Why This Practice Test Course?
Test Your Knowledge – Challenge yourself with comprehensive practice questions that mirror the real exam structure and cover topics such as data engineering, exploratory data analysis, modeling, and ML model deployment on AWS.
Learn as You Go – Each question comes with detailed explanations to reinforce your understanding, clarify complex ML concepts, and improve your problem-solving skills.
Boost Your Confidence – Simulate the actual exam experience, develop test-taking strategies, and walk into the exam fully prepared.
Up-to-Date Content – All questions are aligned with the latest AWS Machine Learning Engineer - Associate exam objectives, ensuring you focus on relevant, high-impact concepts.
Join thousands of aspiring machine learning engineers, data scientists, and cloud professionals who have sharpened their skills and achieved certification success. Get started today and take a big step toward becoming a certified AWS Machine Learning Engineer!
target_audience: A data scientist or machine learning engineer looking to gain hands-on experience in deploying ML models on AWS.
A software engineer or developer interested in integrating machine learning into cloud-based applications.
A cloud practitioner or solutions architect aiming to specialize in machine learning workloads on AWS.

courses.description:
Have you ever wondered how to brand yourself in your best light? Sometimes we struggle to understand how to be "our best selves" while, at the same time, being our true selves. No one wants to feel fake.
I've helped students and professionals learn how to brand themselves and how to find true career fulfillment. Branding and networking are two crucial first steps you must take when you begin a job search--whether graduating from college or transitioning to a new career.
In this course, you'll learn all the branding essentials, including how to brand your best self both online and offline, how to network effectively, and how to write both a branding statement and an elevator pitch. This course includes five separate video lectures (featuring presentations full of information, stats, and tips) and two handouts which will aid you in writing your elevator pitch and branding statement.
The two written pieces--the elevator pitch and the branding statement--can be tailored and adapted to social media, your resume, your cover letters, and beyond. Think of this course as your crash course and intro into personal and professional branding. You'll need these skills the rest of your career; set yourself up for success now by building a solid reputation and great rapport with other professionals.

courses.bio: Wertvolles Wissen, Bewusstheit und Methodenkompetenz für Ihre persönliche Weiterentwicklung!
objectives: Bewusstsein für die Entwicklung der eigenen Werte, Stärken und Fertigkeiten für ein erfolgreiches Selbstmarketing!
Fähigkeiten, in Kommunikations- und Interaktionssituationen zielführend und effektiv zu handeln!
Methodenkompetenz für die erfolgreiche Zusammenarbeit mit anderen in der Projekt- und Teamarbeit!
Kommunikationstypen erkennen und die fünf Gesetzte für eine gelungene Kommunikation anwenden!
Negative subtile Manifestationskräfte im Unterbewusstsein erkennen und proaktiv auflösen!
"Follow your Purpose!" Wie Sie Ihre Bestimmung finden und den Lebenskompass einrichten!
requirements: Lust am Lernen und die Bereitschaft für mehr Erfolg im Leben die Extrameile zu gehen!
courses.description:
In diesem Onlinekurs habe ich in 12 Lektionen das wichtigste Know-How aus meiner mehr als 25 Jährigen Arbeit als Unternehmer und langjährigen Erfahrung als Berater und Dozent an den Mitthessischen Hochschulen zum Thema Sozialkompetenz, Selbstmarketing und Kommunikation komprimiert und aufbauend zusammengefasst. Zur Veranschaulichung und didaktischer Lernunterstützung arbeite ich dabei in jeder Lektion - wie bei meinen Vorträgen vor Ort mit gut ausgearbeiteten selbst erstellten Grafiken, Bildern und Charts, welche Sie als Begleitmaterial herunterladen können.
Die zukünftigen Wertschöpfungs- und Arbeitsmodelle sind mehr und mehr geprägt von Co-Working, Open-Team und Co-Creation. Da das Wissen der Welt nahezu überall und zu jeder Zeit verfügbar ist, wird die Sozialkompetenz mit dem Bewusstsein für mich (Selbstreflexion), für die anderen (Identifikation) und für eine erfolgreiche Zusammenarbeit (Interaktion) zur zentralen Fähigkeit - dem Future Skill #1.
Die Wissenschaft definiert Sozialkompetenz als ein Komplex von Fähigkeiten, die dazu dienen, in Kommunikations- und Interaktionssituationen entsprechend den Bedürfnissen der Beteiligten effektiv zu handeln. Und begleitend dazu ist Soziale Intelligenz die Fähigkeit andere zu verstehen, sowie sich ihnen gegenüber situationsangemessen und klug zu verhalten.
Sozialkompetenz kann man somit auch als erfolgreiches Selbstmarketing verstehen: Marke = Werte!
Wir fragen also:  Bin ich mir meiner Werte Bewusst und wie wertvoll bin ich - grade für andere im Arbeitsleben? Was sind meine USPs, was macht mich einzigartig? Was sind meine Stärken? Wer Schwächen stärkt wird mittelmäßig, wer Stärken stärkt wird einzigartig! Was sind meine Fertigkeiten, meine Methodenkompetenz, meine Fähigkeiten?
Ich lade Sie herzlich zu meinem Videokurs ein und wünsche Ihnen viel Spaß bei Ihrer persönlichen Weiterentwicklung!


Herzliche Grüße, Ihr Roman Benischke
target_audience: Motivierte und selbst reflektierte Menschen, die sich persönlich weiterentwickeln möchten!

A small budget of $10 USD to hire a publisher (optional)
A notepad (digital or physical) to take notes
courses.description:
Do you want to learn online reputation management (ORM)?
Online reputation management is one of the most underserved niches in the marketing realm. The online reputation management that exists today in terms of services and software is also geared towards businesses and corporations. Most people are not qualified to provide online reputation management services for themselves or for individuals who want to manage their personal brands.
In this course, I'll teach you everything I know about online reputation management.
Why am I qualified to teach this course?
I'm a full-service digital marketer specializing in online reputation management. I've helped people repair their online reputations and lead better lives through my Toronto-based digital marketing agency.
Now, it's time for me to teach you everything I know so you can do the same.
What's in the course?
Learn what online reputation management for individuals (ORM) is and how it works
Learn about how to outrank negative Google links and push down negative content
Learn how to set up brand alerts to notify you about media released about you or your clients
Learn how to audit webpages and negative media
Learn the fundamentals of journalism and how to remove negative articles
Learn basic PR and how to write, then publish a press release
Learn how to create solid brand images to sway the way people perceive individuals
If you want to learn online reputation management for personal brands and individuals, this is the course for you!
target_audience: Anybody who wants to fix their personal reputations
Digital marketers who want to learn more about ORM and the industry
Digital marketers who want to find a marketing niche and are considering ORM
Public relations students and professionals
Anybody who wants to fix the personal reputation of their clients
Politicians and public figures

courses.description:
Chào mừng bạn đến với khóa học "Nghệ thuật dẫn chương trình", nơi bạn sẽ được trang bị toàn diện các kỹ năng để tỏa sáng trên mọi sân khấu, từ phòng họp chuyên nghiệp đến các sự kiện giải trí lớn. Với mục tiêu biến mỗi học viên thành một người dẫn dắt cuốn hút, khóa học này sẽ là bước đệm vững chắc cho sự nghiệp dẫn chương trình của bạn.
Trong thời đại thông tin bùng nổ như hiện nay, người dẫn chương trình không chỉ là người truyền đạt thông tin mà còn phải là người tạo dấu ấn, kết nối cảm xúc với khán giả. Đó là lý do vì sao chúng tôi thiết kế khóa học này để giúp bạn nắm vững các kỹ thuật giao tiếp cơ bản và nâng cao, phát triển kỹ năng xử lý tình huống tức thì và làm chủ nghệ thuật kể chuyện, từ đó xây dựng hình ảnh cá nhân ấn tượng và chuyên nghiệp.
Đội ngũ giảng viên của chúng tôi gồm những người dẫn chương trình kỳ cựu và chuyên gia giao tiếp, đảm bảo mang đến cho bạn những bài học giá trị nhất. Bên cạnh đó, khóa học cũng cung cấp môi trường thực hành, nơi bạn có thể áp dụng ngay những kỹ năng đã học vào thực tế.
Hãy tham gia khóa học "Nghệ thuật dẫn chương trình" để khám phá tiềm năng của bản thân, và bước đầu tiên trở thành người dẫn dắt chương trình chuyên nghiệp, sẵn sàng chinh phục mọi ánh nhìn và trái tim khán giả. Đăng ký ngay hôm nay để không bỏ lỡ cơ hội này!

فى الدورة دي انا ضيفت فيها خبرة 15 سنة فى مختلف مجالات الأنترنت واهمهم صناعة المحتوي انا بدأت حساباتى فى صناعة المحتوى من 8 شهور والحمدلله وصلت لنتيجة كويسة جدا فى الوقت القصير ده على جميع المنصات وده لان عندي خبرة فى مجالى الاساسي وهو السيو SEO وهو باختصار ازاي تخلي موقعك يبقى رقم واحد فى محركات البحث زي جوجل لما تبحث عن أي كلمة ليها علاقة بموقعك والحمد لله تفوقت في هذا المجال على مدار أكثر من 15 سنة وده الى ساعدني اني افهم خوارزميات منصات التواصل الاجتماعي بسرعة فبدأت بالاستمرار فى صناعة الفيديوهات ونشرها على جميع المنصات ومع مرور الوقت وعمل الكثير من التجارب على مختلف الفيديوهات من طرق مونتاج و بداية الفيديو وطريقة كتابة الاسكريبت توصلت لاسرار الحصول على مشاهدات عالية فبنسبة كبيرة ولله الحمد استطيع كتابة سكريبت لفيديو وتنفيذه ليحصل على ملايين المشاهدات وهذا اذا اردت وبالطبع ليس كل شئ مضمون 100% ولكن نراعي بعض العوامل التي تساعد على ضمان المشاهدات فى الفيديو اذا التزمت بها.
حبيت لما اعمل دورة تبقي شاملة لكل حاجة على عكس باقى الدورات حبيت انظملك وارتب لك كل حاجه فشرحتلك ازاي تبدأ بالأفكار وازاي تكتب سكريبت يجيب مشاهدات و إزاي تصور وتظبط الاضاءة والصوت ومن غير معدات وإمكانيات حتي التطوير والاحتراف بالمعدات وكمان هعلمك ان شاء الله المونتاج وعمل الصور المصغرة و شرحتلك المنصات وكل منصة لوحدها وازاي تكسب فلوس من صناعة المحتوي بطرق كتير واسرار المشاهدات فى اكتر من فيديو بشكل مكثف عشان تفهم كل حاجة ماشية ازاي.

courses.title: Unlock the Secrets to Natural Makeup: A Newbie's Guide
courses.bio: Master 6 core makeup products & learn to use brushes for the first time in this beginner’s guide to natural beauty.
objectives: Apply Mascara for maximum impact, enhancing your lashes with ease
Use Foundation and Concealer to create a smooth base and effectively hide under-eye circles

requirements: No experience needed—learn everything you need to know right here!
courses.description:
**Eezy Peezy Makeup Class** is the perfect introduction for anyone eager to achieve a flawless, natural makeup look with minimal effort. Designed for absolute beginners or anyone wanting to refine their skills, this hands-on course makes learning fun and approachable for everyone, regardless of how you identify.


In just a few easy steps, you'll master the six essential makeup techniques crucial for every look. You’ll learn to use key products, including **mascara, foundation, concealer, bronzer, lipstick,** and **brow pomade**. By the end of the class, you'll know exactly where to apply makeup on your face—targeting your **eyelashes, under-eye circles, cheeks,** and **lips**—for a polished finish.


One standout technique you'll learn is the **mascara seatbelt method**, ensuring your lashes are beautifully defined without any mess. Katrina, our expert instructor, teaches in a way that ensures everyone can follow along—her husband can even do it! Many participants who have never worn makeup before have successfully completed this class, and you can too!


A key highlight of the class is **face mapping**, where you'll learn exactly where to apply products using key facial markers. The steps taught are designed to be universal for all people, making it accessible for everyone. Katrina has experience teaching at modeling agencies and has worked with mature-aged clients, high-performing professionals, and individuals from all ethnic backgrounds.


We’ll also introduce you to companion products specifically designed for makeup novices, ensuring you have everything you need for a minimalist makeup kit. You’ll learn the fundamentals of wearing makeup, empowering you to make informed choices based on your unique skin type and tone.


In a supportive and friendly environment, you'll discover how to enhance your features and look your best—whether heading to the office, enjoying a casual day out, or attending a special event. Our goal is to help you feel like the best version of yourself with a polished, professional look that’s easy to achieve. Unlock the secrets to natural beauty and boost your confidence today!
target_audience: Most makeup classes overlook the gap between beginners and intermediate users. My course focuses on beginner-friendly basics, breaking down every step to prevent overwhelm. With a 6-step method and complementary tailored kits, I simplify makeup application. Live classes and recorded content ensure you learn at your own pace, with confidence.

requirements: 1. General Requirements  Basic Understanding of Writing and Publishing Goals Participants should have an interest in publishing their work or promoting their existing books. You don't need to be a published author, but having a clear vision of your writing goals is helpful.

2. For Specific Learning Formats a) Self-Paced Online Course Ability to manage your schedule and stay motivated with self-directed learning. Familiarity with navigating online platforms (e.g., course dashboards, downloads, and video content).

An understanding of your target audience (genres, reader demographics) to help craft personalized branding strategies. Basic writing tools such as Microsoft Word, Google Docs, or Scrivener (optional).

4. No Technical Skills Required We provide easy-to-use templates, guides, and tutorials for: Social media content creation Author website wireframes (no coding skills needed) Press kit development If you’re not tech-savvy, we offer step-by-step instructions to help you succeed!

5. Commitment to Apply What You Learn This course is designed to be practical and actionable. You’ll get the most value if you're ready to implement what you learn and invest in building your author brand over time.
courses.description:
Do you want your books to stand out in today’s competitive market? Are you ready to build a brand that attracts readers and drives sales? Whether you're an aspiring or established author, this course will teach you how to elevate your presence and dominate your niche.
In this hands-on course, you’ll learn how to craft a unique and memorable author brand by defining your “why,” identifying your target audience, and positioning yourself strategically in the publishing world. You’ll discover how to create a high-converting author website, design a professional press kit, and leverage social media platforms like Instagram, TikTok, and Twitter to engage readers and promote your work effectively.
We’ll also prepare you to confidently handle media interviews and public appearances. You'll master the art of pitching yourself to media outlets, building trust with your readers, and running impactful marketing campaigns for your book launches.
With practical templates, tools, real-world case studies, and expert guidance, you’ll walk away with a sustainable branding and marketing strategy designed to grow your audience and advance your author career.
Why Choose This Course?
Proven Strategies: Learn industry-tested techniques from experienced authors and media strategists.
Actionable Deliverables: Get templates, guides, and checklists you can use immediately.
Ongoing Support: Join a community of like-minded authors and access exclusive resources.
Join us now and transform your brand—your readers are waiting!
target_audience: Aspiring Authors: Ready to break into the publishing world and build their brand. Self-Published Authors: Looking to elevate their presence and grow their audience. Traditionally Published Authors: Seeking advanced branding and promotion strategies.

courses.description:
You don't have to quit your day job to get started on your dream business today.
This course will provide you with everything you need to know and consider before you start a new part-time venture as well as useful hints, tips, and strategies to turn your part-time extra income into a full-time success.
We could all benefit from an extra or residual income and all crave the financial freedom to do it for ourselves, but most new ventures fail. This is because of a lack of basic planning or insufficient business knowledge.
Research scientists all agree on the benefits of starting a new business as a side project but relying entirely on your new business to provide a full-time income from day one can be highly unsuccessful.
In this course, Andrew Pitt will teach you how your dream business can be achieved with minimal expense as long as you are a good communicator, have clear objectives, and create effective business systems to attain results that are consistent, measurable, and ultimately beneficial. His teaching topics include goal setting, public speaking, body language, storytelling, marketing, sales, business development, and motivation.
Every lesson is engaging and will make you evaluate your own situation and how you can move forward.
In a nutshell, this course is for you if:
-> You want to start (and grow) a business.
-> You need to become more effective in life and work.
-> You're looking to learning new skills for becoming a part-time entrepreneur.
-> You're ready to start working on what is truly important to you; your Legacy.


About the Instructor:
Andrew is a natural motivator, presenter, trainer, keynote speaker, and entrepreneur who has amassed over 1000 stellar reviews and has received praise for his 21st-century presentation style from all over the world.
Having coached and mentored people from all walks of life including politicians, sportspeople, business leaders, and actors. Andrew prides himself on his ability to bring out the best in others, helping them discover, attain, and surpass their goals during his training, courses, and coaching sessions.
Andrew is the co-founder and director of Gallery of Ideas, an organisation that every year brings international minds and business entrepreneurs together to inspire, get inspired, and share their newest creations.
