courses.description:
Imagine traveling the world, being greeted as an authority in your industry, and rubbing shoulders with inspirational business leaders like Bill Gates and Warren Buffet.
This might seem like a pipe-dream. But the truth is this lifestyle isn’t as hard to achieve as you may think...
The secret is building a powerful personal brand that follows you wherever you go… and now, there’s never been a more important time to have one. In today’s information economy we’re all drowning in data.
We live in a time where everybody now shares their lives online, and the last thing you want is to end up as another blur in an endless newsfeed.
I encourage you to stand up and take ownership of how the world perceives you. To proactively curate your brand, making sure you stand out for doing the things that you're passionate about.
The problem, of course, is knowing how to build your personal brand in the most effective way possible. And, hopefully, that's where I can help….
My name is Adam O’Neill, and over the past two decades, I’ve been lucky enough to have lived and worked all over the world meeting business leaders of the stature of Bill Gates, Warren Buffet, and Paul Allen. I've also spearheaded advertising campaigns for many of the world's top brands, including Red Bull, Rolex, LG Electronics, and Unilever.
Time and again, I’ve leveraged my own personal brand whenever I've needed to forge new connections, grow influence within my organisation, and most recently gain more visibility for my own business.
In this course, I'll be teaching you how to get similar results through a simple methodology I've used to create thousands of marketing campaigns for big multinational brands, and which will help superpower your own personal brand.
By the end, you'll know exactly what it takes to rise above the noise and break into circles that, at first sight, seem impossible to access.

courses.bio: Strategien zur erfolgreichen Selbstbehauptung
objectives: Sie kennen Ihr Durchsetzungsprofil
Sie lernen die acht Faktoren, um sich zukünftig besser durchzusetzen
Sie wissen, wie Sie Machtausübung und Partnerschaft kombinieren, um eine persönliche Durchsetzungsstrategie zu entwickeln
Sie kennen die wichtigsten Taktiken, um sich durchzusetzen
Sie können sich gegen unfaire Angriffe und Taktiken zur Wehr setzen
Sie wissen, wie Sie mit Widerstand umgehen können
Sie wissen, wie Sie vorgehen müssen, damit andere Menschen auch das machen, was Sie ihnen sagen
Sie bleiben souverän in schwierigen Situationen
Sie kennen die wichtigsten rhetorischen Stilmittel
Sie wissen, wie Sie Körper und Stimme gezielt einsetzen

Willkommen im Kurs: Wie Sie das meiste aus diesem Kurs für sich herausholen
So setzen Sie sich durch: Was Sie beim Durchsetzen beachten sollten
So werden Sie durchsetzungsstark: Die Durchsetzungsformel - Teil 1
So werden Sie durchsetzungsstark: Die Durchsetzungsformel - Teil 2
Von zart bis hart – Arten der Gesprächsführung
Strategien und Taktiken für erfolgreiches Durchsetzen - Teil 1
Strategien und Taktiken für erfolgreiches Durchsetzen - Teil 2
Effektiver Einsatz von Rhetorik, Stimme: Mehr erreichen durch die Macht der Rhetorik - Teil 1
Mehr erreichen durch die Macht der Rhetorik - Teil 2
Wirkungsvoller Einsatz von Körper und Stimme
Menschen abholen und führen: Pacing, Rapport und Leading
Umgang mit Schwierigkeiten: Gesagt ist nicht verstanden und umgesetzt
Wie Sie geschickt mit Widerstand umgehen
Souverän bleiben, wenn es schwierig wird

requirements: Sie sollten bereit sein, die im Kurs vermittelten Inhalte in Ihrer beruflichen oder privaten Praxis umzusetzen.
courses.description:
Sie können sich zwar sehr gut ausdrücken, aber trotzdem fehlt es Ihnen an Durchsetzungskraft?
Haben Sie haben Schwierigkeiten, in bestimmten Situationen Forderungen zu stellen, weil Sie Angst vor Konflikten haben?
Sie scheitern mit Ihren Anliegen immer wieder an schwierigen Gesprächspartnern?
Oder sind Sie schon ein Durchsetzungsprofi und wollen trotzdem noch mehr herausholen?
Dann sind Sie in diesem Kurs richtig.
Individuelle Vorstellungen, Ideen, Wünsche und Standpunkte zu verdeutlichen und gegenüber anderen durchzusetzen, ist Voraussetzung für beruflichen wie privaten Erfolg – und der damit verbundenen Zufriedenheit.
Selbstbehauptung und Durchsetzungsvermögen sind nicht nur im Management großer Konzerne gefragt oder gegenüber dem eigenen Vorgesetzten, sondern auch im Privaten, beispielsweise in Vereinen, Hobbygruppen, in der Familie, in Freundschaften und sogar Partnerbeziehungen. Ob Sie einen privaten Auftrag durch einen Dienstleister schneller erledigt haben wollen oder unfaires Ansinnen von Mitarbeitern, Kollegen oder Vorgesetzten unterbinden wollen oder müssen: überall benötigen Sie die Fähigkeit, sich durchzusetzen. Die Lage kann Ihnen vertraut sein, weil Sie die gleiche Situation schon mehrfach erlebt haben oder Sie geraten in völlig neue Umstände, in denen Sie sich zunächst orientieren müssen.

Richtig verstanden und gezielt eingesetzt, sind Selbstbehauptung und Durchsetzungskraft keine rücksichtslosen Mittel zum Zweck, das Durchsetzen der eigenen Vorstellungen um jeden Preis, sondern bewährte Vorgehensweisen, die – je nach Kontext – auch die Bedürfnisse und Wünsche der anderen beteiligten Personen berücksichtigen können. Wer diesen Kurs belegt und seine Selbstbehauptung verbessert, mutiert also nicht automatisch zum skrupellosen, Ellenbogen einsetzenden Rüpel, sondern lernt, seine eigenen Bedürfnisse  in einer bestimmten Situation zu erkennen, mit Nachdruck zu formulieren und kann diese dann im Dialog mit dem Gegenüber oder der Verhandlungspartei – je nach Kontext mehr oder weniger – forcierend durchsetzen.
Und doch: Sich durchsetzen zu müssen, bringt viele Menschen an ihre Grenzen. Ihren Standpunkt zu vertreten und auf einmal deutliche Ansagen zu machen, ist für sie  eine unangenehme Aufgabe und Herausforderung. Lieber flüchten sie sich in vorsichtige, vor Konjunktiven strotzenden Wischiwaschi-Aussagen. Das lang gepflegte Harmonie-Bedürfnis muss der Bereitschaft zur Konfrontation weichen. Und sie müssen sich mit  Widerständen auseinandersetzen, auf die sie argumentativ möglicherweise nicht vorbereitet sind. Da stecken viele lieber zurück und beschweren sich über die Ungerechtigkeit der Welt und die Schlechtheit der Mitmenschen.
Dabei ist es nicht nötig, zurückzuweichen. Die Lösung ist nicht in der Umwelt zu suchen, sondern in jedem einzelnen Menschen selbst: Wenn Menschen sich für ihre berechtigten oder gewünschten Ziele einsetzen, wird die Außenwelt zwangsläufig darauf reagieren. Aus einem „Mit der kann man es ja machen.“ wird dann ein „Sie weiß für sich einzustehen und sich durchzusetzen.“ Und wenn wir ehrlich sind, wissen wir: Oftmals geht es gar nicht um ein einzelnes Ergebnis, sondern darum, wie man beim Gegenüber wahrgenommen wird. Hat das Gegenüber erst einmal verstanden, dass Sie für Ihre Überzeugungen und Wünsche eintreten, wird er diese bei weiteren Situationen direkt berücksichtigen, um folgende Situationen zu entschärfen. - Ein Austausch auf Augenhöhe entsteht.
In diesem Kurs möchte ich zeigen, wie beides geht: Wie Sie für sich eintreten und flexibel eigene Interessen vertreten, aber auch wie Sie auf die andere Seite eingehen und ihre Belange berücksichtigen. Als Coach für Manager, Einkäufer, Verhandler und Privatpersonen und Workshop-Leiter weiß ich, dass rationales Verstehen nur eine Grundlage ist. Nichts geht über Praxis. Ich möchte Sie also in diesem Buch einladen, möglichst viel auszuprobieren, zu üben und dadurch Ihr Durchsetzungsvermögen zu verfeinern und zu optimieren.
Profitieren Sie von diesem Wissen und belegen Sie diesen Kurs. Dann sind auch Sie bald ein Durchsetzungsprofi.
target_audience: Alle, die sich im beruflichen Umfeld durchsetzen müssen, z.B. bei Kollegen, Mitarbeitern, Vorgesetzten, Kunden oder externen Partnern.
Alle, die im privaten Bereich mehr Durchsetzungsstärke brauchen, z.B. bei Aufträgen an Dienstleister oder Handwerker, aber auch bei Freunden und Bekannten oder der eigenen Familie
Alle, die sich für die Strategien, Taktiken, rhetorischen Stilmittel sowie Körpersprache und Stimmeinsatz interessieren, um sich besser durchzusetzen

courses.description:
Tag für Tag sprechen wir mit einer Vielzahl von Menschen. In manchen Gesprächen fühlen wir uns wohl – in anderen weniger. Manche Menschen empfinden wir als authentisch – andere als gekünstelt oder aufgesetzt. Manchmal können wir überzeugen – und manchmal verstehen wir die Welt nicht mehr. Dann wieder haben wir zwar ein Thema besprochen, aber unterschwellig spüren wir, dass irgendetwas nicht passt. Aber Gott sei Dank gibt es auch diese Menschen, mit denen wir uns ganz ohne Worte verstehen. Wie schön und einfach könnte es sein, wenn das immer so ginge. Und tatsächlich: es gibt Gründe und Mechanismen für dieses „blinde Verständnis“. Und es gibt Mechanismen, uns selbst ins beste Licht zu rücken und verstanden zu werden. Haben wir diese Faktoren erst einmal entschlüsselt, können wir sie auch ganz bewusst einsetzen. Für eine effektive Kommunikation.
Was Sie inhaltlich in diesem Kurs erwartet

courses.description:
Vielleicht geht es dir so, dass du dich nicht traust dein Gehalt zu besprechen. Gehaltsverhandlungen - nein danke. Das Problem ist: Du bekommst nicht was du verdienst, du bekommst, was du verhandelst!!!
Du kennst sicher Situationen in denen du einfach unsicher bsit und dich nicht traust nach dem höheren Gehalt zu fragen. Vielleicht hast du das bei anderen Menschen erlebt, vielleicht hast du das bei dir erlebt. Wie auch immer es ist, dieser Kurs hilft Dir endlich sicher und vorbereitet in die Gehaltsverhandlung zu gehen und dir zu holen, was du verdient hast. Lerne in dem Kurs die wichtigsten und besten Strategien für ein besseres Gehalt. Lerne, wie du diese Techniken anwendest und nutze die Beispiele für einen schnelleren Lernerfolg.
Du lernst konkret:
Sicherheit in jeder Gesprächssituation
Sicherheit in der Ausstrahlung
Gesprächsstrukturen im Gehaltsgespräch
verdeckte Manipulationen
Reaktionen auf das NEIN des Chefs
Argumentationstechniken und was es zu beachten gilt
Wie werde ich wertvoll? Was ist eigentlich mein Wert?
Dieser Kurs versetzt dich in die Lage schnell und wirkungsvoll zu reagieren und auch zu agieren. Nutze dein Wissen, um in Gesprächen angenehm und respektvoll zu agieren und zielorientiert zu lenken. Erfahre, wie du dein Gehalt verbesserst und deinem Chef auf Augenhöhe begegnen kannst. Damit die Techniken wirken habe ich dir noch einige PDF´s zur Vertiefung eingefügt, die dich in die Lage versetzen wirkungsvoll und stark zu agieren.
Der Kurs ist so aufgebaut, dass du jede Schritt für Schritt vorgehen und umsetzen kannst. Möglicherweise geht manche Technik besser und andere passen dir nicht. Das ist ok und ich bitte dich deine wichtigsten Erkenntnisse so umzusetzen, dass du darin richtig gut bist. Du wirst mit jeder Übung besser und kannst in der "echten Sitution" dann mehr erreichen.
Ich wünsche Dir viel Erfolg und beste Ergebnisse.
Liebe Grüße
Martin Rettmer
target_audience: Arbeitnehmer(Innen), die endlich das Gehalt bekommen wollen, was ihnen zusteht.

courses.title: Create a Personal Brand that is uniquely you
courses.bio: Your brand is your guide and a beacon for others, create a brand based on your values and purpose.
objectives: Connect with who you are by exploring your differentiators, skills, strengths, blindspots, and values.
Delve into your passions and purpose and how those can be incorporated into your personal brand.
Determine how others have perceived you over time, and if that matches up to your perception of yourself.
Create a brand statement that is genuinely and uniquely you.

Now What?: Action plan to live your personal brand

requirements: There are no requirements or prerequisites for this course, just a willingness to connect with genuine self.
courses.description:
Discover how your personal brand can be your ultimate guide to living a fulfilling and intentional life.
In this workshop you'll explore the intersection of who you are, with what you do or want to do, with how you do it. This is accomplished through a series of self-reflection, self-discovery, self-realization activities. By connecting who you are, with what you do, and how you do it, you'll craft a personal brand that is uniquely you. Your personal brand will serve as a compass for you and a beacon for others. When faced with decisions, use your personal brand as a guide and compass to help you make the right decisions for you. When you want others to better understand you, share your personal brand with them to serve as a beacon. At the end of this workshop, you'll have a personal brand that will guide you to live authentically and productively. During this workshop, I'll serve as a guide by sharing relevant information and walking you through self-reflection and self-discovery activities. These activities will open the portal to creating a personal brand that is genuinely you. Living your true self will open doors to the right opportunities for you, and the paths you'll choose will be right for you. The goal is to live authentically and productively, using your personal brand as your compass.
target_audience: This course is intended for people who are in transition, making important decisions, or feel misunderstood and want a better-defined brand. Intended learners may include students, people in life transitions, people who want to change their path, and people who want to show up as their genuine self.

This is an activity-based workshop.  You'll spend the majority of the time completing the activities that will lead you to draft a personal brand statement that is genuinely and authentically you. courses.title: كيف تُحسِّنُ خطّكَ العادي / خط الرُّقْعَةِ نموذجا
courses.bio: من أجل خط جميل و جذاب أقدم لك هذا الدرس حول كيفية تحسين خطك اليومي بإستعمال القلم العادي و لقد اخترت لك خط الرقعة نموذجا
objectives: تحسين خطّك اليومي بإستعمال القلم العادي
requirements: الإلمام باللغة العربية
courses.description:
مرحبا بكم أيها الأحبة في دورة تحسين الخط مع الفنان التشكيلي و المصمم و الخطاط العالمي سامي الغربي
للذين يشكون سوء خطهم و للأولياء الذين يشكون سوء خط أبنائهم ، أقدم لكم هذا الدرس حول كيفية تحسين خطك اليومي باستعمال خط الرقعة الجميل و السهل، مع التدريب و المراس سوف يتحسن خطك تدريجيا.
حسن الخط أمر ضروري لك ان كنت تحتل مركزا اجتماعيا هاما او علميا مرموقا او ثقافيا ، فالخط الحسن يزيد الحق وضوحا كما أُثِر عن الإمام علي رضي الله عنه.
وقال بعض العلماء: الخط كالروح في الجسد، فإذا كان الإنسان جميلًا وسيمًا حسن الهيئة كان في العيون أعظم، وفي النفوس أفخم، وبضد ذلك تسأمه النفوس. فكذلك الخط إذا كان حسن الوصف، مليح الرصف، مفتح العيون، أملس المتون، كثير الائتلاف، قليل الاختلاف، هشت إليه النفوس واشتهته الأرواح، حتى إن الإنسان ليقرؤه- وإن كان فيه كلام دنيء،
أنجزنا هذا الدرس للراغبين في تحسين خطهم من جميع الأعمار.
الخط العربي يحمل لصاحبه الاحترام و التبجيل كما يتيح مجالات واسعة للعمل في مجال التصميم و المشاركة في المعارض الفنية.
انضم اليوم لهذا الكورس و تابع الاستثمار في هذا الفن الرائع و تذكر و أن الخط العربي للإمام كمال و للعالِم جلال و للفقير مال.
بالتوفيق إن شاء الله
target_audience: الكبار و الصغار

requirements: Bu kursu almak için özel bir bilgi veya deneyim gerekmiyor.
Yalnızca kendi iç sesini duymaya ve anlatmaya istekli olman yeterli.
Derslerde verilen PDF görevlerini tamamlamak için bir defter ve kalem bulundurman faydalı olabilir.
courses.description:
Bu kurs, kendi hikâyesini sahici bir şekilde anlatmak ve içerik üretiminde güçlü bir temel oluşturmak isteyen herkes için tasarlanmıştır.
Eğitim süresince;
– İç sesini kullanarak hikâye oluşturmayı,
– Anlatı yapısını doğru bir şekilde kurgulamayı,
– Kendi özgün anlatım tarzını geliştirmeyi,
– Hikâyenin ritmini ve akışını doğru yönetmeyi öğreneceksin.
Ayrıca duygusal bağ kuran anlatılar oluşturmanın tekniklerini keşfedecek ve içerik üretim sürecinde nasıl etkili hikâyeler tasarlayabileceğini adım adım deneyimleyeceksin.
Kurs boyunca sahici anlatımın gücünü nasıl kullanabileceğini, iç sesinle nasıl daha doğal içerikler üretebileceğini ve hikâye anlatımıyla nasıl fark yaratabileceğini öğreneceksin.
Bu kurs, içerik üretmek isteyen bireyler, kişisel marka oluşturmayı hedefleyenler ve anlatı gücünü geliştirmek isteyen herkes için uygundur.
Eğitim sonunda;
– Kendi hikâyeni yapılandırabilecek,
– İç sesinle özgün anlatılar oluşturabilecek,
– Hikâye anlatımı tekniklerini profesyonel şekilde kullanabileceksin.
Öğrendiğin tüm bu becerilerle içerik üretiminde kendine sağlam bir temel oluşturacak ve anlatı yoluyla etkili bir iletişim kurabileceksin.
Bu kurs, herhangi bir ön bilgi gerektirmemektedir.
Sadece öğrenmeye açık olman ve kendi hikâyeni keşfetmek istemen yeterlidir.
Bu kurs sürecinde yalnızca teorik bilgilerle sınırlı kalmayacak,


pratik uygulamalarla öğrendiklerini pekiştirme fırsatı da bulacaksın.


Kendi hikâyeni farklı açılardan değerlendirmeyi öğrenerek, anlatı becerilerini derinleştireceksin.


İç sesinle bağlantı kurarken, yazılı ve sözlü anlatım tekniklerini daha etkili bir şekilde kullanabileceksin.


Farklı anlatı yapılarını deneyimleyerek kendi tarzını keşfedecek, içerik üretiminde daha yaratıcı ve sahici olmanın yollarını göreceksin.


Bu eğitim aynı zamanda içerik üretim sürecinde karşılaşabileceğin anlatım tıkanıklıklarını aşmana da destek olacak.


Kurs sonunda, hikâyeni hem bireysel hem profesyonel alanlarda etkili şekilde kullanabilecek seviyeye geleceksin.


Kendi hikâyen üzerinden içerik üretmek, dinleyiciyle bağ kurmak ve anlatı gücünü artırmak isteyen herkes için güçlü bir başlangıç noktası sunacak.
target_audience: Bu kurs; iç sesini bastırmadan kendini anlatmak isteyen, hikâyesini içerik üretimine dönüştürmek isteyen, sahici ve etkileyici anlatımla insanlara dokunmayı amaçlayan herkes için uygundur. Özellikle kendi hikâyesinden yola çıkarak bir kişisel marka yaratmak ve anlatısıyla iz bırakmak isteyen bireyler için tasarlanmıştır.

courses.title: How To Become A Sleep Consultant
courses.bio: Become a Sleep Consultant & Make Full-Time Money, Work Part-Time Hours & Make a Real Difference in Your Community!
objectives: In-Demand Sleep Consultant Skills
Sleep Consultant Business Basics
Business Support
Confidence
requirements: No prerequisites needed for taking this course. You will learn everything here!

We empower women who aspire to become sleep consultants by certifying them with our proven framework. With this certification, they can have the freedom to do meaningful and flexible work that helps families get better sleep.  To take a course, you need to enroll in the class and pay the course fee. You may also need to have certain materials like pen or paper to take notes - we will provide downloadable assignments where you can take notes too and further brainstorm. Since this is an online course, you will need stable access to a phone, computer, and internet connection.  It is important to come to the course with a positive and open mindset to get the most out of it. Being prepared, organized and having a plan for how best to use your time are all key components for success. Additionally, approaching the course with a willingness to participate in activities can further enhance your learning experience. Finally, remember to take time for yourself - set aside moments throughout the course that are dedicated solely to rest and relaxation.  What you’ll learn in this course  - Basic Branding for Your Business - Your back office set-up including Social Media Planning Tools, Intake Forms, Parent Outreach Tracking Tool, and so much more! - Digital resources and support, covering a wealth of sleep consultant must knows, including: - Science-based sleep training education - How to get started on running your sleep consulting business - How to bridge the gap between the science and the family dynamic, so they can implement your sleep training programs  Good luck on your journey!
courses.description:
I started my journey sleep training my own kiddos after one too many sleepless nights - desperate for something to change.
I utilized my own experiences as a mother, in combination with what I learned in school while obtaining my bachelors degree in biochemistry and psychology, as well as, my masters in medical sciences to develop a sleep training business that is scientifically based AND sensitive to each parents individual needs.
With sleep consulting, you can build the business of your dreams and help a wide variety of families in the process! As a certified sleep consultant with my own thriving practice, I KNOW you can be there for your own kiddos while running a business and I’ve developed my certification to provide you with the tools to create a business…
WITH support from business mentors
WITH guidance in creating your brand
WITH flexible hours to work when you want
WITH no stress of starting and running your own business
All while making a huge difference in families’ lives! And I promise, this is going to be different than anything else you’ve tried before.
You’re finally going to get what you want (and need) out of running a virtual business. During my 6 week certification, we’re going to move past surface-level solutions and generic “insert here” advice.
We’re going to talk about how to set up systems that last, ways to find families that need your support, and how you can show up authentically online and on your social media as you scale.
As a busy mama, I love that sleep consulting offered me…
Flexible hours
High-paying clients that need my services
A low-stress business I could easily scale
The ability to help mamas from culturally-diverse families, like mine
target_audience: Moms looking to make full-time money while working part-time hours

courses.description:
Merhaba,
Yaklaşık 1 senedir iyisiyle, kötüsüyle Birlikte İhracat topluluğunu İlayda, Efe, Ahmet ve Çağrı ile yönetiyorum. Topluluğun bana en büyük katkısı birkaç yüz kişiyi etkilemenin gücünü görmek oldu. Sen de etrafındaki onlarda veya yuzlerce kişiyi (binlerce değil) etkilemek ve dünyaya küçük de olsa faydalı olmanın huzuruyla yaşamak istiyorsan bu deneyim aktarımı tam da sana göre.
Odağım tamamen mikro topluluklar. Bunun ilk nedeni toplulukların büyüdükçe samimiyetini ve ruhunu kaybetmesi, diğeri de büyümenin getirdiği yönetimsel karmaşa ve giderek artan iş gücü ihtiyacı. Hedefe odaklı 20 kişilik bir topluluk bile hedefsiz 10 bin kişilik topluluktan çok daha yüksek bir etkiye sahip olduğunu defalarca gördüm.
Bu deneyim aktarımında sunum üzerinden gitmeyeceğiz. Son 1 senede hata yaparak öğrendiğim bütün konuları saha örnekleriyle anlatmaya çalışacağım. Ayrıca çok önem verdiğim topluluk odağı, oldukça pratik ve işlevsel olan hedef kitle araştırması yöntemimi de seveceğini düşünüyorum.
Sahada kullandığım çizimleri ve akışları da ekran görüntüsü aracılığıyla paylaştım. Gördüklerin eğitim için hazırlanmış ve gerçeklikle bağlantısı olmayan semalardan ziyade gerçek hayatta şu anda kullandığım işlevsel araçlar. Umarım izlerken bu farkı deneyimleme şansına erişirsin.
Bu eğitim ücretsiz çünkü, topluluk üzerinden insanlara destek verdiğimde yaşadığım iç huzuru senin de yaşamanı istiyorum. Çevremizde yönlendirmeye ihtiyaç duyan bu kadar umutsuz kişi varken herkesin mikro çevresini aydınlatabileceğinin hayalini kuruyorum.

requirements: Must have LinkedIn account
courses.description:
Become a Celebrity in Your Industry
I’ve hobnobbed with some cool celebrities. Fortunate to go to school with Britney Spears and Alicia Keys and working with the likes of Heath Ledger, Joaquin Phoenix, Ridley Scott, and Colin Farrell. I know how to get noticed even when you don’t have the fame and fortune to go with it, because I’ve had an inside glimpse into that world.
But celebrity status can come naturally to some while others have to work at it. So, what if I told you that celebrity status is not just for those who walk the red carpet?
You too can be a celebrity in your own industry!
You’ve heard it so many times…don’t judge a book by its cover, but before anyone meets you, your picture is going to play a big role in how anyone and everyone views you. In today’s fast past digital landscape, you need to stand out if you are to create a good impression and that’s why you need to ask yourself this:
What Impression Do You Want to Give Online?
You are building yourself (and perhaps your business) as a brand. Brand building is vital in remaining relevant and top of mind. With platforms like LinkedIn where business people connect, it's becoming more and more important not only to have recognizable expertise, but also a clear value to highlight, promote, and share what your expertise is all about. You can reach over 900 million people in over 200 countries by harnessing the power of LinkedIn alone, so the question is, why not?
If you’re starting a new business, looking for a job change or not sure where you are going next, online visibility can spread the word about your work and experience. But, how do you stand out in the sea of information?
Connect with your Dream Leads
With my 7-day training workshop, I’ll show you exactly how to connect with others effectively and efficiently. This will turn into future work, and more clients, as well as drive leads to your business making it easier to start sales conversations and start building new relationships.
So…. let’s get started. One day left waiting is one day less connecting!
Get ready for stardom!
Sincerely,
Rachel
target_audience: This course is PERFECT for Everyone who is lacking a reputation online. Everyone who is reaching out to new contacts and needs to overcome trust and credibility. courses.title: Unlocking the Code to your Personal Brand
courses.bio: Bestseller guide to build a personal brand that can help you re-evolve to a career and life you love
objectives: The 7 Mantras of an evolved personal brand
Know yourself better to boost your Income, Influence & Impact

Welcome: Why did I make this course?
The Why-What-How of Personal Branding: Why is Personal Branding critical for you?
How to build a strong Personal Brand?

requirements: An open mind and readiness for self reflection
courses.description:
Ever wondered what differentiates successful people from the rest?


It’s not money, power or position.
All these are possible outcomes of being successful.


No.1 differentiator is their belief that they can make an impact in this world.
And that starts with building a strong personal brand.




So, if you are an ambitious professional aspiring for career and life success - maybe a better job, a promotion, a new business opportunity, better relationships, greater happiness; then learning to Unlock the code to your personal brand should be your  first focus area.




What You’ll Learn in this course
The D3 (Discover-Design-Deliver) model of branding is a comprehensive strategic framework to know get to yourself better to boost your income, influence & impact.


Discover yourself through a new lens to know why is Personal Branding super critical for you now. Get your PB index to know where you stand today.
What exactly is Personal Branding and how is it much deeper that what everyone says. (Hint: Wearing branded clothes is not personal branding)
Design your evolved Personal Brand on the merits of your values, strengths & intentions.
Know how the 7 mantras of an evolved brand can help you Deliver your brand consistently Here lies the secret of why some brands click & some don’t
Create your Personal Brand Canvas, the exclusive 1-pager that will guide you to stay on your Branding journey, even after the course is over

courses.description:
Heidi Nazarudin, former financial CEO turned influential fashion blogger,internet Thought Leader, with over 1 Million followers, founder and CEO of her own digital marketing agency, Marque Media, wants to share with you the 10 steps that she personally used, and still does, to create the Ambitionista Brand and curate such a loyal engaged following.  After taking this course you will have knowledge and understanding of the following:
-Know and understand the difference between visual branding and voice branding and how they work together.
-Understand why social media is an absolutely necessary tool for creating a BRAND.
-How to audit your social media to find out where your brand is today and identify and correct any gaps between where you are and where you want to be with your social media.
-Discover what is unique about you and how to begin turning this into your Brand.
-How to get people to care about what you say on Social Media.
-What are the differences between the various Social Media channels and which ones should you invest your time and efforts into.
-How to monitor, assess, and improve your social media numbers to foster development of a highly visible brand which will afford you opportunities in your life that you never imagined possible.
Entrepreneurs, such as Gary V, or Richard Branson, who develop their Brands into international internet phenoms are the rock stars of today.  Everyone wants to recreate or reproduce that success and develop a well known, highly engaged Brand, but the truth is very few actually know how to do this.  With over 1 Million followers across all of her social media platforms and as founder and CEO of a successful digital marketing agency, Heidi Nazarudin doesn't just "teach" others how to do it, she has actually done it.  Sign up today to learn the very same tools, tips, and tricks that Heidi used to curate her social media following into a brand revered and respected the world over.
target_audience: Anyone wanting to learn how to develop a following on Social Media
People wanting to become a highly successful Thought Leader or Influencer
Business owners interested in using social media to develop their business persona into a successful respected Brand
Anyone interested in learning how to get others to care about what they say and think
Anyone currently working for or interested in working in digital marketing, social media or influencer marketing.
Anyone interested in entrepreneurship or starting a business

courses.title: 12 Fantastic Habits for a wonderful personality
courses.bio: Personality Development course for comprehensive success, happiness, health, wealth and relationships in life
objectives: Habit No.01 - LEADERSHIP. A leader is one who thinks and acts before others do it.
Habit No.02 - COURAGE. Willingness to venture into unchartered territory taking risks without fear.
Habit No.03 - INTEGRITY. Complete honesty, complete transparency with high moral values.
Habit No.04 - HUMILITY. Acceptance, self confidant, humble, thankful and traditional.
Habit No.05 - FOCUS. Focus on goals, needs, requirements for maximum productivity.
Habit No.06 - CO OPERATION. Respecting and understanding others for a helpful and collaborative environment.
Habit No.07 - COMMUNICATION. Verbal and non verbal traits for enhanced interpersonal relations.
Habit No.08 - EMPATHY. Putting yourself into other's shoes for maximum understanding and best results.
Habit No.09 - DELEGATION. Right work for the right people empowering them for a bigger picture.
Habit No.10 - CHEERFULNESS. Cheerful yesterday, cheerful today, cheerful tomorrow and cheerful always under all circumstances for prosperity.
Habit No.11 - HARDWORK. There is no substitute for hard work. Hard work never killed anyone.
Habit No.12 - PERSEVERANCE. Persistence, consistency, continuity is the key to success.

What will you be able to learn and do at: Specific learnings at the end of the course
Bonus videos for Job Interviews, Wealth: Tips to Overcome the Fear of Public Speaking
Fantastic Tips for an Effective Presentation

requirements: A working knowledge of English language.
Working knowledge of computer / mobile to run the videos and texts.
No pre requisites of skills or experiences.
Curiosity and Commitment to learn.
Time availability
courses.description:
In today’s fast-paced world, cultivating a positive and magnetic personality is more important than ever. "12 Fantastic Habits for a Wonderful Personality" is an enriching course designed to help you develop the key habits that will enhance your personal and professional life. By the end of this course, you will have the tools to foster self-confidence, improve your interpersonal skills, and become the best version of yourself.
This course is structured around twelve transformative habits that, when practiced consistently, can help you develop a charismatic and appealing personality. Each lesson focuses on a specific habit. Each habit aims to develop your skills into communication, emotional intelligence, self-discipline, gratitude, and mindfulness. You will explore how to manage your thoughts, habits, behaviour and emotions. You will learn how to build lasting relationships and create a positive self-image.
You'll also learn how to incorporate these habits into your daily life. The course emphasizes the importance of consistency, personal growth, the power of persistence, perseverance for achieving high levels of growth in personality. Whether you're looking to advance in your career, enhance your social life, or simply feel more at peace with yourself, this course offers actionable strategies to achieve your goals.
Join us and unlock the secrets to a wonderful personality that attracts success, happiness, health, wealth and meaningful connections in every area of your life!
target_audience: Public Speakers
Corporates
Entrepreneurs
Business Negotiators
Public Representatives
Job Seekers

courses.description:
We'll explore the essential steps to establish and maintain your personal brand on YouTube and Instagram.
In today's digital age, your personal brand acts as your online resume, making it crucial for attracting opportunities, clients, and work offers. Throughout this class, we will cover various crucial aspects, including:


Getting Started on Your Personal Brand:


Define your personal brand identity.
Identify your target audience and niche.
Craft a compelling personal brand story.
Creating a Consistent Look and Feel:


Explore visual elements that align with your brand.
Design a cohesive aesthetic for your content.
Understand the importance of a consistent brand image.
Systematizing Content Production:


Develop a content calendar for consistent posting.
Streamline your content creation process.
Maintain quality while increasing efficiency.
Tools for Personal Branding:


Introduce essential tools for content creation.
Explore editing software, graphic design tools, and analytics platforms.
Understand how to leverage technology to enhance your brand.
Why Personal Branding in 2024:


Analyze the current state of social media and its impact on personal branding.
Understand the opportunities and challenges in the evolving digital landscape.
Explore trends shaping personal branding in 2024.




For your final project, you will create a video that serves as a reference for your ongoing content creation journey. In the resources section, you'll find a comprehensive guidebook to keep you on track.
target_audience: Whether you're a beginner looking to start your online journey or someone with some experience seeking to refine and optimize your personal brand, this course provides valuable insights and practical guidance for a diverse range of individuals.

If you're passionate about sharing your ideas, expertise, or creativity and want to establish a presence on YouTube and Instagram, this course is for you. It provides the foundational knowledge and practical skills to kickstart your journey as a content creator.

Professionals, entrepreneurs, or freelancers who want to enhance their online presence and personal brand to attract opportunities, clients, or job offers will benefit from this course. It guides you in leveraging social media platforms strategically.

courses.bio: Bạn có mong muốn chia sẻ những gì mình tâm đắc? Hãy tìm hiểu cách để xuất bản 1 cuốn sách và trở thành 1 tác giả sách
objectives: Xác định mục tiêu xuất bản cho mình một cuốn sách
Xây dựng kế hoạch thực hiện nội dung sách
Các phương án triển khai xuất bản hiệu quả
Hoàn thành cuốn sách và giới thiệu đến công chúng ra sao?

Ai cũng có thể trở thành Tác gia: Đơn giản là sự chia sẻ
Để nâng cao thương hiệu cá nhân
Giá trị mà bạn mang lại?
Hành trình nội dung cuốn sách của bạn: Mọi thứ cần được nuôi dưỡng
Làm thế nào để hình thành thói quen viết?
Phiên bản nào là tốt nhất?
Được in hay không nhỉ?: Đặt mình trong mối quan hệ hợp tác
Hãy tập trung vào thứ bạn giỏi nhất
Đơn giản là chờ đợi: Mỗi cuốn sách là một số phận
Dự trù ngân sách cho việc xuất bản: Toàn bộ chi phí liên quan xuất bản

requirements: Không yêu cầu điều kiện, miễn là bạn thích
courses.description:
Nếu bạn xuất hiện với vai trò một tác gia, có một vài cuốn sách đã xuất bản thì hình ảnh của bạn có trở nên đặc biệt hơn không?
Ai cũng có thể viết, có những nội dung tâm đắc hay dày công nghiên cứu nào đó, nhưng liệu nó có thể trở thành một cuốn sách hay tác phẩm để đời?
Viết sách và xuất bản sách cũng là một dạng kỹ năng, một nghề, cần tìm hiểu và học hỏi để tìm được cách thức tiếp cận hiệu quả, phù hợp với năng lực và mục tiêu của mỗi người.
Trong khoá học này các bạn sẽ được tiếp cận những kinh nghiệm của tác giả Trần Công Danh (Danh Trần) trên hành trình xuất bản sách, bao gồm:
Xác định mục tiêu xuất bản sách
Xây dựng nội dung
Cách thức xuất bản
Và sau đó...
Ngoài ra khoá học cũng cho bạn những "kinh nghiệm xương máu" mà Danh đã trải qua, để bạn cần tránh và không phải đâm đầu vào một hướng tiếp cận nào đó vô ích.
Hi vọng rằng, sau khoá học này, các bạn sẽ có được những đứa con tinh thần chào đời.
target_audience: Mọi đối tượng yêu thích sách và có mong muốn trở thành tác gia

courses.title: 個人品牌經營術｜感召人心的品牌方程式
courses.bio: 每個人都有被喜歡的條件與受歡迎的能力！善用品牌經營，活出自己想要的樣貌。
objectives: 1.學習了解如何探索自我
2.增進社交與聊天技巧
3.建立屬於自我形象
4.獨家社交心法大公開
5.點出自我的盲點與優點
6.打造自我的個人品牌

誰跟你心靈雞湯: 如何接受自己，了解優缺點
人際關係幾分熟: 不再裝熟-福爾摩斯交友法
如何優雅的爭執，瀟灑的道別: 換位思考 建立自我

requirements: 無需特別經驗，可立即上手！
對個人品牌規劃與打造有興趣者
courses.description:
前言：
如何打造個人品牌、解決社交困擾，增添個人魅力以及桃花？這裡沒有勵志小語，也不是心靈雞湯，只有掏心掏肺的血淋淋真實經驗，不浮誇保證使你成眾人眼光，幫助你在社交這條路上不那麼跌跌撞撞。畢竟人生嘛，只能靠自己走出來，那麼「個人品牌」也是，唯有你真正心領神會並實行課程所分享的方法，才能走出自我之路。


一、課程大綱
(一) 誰跟你心靈雞湯
這不是勵志語錄，而是要你落實做到
1.你不可能滿足所有人
2.學習與情緒共處，接受所有的自己
3.誠實面對自己的好與壞
4.不害怕失誤


(二) 社交是什麼，能吃嗎？
沒有一定要，但你坐在這代表你內心至少有一點渴望
1.社交到底是什麼
2.社交帶來的潛在優點
3.標準答案很主觀，多數主觀相同時，會形成社會的客觀
4.內向社交法


(三) 人際關係幾分熟
媽啦！不要再跟我尬聊
1.新局不用怕，開話題小秘訣
2.福爾摩斯交友法
3.誰准你裝熟，如何明確不失禮的表態
4.好聊評分表


(四) 如何優雅的爭執，瀟灑的道別
同溫層這麼溫暖，何必非得脫離
1.是人就一定會有磨合，如何表達自己想法與感受
2.無法溝通有兩種原因，語言不同、觀念不同
3.換位不只要思考，還要真正執行跟討論
4.並不是所有時候，我們都得跳脫舒適圈


二、課程精選
1.為什麼你無法滿足其他人？
2.情緒是如何產生的？
3.社交到底是什麼？
4.如何明確不失禮的表態？


三、講師介紹
姓名：Mandy


現任
1.翔泰學校 Tai School - 客座講師


2.知名行銷公司-專案經理

3.各大專院校企業組織-知名講師


專長
廣告、行銷、公關、舞蹈


學歷
銘傳大學 廣告系


經歷
1.104職涯分享
2.交大客座行銷講師
3.公司內外訓練、固定直播講師
4.於網路廣告界橫跨廣告、企劃、專案不同職位。
5.具有多種不同活動、管道的講課經驗。
6.經常出國跳舞，人脈國際化。


關於老師｜
於網路廣告界橫跨廣告、企劃、專案不同職位，具有多種不同活動、管道的講課經驗，熱愛舞蹈經常出國跳舞，人脈國際化。
target_audience: 1.想打造「個人品牌」者
2.進一步探索社交關係
3.應酬上感到困擾迷惘的人
4.無法了解自己需求
5.想要精進與重塑自我
6.對本課程有興趣的人

courses.bio: Take control of how people perceive you with a powerful Personal Brand. Stand out as a respected expert in your field.
objectives: Become THE #1 AUTHORITY in your field, the Go-To Person for all your past and future clients.

Stop consuming, start creating!

Preparing The Trip: The Front Stage of Your Business
How Much Money Do You Need?
Are you ready for the trip?

courses.description:
The labour market has gone crazy. Business competition is increasing dramatically. Advertising strategies are becoming more aggressive each day.

In a hyper competitive world, self-branding became a mandatory condition for success.
A good definition of Personal Branding is that it is “the conscious and intentional effort to influence the public perception of an individual”.
And this is exactly why it is crucial to cultivate your Personal Brand: because your qualities need to be known and appreciated.
You want to be able to influence the public perception of yourself, increase your visibility, strengthen your crediblity, position yourself as an authority, and generate income from your personal brand.
In this complete course, Alessandro Principe will guide you through all the steps involved in designing, building and maintaining an effective Personal Brand - the ultimate solution for taking control of your public image and dominating the market.
All topics are discussed in depth, with concrete examples and exercies, plus free ressources and real-life advice that can be applied immediately to your activity.
After the completion of this course, you will be able to:
Clearly define your core values and your mission. Find the unique forces that make you irreplaceable.
Enhance your visibility and your persuation skills.
Define clear goals for your Personal Branding strategy.
Cultivate and strengthen your credibility and authority as a professional.
Understand the needs of your customers and create a Buyer Persona.
Shape your image the way you want to be perceived by your clients.
Prepare a Content Strategy and a Content Calendar for your social media.
Position yourself as an expert in your domain.
You already are a great person and have a unique combination of skills and experiences that make you the best in what you do.

With the help of this course, you will tell the world about it, extend your network, grow your reputation and stand out in your professional circle as a great human being and a respected professional.
target_audience: Professionals willing to grow their online presence and influence.

Неделя 2: Интервью с Динарой Сатжан. Личный бренд и бизнес

requirements: специальных навыков не требуется
courses.description:
Личный бренд - это имя, которое помогает быть дороже на рынке, успешно продвигать свои услуги и продукты.


"Имея сильный личный бренд, вам не придется просить блогеров или друзей, чтобы вас прорекламировали или о вас рассказали! Напротив, будут обращаться к вам!
На курсе сможете определить область своей экспертности, проведете опрос среди своих знакомых, друзей, родственников. Затем мы с вами проработаем стратегию личного бренда, чтобы у вас появилось ясное понимание того, какие шаги нужно будет предпринять. А затем мы приступим к главному - мы начнём ДЕЙСТВОВАТЬ! И начнем действовать уже с первых дней курса.
Важной составляющей курса являются домашние задания, системное выполнение которых продвинет вас к развитию вашего личного бренда и бизнеса! На курсе у вас также будет “Дневник личного бренда”, а самое главное - вы станете частью большого сообщества моих выпускников, где мы друг друга поддерживаем" — Динара Сатжан


Динара Сатжан - известная в Казахстане телеведущая, предприниматель и фэшн-продюсер. С 2002 года Динара проработала на телевидении в качестве ведущей и журналиста новостей на республиканских телеканалах «Астана» и «Агентство «Хабар», также была автором, продюсером и ведущей тв-проектов «Статус QUO" и «Sky-Студия» на телеканале «Astana». В 2017 году занималась ребрендингом Национального телеканала «Qazaqstan".
С 2010 года по настоящее время Динара является владельцем шоу-румов казахстанских дизайнеров в Астане «Aida Kaumenova" и «Dinara Satzhan Fashion Group», а также совладелицей бутик-отеля «Монако» в Астане.
Динара Сатжан является блогером с миллионной аудиторией в Instagram.
target_audience: Все, кто хочет создать и развить свой Личный Бренд

courses.title: 평범한 직장인이 브랜드가 되는 방법
courses.bio: 평범한 당신도 '브랜드'가 될 수 있습니다.
objectives: 모호했던 브랜딩의 정의를 확실하게 알려드립니다.
당신의 삶에 개인 브랜딩이 필요한 세 가지 이유를 배웁니다.
글쓰기를 통한 구체적인 개인 브랜딩 전략 수립
브랜드 마일스톤을 만들어 지속가능한 사이드 프로젝트 만드는 방법을 배웁니다.

글쓰기를 통한 구체적인 개인 브랜딩 전략: 개인 브랜딩을 시작하고 만들어 가는 법
글쓰기로 개인 브랜딩하기: 내 콘텐츠 발굴하는 방법과 사이드 프로젝트 설계

requirements: 요구 사항 또는 필요 조건은 없습니다.
courses.description:
POINT 1. 당신이 바로 '브랜드'입니다
'저는 너무 평범해서 어려울 것 같은데...'
아니요! 장담컨대, 이 클래스를 통해 당신도 브랜드가 될 수 있습니다.


POINT 2. 안정적인 삶을 유지하세요
본업을 포기하며 사이드 프로젝트에 몰두하라는 무책임한 이야기는 안합니다.
안정적인 본업, 월급을 유지하세요. 본업이 없으면 부업이 없고,  본캐가 없으면 부캐도 없습니다.


POINT 3. 누구든 브랜드가 될 수 있는 가장 감당 가능한 방법, '글쓰기'
글쓰기가 필요없다고요? '글쓰기'는 모든 콘텐츠의 밑바탕입니다.
글쓰기를 못해서 걱정되신다고요? 글쓰기와 전혀 관련없던 저도 이 방법을 통해 베스트셀러 작가가 되었습니다.
또한 현업에서 사용하는 구체적인 개인 브랜딩 전략으로 여러분의 브랜딩 수립 과정에 도움이 되도록 하겠습니다.


안녕하세요. 스테르담입니다.
평범한 직장인인 저는 회사 이름을 빼면 나는 무엇일까라는 묵직한 질문을 맞이했고 번아웃과 슬럼프에 시달렸습니다.
정말로 평범했던 저는 이제 제 이름을 걸고 강연을 하고 책을 내고 수많은 사람들과 만나며 이전과 전혀 다른 삶을 살고 있습니다. 제가 어떻게 이렇게 개인 브랜딩을 구축할 수 있었을까요?
돌아보니, 그 모든 것은 제 자신으로 시작되었습니다.


사람들은 특별한 게 있어야 브랜딩을 할 수 있다고 생각합니다. 그러나 '가장 개인적인 것이 가장 창의적인 것이다'라는 말을 돌이켜보면, 내 평범함은 어느 누구에겐 특별함이 됩니다. 이 클래스를 들으시면 평범함에서 특별함을 알아차릴 수 있는 방법을 알게 되고 스스로 만든 콘텐츠를 어떻게 브랜딩할 수 있는지 알게 됩니다.
'저는 너무 평범해서 어려울 것 같은데...'라고 생각하시나요? 아니요! 장담컨대, 이 클래스를 통해 당신도 브랜드가 될 수 있습니다.
target_audience: 자신은 평범하다고 생각하는 직장인
평범하지만 개인 브랜딩을 만들어보고 싶은 분
내 특별함을 발굴하고 브랜드로 연결하고 싶은 분
현업을 유지하며 사이드 프로젝트에 도전하고 싶은 분
'회사 이름을 빼면 난 무엇일까...?' 고민 하시는 분
직장 생활 이후가 불안하고 고민되시는 분

In the last 20 years I have built a business from just two people to twenty and head up the sales element of said business. I have spent the last five years training my clients face to face in how to use this incredibly powerful platform. I've taken that content and created this online course so you can be sure that the material has been tried and tested over a number of years.
In this course I'll take you through my methods for ensuring your profile has the edge over your competitors. I'll teach you how to build your networks quickly and effectively. I'll teach you how to use the platform to generate opportunities for you or your business.

I hope to see you on the course. All feedback is always welcome.

Como seria a sua vida se as suas habilidades e conhecimento fossem devidamente reconhecidos? Sua carreira seria melhor ou pior do que é hoje?
Existe um ditado que diz: “não basta ser bom, tem que parecer bom.”
Talvez você me pergunte: como fazer marketing pessoal sem cair na autopromoção barata ou parecer arrogante?
Neste curso, separei as estratégias que aplico na minha vida há mais de 36 anos e que me ajudaram a construir uma carreira internacional e negócios prósperos.
Trata-se de conteúdo prático e atual para você aplicar rapidamente e começar a melhorar os seus resultados em pouco tempo. O curso é composto de 20 vídeoaulas separadas em 11 módulos para você construir um plano de ação estratégico. São mais de 5 horas de conteúdo prático e atual.
Você aprenderá como melhorar a percepção que as pessoas têm a seu respeito e como construir um posicionamento sólido que lhe ajude a se destacar da multidão de concorrentes.
Você sabia que 70% das contratações acontecem dentro da rede de contatos?
Tenho absoluta certeza que tive um enorme crescimento profissional graças a uma boa rede de contatos e eu vou te ensinar os 7 passos para construir um Networking de sucesso e transformar a sua rede de amigos em um mar de oportunidades.
Você vai ver também, como usar as redes sociais de forma estratégica e como transformar o Linkedin em uma máquina de divulgação da sua marca pessoal.
Esses e outros assuntos serão abordados por mim de forma objetiva e direta para que você aplique imediatamente o que aprendeu e colha os resultados positivos rapidamente.
Será um prazer compartilhar esse conhecimento prático com você. Te aguardo na aula 1.
Até breve!

courses.description:
Belajar Artificial Intelligence (AI) dari Nol hingga penguasaan" Langkah demi Langkah
Selamat datang di perjalanan Anda menuju penguasaan kecerdasan buatan! Kursus ini dirancang khusus untuk Siapa Saja yang ingin memahami AI dari dasar hingga Perkembangan Terkini. Tidak ada pengalaman sebelumnya yang diperlukan – kami akan memandu Anda setiap langkahnya.
Apa yang Akan Anda Pelajari:
Sejarah dan Fondasi AI: Mulai dari Sejarah dan konsep dasar hingga pemahaman mendalam tentang kecerdasan buatan. Alias Pelajari tentang sejarah, definisi, dan berbagai jenis AI.

Bagaimana tetap bersaing di Era AI, atau Bagaimana mendidik Anak Di Era AI

Etika dan Implikasi Sosial AI: Memahami implikasi etis dan sosial dari penggunaan AI. Anda akan belajar tentang isu-isu seperti bias dalam data, privasi, dan dampak sosial AI dalam masyarakat.
Metode Pembelajaran:
Video pembelajaran berkualitas tinggi yang dirancang untuk memandu Anda dari konsep dasar hingga tingkat lanjutan.
Akses ke komunitas online yang ramah, di mana Anda dapat berdiskusi dengan sesama peserta kursus dan instruktur untuk mendapatkan dukungan tambahan.
Hasil yang Diharapkan:
Setelah menyelesaikan kursus ini, Anda akan memiliki pemahaman yang kuat tentang AI dan keterampilan praktis yang diperlukan untuk membangun model AI yang efektif. Anda akan siap untuk melangkah ke dunia karier AI atau menjelajahi proyek-proyek AI Anda sendiri dengan percaya diri.
Jadi, bergabunglah dengan kami dalam perjalanan menarik ini dan mulailah menjelajahi potensi tak terbatas dari kecerdasan buatan!
target_audience: Pelajar dan Mahasiswa, Profesional Teknologi, Para pengusaha, Tenaga Kerja Umum, Pemerintah dan Pembuat Kebijakan, Termasuk Masyarakat Umum: Karena Semua orang akan terlibat dengan teknologi AI dalam berbagai aspek kehidupan mereka. Oleh karena itu, memahami dasar-dasar AI dapat membantu individu dalam membuat keputusan yang lebih baik, mengurangi ketakutan akan teknologi, dan berpartisipasi dalam diskusi etika dan kebijakan yang berkaitan dengan AI
Singkatnya, belajar kecerdasan buatan tidak hanya relevan untuk orang-orang tertentu, tetapi penting bagi siapa pun yang ingin beradaptasi dengan dunia yang semakin didorong oleh teknologi ini!

requirements: No prior experience needed. This course is beginner-friendly and open to anyone passionate about movement, music, and community facilitation.

courses.description:
Are you passionate about free dance movement, music, and creating transformational spaces for connection and self-expression? This comprehensive course is your guide to becoming an Ecstatic Dance facilitator and organizer, equipping you with everything you need to host powerful events that bring people together in profound and meaningful ways.
Through this course, you will:


Explore the roots of Ecstatic Dance with a short history of dance and trance as sacred practices.
Master the art of holding space and creating a safe, inclusive environment for participants.
Integrate mind-body practices and learn to use dance as a universal language for healing and connection.
Dive into an hour-long series of warm-up exercises and connection games designed to engage groups and foster authentic connections.
Practice practical exercises to help participants deepen their relationship with themselves and others.
Learn how to guide 3 unique Cacao ceremonies for heart-opening and intention-setting during your events.
Gain access to resources on Ecstatic Dance guidelines and an exclusive video with detailed know-how on creating, organizing, and facilitating an A to Z Ecstatic Dance event.
Learn how to create and sustain a conscious community
Whether you’re an aspiring facilitator, a wellness practitioner, or someone looking to incorporate Ecstatic Dance into your offerings, this course provides everything you need—from tools and techniques to deep, experiential practices.
By the end of this course, you’ll feel confident leading groups, holding space with presence, and organizing transformative Ecstatic Dance events that inspire creativity, connection, and joy.
Take this course to bring the magic of Ecstatic Dance to life and create unforgettable experiences for yourself and others!
target_audience: Aspiring Ecstatic Dance facilitators looking to create transformational events.
Event organizers interested in adding Ecstatic Dance and Cacao ceremonies to their offerings.
Wellness practitioners and facilitators seeking to expand their skillset with movement, connection games, and ceremonial practices.
Anyone passionate about music, dance, and creating a safe, heart-centered space for community connection.

courses.description:
Do you want to be more powerful and influential in business?
If you struggle to get your ideas recognised, then you know how it feels to be overlooked and ignored. I’m here to help you change that! In this course, we'll tackle this issue by focusing on your body language. More specifically, you'll learn confident, powerful body language gestures for the workplace.
Learning how to use body language for more impact and influence is a skill every driven business person needs. Why? Your body language is a tool that magnifies your communication and makes you stand out as a person of authority.
However for women, powerful, confident body language is often difficult to embrace; it’s not part of our natural demeanor and it’s not what society traditionally expects from us.
In many backgrounds and cultures, women are raised to be nurturing, kind and nice. We learn to incorporate gentle, soft body language gestures that align with this image. Think: tilting your head, smiling or taking up as little space as possible.
But, when we reach adulthood and enter the business world, these gestures no longer serve us. In fact, they become a hindrance to our professional development and goals. They don't make us look confident at work!
And for people coming from more reserved cultures who are working in the Western business world, appearing more confident can be a real challenge. You might wonder how you can look as confident as Western business women. Well, it is possible. This course will definitely help you in this area.
What happens when you use body language that does NOT speak confidence?
You're overlooked at work.
Your opinions or ideas aren't noticed or truly heard.
You miss out on promotions that you deserve.
You don't have the impact you want.
But in this course, you will learn the exact body language postures and gestures to help you look and feel confident at work!
Whether you come from a background where women weren't encouraged to be confident and powerful, or whether you come from a more reserved culture and you want to succeed in the Western business world, this course is exactly what you need to break out of your shell!
I've worked with many women in a coaching capacity who have experienced the hurdles I described above. With simple changes we've made to their body language, they now get noticed and respected the way they deserve. They're no longer held back in their career and they can progress to amazing heights!
Since body language counts for a large percentage of your overall communication (which you'll learn about in this course), it's something you cannot neglect. Paired with assertive communication and overall professionalism, you're bound to be recognised as a confident, capable professional.
In the 34 videos you’re about to watch and the challenges I’ve set for you, you will learn an array of powerful, confident body language gestures. You will learn how to use those gestures so you can communicate with more impact and influence.
This course will help you to:
Understand the unique body language advantage that women have over men.
Understand body language hurdles that women face.
Use your posture, head, legs, arms, hands, personal space, body orientation, eye contact, and objects around you for heightened power and authority.
Apply powerful, confident body language gestures to networking events, business meetings, presentations, and negotiations.
Avoid mistakes women often make with their body language.
Feel more confident.
Powerful, confident body language has been critically important for me as a businesswoman. Growing up very reserved and shy, I've learned how to use body language to help me appear confident to others (even if I don't feel it 100% inside) and to help me feel confident internally as well. And as a leadership coach, I now teach this body language to my executive level clients and they see amazing results.
I want to teach this confident body language to you too, so you can get these same results. So you can make others to see you as the confident, powerful women that you are.
No holding back. Let’s go!


********
Here's what other students have said about this course:
"Almost every weak area in women’s personality is highlighted with amazing correction and confident body language tips" - Shekhar
"This course has assisted me in bettering my understanding and view on how to be more confident especially in meetings. Thank you!" - Gilda
"I have learned a lot to be more confident at work and in public spaces, thank thank so much, much appreciated." - Alice
Read more reviews of this course below.


Note: Even though this course is designed for women, I've had many men take this course and see fantastic results. If you're a man and you're more on the shy, introverted or humble side and you can relate to being overlooked at work, then you will definitely get a lot out of this course too. Watch some of the free preview videos below to decide for yourself.

ダウンロード、印刷して使う「ワークシート」に記入をしながら進めていきます
courses.description:
ここ数年で仕事環境や働き方が大きく変わり、漠然とした先の不安をお持ちではありませんか？


▸これからどのようにキャリアを積んでいけば良いのか？
▸今の漠然とした不安から抜け出すために、まずどこから手をつければ良いのか？
と、お悩みの方のために。


このコースでは、自分の在り方、「自分軸」を見つけていきます。


自分には何ができるのか？


このコースでは、あなたの今までの棚卸しを行い、それを整理し、分析をしていきます。このコースを修了した時には、
・自分の価値観、判断軸となる「自分軸」を整えることができます
・自分の強みが見えてきます
・自分にできること、今やるべきことが見えてきます


パーソナルブランディングにも欠かせない内容となっています。
まず、今の自分の立ち位置を明確にする。
将来の漠然とした不安に悩まされるよりも、これからを生き抜くために、あなたの能力を最大限に発揮する方法を、一緒に考えていきましょう！
target_audience: 仕事環境や働き方が大きく変わり、漠然とした先の不安を抱えている方
これからどのようにキャリアを積んでいけば良いのか、お悩みの方
起業を考えているけれど、自身の得意分野がぼやけている方
講演会など人前でスピーチをすることになり、自身の棚卸しが必要な方
自分らしい生き方とは何か？お悩みの方
ブレない生き方をしていきたいとお考えの方
自分の価値観をしっかり持ち、判断力を鍛えたい方
パーソナルブランド構築のために、自身の強みをみつけたい方

In this course, Rolf Kramer will help you walk a mile in the shoes of the modern recruiter and hiring manager.  You'll get practical tips on how to be found easily and present a personal brand that entices conversations with potential employers and recruiters, giving you a leg up on your competition for the role.

courses.title: Creëer een succesvol Personal Branding Plan in 8 stappen
courses.bio: De P’s van P-Plan helpen je stap voor stap met het bouwen van een krachtig personal brand.
objectives: Het creëren van een succesvol personal brand
Inzichtelijk te krijgen wie je diep van binnen bent, en waarom je de dingen doet die je doet
100% jezelf durven te zijn
Moeilijke keuzes maken

Het managen van je personal brand met handige planningtips

Welkom: Een korte introductie in Personal Branding
PLAY!: PLAY! – De belangrijkste waarde van P-Plan
Hoe ga jij het leuk houden voor jezelf? | 7 PLAY!-principes
Purpose: Purpose – De basis van je Personal Brand
Zelfonderzoek 2 - Onderzoek wat je NIET wilt
Zelfonderzoek 3 - Onderzoek wat je zou willen bijdragen
Tips voor het bepalen van je purpose
Voorbeelden en richtlijnen bij het formuleren van je purpose
Persoonlijkheid: Gebruik je zelfkennis als persoonlijke handleiding
Laat je van je sterke kanten zien
Potentieel: Alles wat je aandacht geeft groeit
Welke kennis en vaardigheden sluiten mooi aan op jouw purpose?
Wat valt er nog te leren? Leerplan opstellen
UsP (Unique Selling Point): In hoeverre wil jij uniek zijn?
Promotie: Promotie – Hoe wil jij jezelf laten zien?
Hoe belangrijk is zelfpromotie? – Liona’s verhaal
Wat laat je wel/niet van jezelf zien?
Uitstraling – Je visual branding plan opstellen
– Bepaal de basis van je kledingstijl
Power: Powerrrrr – Tijd om de schouders eronder te zetten
Power habit 2: Omring je met de juiste mensen

requirements: De wil om dingen te doen die: 100% vanuit jouw eigen drijfveren komen;
op een 100% unieke manier die bij jou past;
zodat jij 100% zelfverzekerd naar buiten kunt treden.
courses.description:
Waarom personal branding?
Personal branding kun je zien als de manier waarop jij jezelf ‘als merk’ presenteert aan anderen. Net als bij een merk wil je dat jouw naam gekoppeld wordt aan een positief beeld. Personal Branding gaat dus over het ‘vermarkten’ van jezelf, maar dan wel op een hele authentieke manier. Doordat je duidelijk uitdraagt wie je bent, zul je de juiste dingen aantrekken in je leven (zoals opdrachten, banen, baanpromoties, maar ook in het persoonlijke leven; de juiste vrienden/partners).
Daarnaast is het verdiepen in je personal brand een goed moment om inzichtelijk te krijgen wie je diep van binnen bent, en waarom je de dingen doet die je doet. Het geeft ook je zelfvertrouwen een flinke boost!


Voor wie is Personal Branding?
Personal Branding is voor iedereen die te maken heeft met verandering, of graag een verandering wil in zijn leven. Herken jij jezelf in één of meerdere voorbeelden hieronder? Dan is Personal Branding ook iets voor jou.
Ben je op zoek naar een baan, of loop je vast in je huidige baan?
Sta je voor een (studie)keuze die je lastig vindt?
Wil je het beste uit jezelf halen, maar heb je hiervoor altijd veilige keuzes gemaakt waar je geen voldoening uit haalt?
Is je relatie net uit en ben je een beetje kwijt wie je zélf bent (zonder je partner)?
Ben je uit de kast gekomen? Dan is het voor jou tijd om eindelijk 100% jezelf te zijn, maar weet je eigenlijk wel wie dat is?
Wil je iets bereiken, maar heb je daarvoor de goedkeuring van anderen nodig en moet je hen eerst zien te overtuigen?
Verkeer je je stiekem een beetje in een quarterlife- of midlife crisis?
Voel je je vaak eenzaam en wil je daarom meer ondernemen in je vrije tijd?
Weet je wel wat je wilt, maar niet hoe je er moet komen?
Personal Branding helpt je als je moeilijke keuzes moet maken, maar ook als je jezelf wilt presenteren en 100% jezelf wilt zijn. Wat ons betreft, is Personal Branding daarom voor iedereen. We hebben allemaal momenten in ons leven waarop het fijn is om te weten dat we op onszelf kunnen vertrouwen, momenten waarop we wel een extra boost kunnen gebruiken. Juist op die momenten biedt Personal Branding hulp.
target_audience: Zelfstandig ondernemers
Studenten
Werkzoekenden

courses.title: Stand Out, Get Hired — Land Dream Jobs with Personal Brand
courses.bio: Master personal branding and get picked for high-quality roles—without begging or chasing opportunities.

Introduction: Build Upon Your Most Valuable Skill
Implementation: Building Specitivity Around Your Personal Brand
Acing Communication With The Right CV

requirements: No prior knowledge of personal branding or marketing is needed
You should have a career goal or job role you're targeting
You’ll need access to LinkedIn or a professional platform (optional but helpful)
A willingness to show up, apply what you learn, and take action
Pen, notebook, or Google Docs to capture your personal brand insights and templates
Internet connection to watch the video lessons and download resources
courses.description:
Are you tired of sending out endless job applications and hearing nothing back?
Do you feel qualified, capable, and ready—yet constantly overlooked by recruiters, HR managers, or decision-makers?
If that sounds familiar, you're not alone. And more importantly, it’s not your fault.
In today’s competitive job market, being “good” isn’t good enough. The way you present and position yourself often matters more than what’s written on your CV. That’s where this course comes in.
“Stand Out – The Jobseeker’s Edge to Getting Hired” is a practical, no-fluff roadmap that teaches you how to use personal branding to attract job opportunities—without excessive pitching, begging, or chasing.
This isn’t about learning how to write the “perfect CV.” It’s about learning how to position yourself as the obvious choice before the interview even begins. When done right, your brand speaks for you—silently and powerfully—before you say a word.
Inside this course, you'll learn how to craft a personal brand that gets noticed by recruiters, hiring managers, and decision-makers—even if you don’t have years of experience, big credentials, or fancy connections.
Whether you’re:
A recent graduate looking to land your first serious opportunity,
A mid-career professional feeling stuck or invisible,
Or a jobseeker in Nigeria (or globally) trying to rise above the noise…
This course will give you the edge you’ve been missing.
target_audience: Jobseekers who are tired of being overlooked
Recent graduates looking to break into competitive roles
Professionals who want better job offers without constant applying
Anyone who wants to stand out, not shout, in the job market
People looking to leverage personal branding as a career edge

courses.description:
GAMMAでAIスライド完全攻略！初心者でも文章入力だけで構成・デザイン・共有までの資料作成を自動化！
「要点が散らばる・デザインが決まらない・センスがない」そんな悩みを解消！Freeプラン対応でChatGPTを駆使し、PDF出力・Web共有までサポート。文章入力だけで短時間で魅せるスライドをプロ品質に仕上げます。


はじめに
こんにちは、Udemyベストセラー講師 & Udemy Business認定講師のないとです。
本コースは、AIスライド生成ツールGammaを使って「構成設計」「デザイン調整」「共有・書き出し」までを最短ルートで身につける実践ガイドです。PowerPointやCanvaとの違いも整理し、「作るのに時間がかかる」「見た目がバラバラ」「情報が整理できない」という悩みを、【文章を入れるだけ】で解決します。


このコースの概要説明
作業時間が膨らみ続ける、それがプレゼン資料の最大の落とし穴です。
Gammaはテキストから構成・レイアウト・配色を自動提案し、Webページ／PDF／PPTまで一気通貫で出力。さらにMarkdown・URL取り込み・ChatGPT連携で、下準備から清書までを一気にショートカットできます。
本コースは、初心者でも「今すぐ運用」できる順序で解説。無料プランでのクレジット節約術などの裏ワザまで詰め込みました。


【コースで学べること】
テキスト一発生成で骨子→スライドを完成させる手順
テーマ（デザイン）の切替だけで“見た目が整う”仕組み
ブロック操作／表・レイアウト／装飾の要点と時短パターン
Markdown・URL・ファイルからスライド作成する方法
ChatGPT連携で“伝わりやすい”スライドに最適化するコツ
無料プランでも10枚以上を量産する実践的な節約術
PDF出力・共有URLまでの配布方法


コースを受講することで
テキストから3分で“見たくなる”スライドを作れるようになります
「構成が弱い」をAIの提案で補強し、説得力を底上げできます
社内外の共有をURL／PDFで即時に回せるようになります
無料プラン運用で、コストを抑えながら実務投入できます


こんな方が受講に向いています
企画・営業・教育などで短時間で資料を量産したい方
デザインに自信がなく、テンプレで安定品質を出したい方
情報が散らかりがちで、整理→構成→清書を自動化したい方
ChatGPTをスライド作成に組み込みたい方
副業・個人事業で配布物や提案資料の品質を底上げしたい方


このコースは全部で8セクションです
1｜はじめに：受講の進め方、復習法、ワークの使い方
2｜Gammaの全体像：PowerPoint／Canvaとの違い、プランと使い分け
3｜基本操作：新規作成→テーマ変更→ブロック編集の最短ルート
4｜AI一発生成：短文→自動構成、Markdown／URL／ChatGPT連携
5｜魅せる編集：レイアウト・表・装飾・メディア・プレゼンモード
6｜無料で最大活用：クレジット節約・再利用・出力と共有術
7｜総まとめ
8｜ボーナスレクチャー


最後に
資料づくりは作業ではなく、伝える仕組みです。
GammaとAIワークフローを組み合わせれば、短時間で安定品質のスライドが量産できます。今すぐ学び、あなたの毎日を“考えることに集中できる時間”へアップグレードしましょう。
受講後は、良かった点や改善点をぜひレビューで教えてください。
次回以降の改善に活かします。


補足


専門用語は最小限・手順は一つずつ・例示は実務寄り
機能説明だけでなく、使いどころと判断基準を重視
仕様は各サービスの更新で変わる可能性があります。コース内では原則として現時点の正確性を担保し、応用の考え方まで解説します。


受講ページの「今すぐ受講する」から、あなたの制作フローを今日変えていきましょう。
target_audience: 資料作成に時間がかかり、短時間で高品質なAIスライドを量産したい企画・営業職の方
デザインに自信がなく、Gammaでテンプレ活用し整った資料を効率的に仕上げたい教育・研修担当者
ChatGPT連携を使い、説得力のあるプレゼン資料を自動生成したい副業・個人事業主
