courses.title: Scrivi e pubblica il tuo libro in 24 ore con ChatGPT
courses.bio: Come valorizzare e condividere la tua competenza con l'aiuto dell'Intelligenza Artificiale
objectives: Che cos'è ChatGPT
Come collaborare correttamente con ChatGPT
Quali sono le domande da porsi prima di iniziare a scrivere un libro
Come organizzare il materiale per il tuo libro
Come modificare e personalizzare il testo
Come farsi aiutare da ChatGPT a scegliere il titolo e la grafica
Come evitare la standardizzazione e il plagio
Come pubblicare il tuo libro scegliendo l'opzione migliore
Come creare un piano di marketing per promuovere il tuo libro
Come ottenere recensioni positive per il tuo libro

Introduzione: Introduzione a ChatGPT e a come ci può essere d'aiuto
Chiarire gli obiettivi e generare le idee
Ordinare i capitoli e preparare la struttura del libro
Come migliorare e perfezionare i risultati
Scegliere il titolo e la copertina
Pubblicare il libro: le varie opzioni

requirements: Non è richiesto alcun requisita, tranne l'aver qualcosa da dire e il desiderio di condividerlo con gli altri.
courses.description:
Scrivere un libro non è più un'impresa riservata a pochi: con gli strumenti giusti e una guida chiara, può diventare un processo sorprendentemente semplice, fluido e creativo.
In questo corso imparerai come utilizzare al meglio ChatGPT, il noto strumento di intelligenza artificiale, per progettare, scrivere, perfezionare e pubblicare il tuo libro in tempi molto più rapidi rispetto ai metodi tradizionali.
Non si tratta di lasciare scrivere tutto alla macchina, ma di imparare a collaborare in modo intelligente con l’IA: ti mostrerò come formulare domande efficaci, come generare idee, organizzare capitoli, migliorare i tuoi testi e rendere il tuo libro coerente, coinvolgente e professionale.
Il corso segue passo dopo passo tutte le fasi della scrittura: dall’idea iniziale alla struttura, dalla scrittura vera e propria alla scelta del titolo e della copertina, fino alla pubblicazione e promozione del libro, con un focus speciale su Amazon KDP e il self-publishing.
Attraverso video pratici, esempi concreti e spiegazioni chiare, scoprirai come trasformare un progetto in un libro completo, con l’aiuto di uno strumento potente, ma ancora sottoutilizzato nel mondo editoriale.
Che tu sia coach, formatore, professionista o semplicemente desideri scrivere un libro che lasci il segno, questo corso ti fornirà una mappa chiara per partire e arrivare fino in fondo.
target_audience: Esperti in un campo specifico, come avvocati, medici, dietologi, ecc, oppure chiunque abbia una particolare competenza o esperienza in un determinato campo e desideri condividerla con altri.

courses.title: Sich richtig spannend Vorstellen und Pitchen
courses.bio: Wie du dich und dein Business ganz easy und überzeugend vorstellst.
objectives: Lerne, wie du ganz easy über dich selbst, deine Dienstleistungen und Produkte auf deiner Webseite, in Vorträgen oder Videos schreibst und sprichst.
Warum an einem starken Elevator Pitch und überzeugenden Angebotsbeschreibungen kein Weg vorbei geht.
Wie du in 1 Minute oder 1 Satz Andere von dir und deinen Angeboten überzeugst.
Mit welchen Worten du deine Dienstleistungen und Produkte knackig und prägnant beschreibst und präsentierst.
Wie du mit Storytelling Interessenten begeisterst und wie das ganz einfach geht.
Wie du Selbstmarketing machst, dass zu dir passt und Smalltalk leicht zum Kundentalk machst.

Was willst du eigentlich alles erzählen: Was kannst du über dich und dein Business erzählen?
Ein Elevator Pitch für viele Gelegenheit: Der Pitch, den du immer gebrauchen kannst
Der Pitch, wenn's schnell gehen muss
Ideen und Angebote pitchen / Modul 5: Erklärbär & Aua-Pflaster: 2 Pitches für deine Angebote
Storytelling - Ein Booster in der Kunden: Pitch doch mal mit einer Geschichte
Clever Netzwerken mit Smalltalk & Co / M: Netzwerken. Smalltalk. Kontakte... So machst du das Beste daraus
Die Schlüssel für Networking mit starken Pitches

requirements: keine
courses.description:
Der Kurs für Selbständige, die sich STARK mit WORTEN vorstellen wollen.


Erfahre, wie du ganz easy über dich selbst, deine Dienstleistungen und Produkte auf deiner Webseite, in Vorträgen oder Videos schreibst und sprichst.
Stelle dich und deine Angebote einfach, klar und verständlich vor.
Überzeuge souverän in wenigen Worten.
Begeistere im Pitch mit Storytelling.


Kennst du das? Du bist auf einer Veranstaltung und dann die Vorstellungsrunde… Oder jemand fragt dich „…und, was machst du so?“. Vielleicht bist du mal in eine Social-Media-Gruppe eingetreten und … Zack bekommst du die Aufforderung dich vorzustellen.
Was sagst oder schreibst du dann?
„Ich bin … und mache … [dann kommt alles, was du machst; vielleicht noch mit Fremdwörtern, die kein Mensch versteht]“. Oder „Ähm, ja…“. Du stotterst dir einen zurecht oder schreibst nichts.
Ein starker (erster) Eindruck. Nicht! Ein Gespräch. Nicht! Neue Interessenten. Nicht!
Blöd, denn das brauchst du ja, um dich und dein Business bekannt zu machen. Wer dich und deine Produkte nicht (richtig) kennt, kauft eher woanders.
Pitchen - ob du über dich und dein Business allgemein sprichst oder deine Angebote in Postings und Videos vorstellst - ist nun mal Tagesgeschäft. Das finden viele anstrengend und blöd.
Die passenden Worte für den Pitch fehlen.
Wie wäre es, wenn du immer ganz einfach ein paar passende und verständliche Sätze zu dir, deinem Business oder einem neuen Produkt „auf Lager hast“. Dann wird es leichter, schnell mal einen Post zu schreiben und das nächste Seminar zu pushen. Oder in einer Gruppe easy ins Gespräch zu kommen und in Erinnerung zu bleiben. Oder entspannt deine Dienstleistung in einem Vortrag zu präsentieren. Richtig stark Pitchen eben.


ERFAHRE IM KURS, WIE DU GANZ EASY ÜBER DICH SELBST, DEINE DIENSTLEISTUNGEN UND PRODUKTE AUF DEINER WEBSEITE, IN VORTRÄGEN ODER VIDEOS SCHREIBST UND SPRICHST.
Warum an einem starken Elevator Pitch und überzeugenden Angebotsbeschreibungen kein Weg vorbeigeht.
Wie du in 1 Minute oder 1 Satz Andere von dir und deinen Angeboten überzeugst.
Mit welchen Worten du deine Dienstleistungen und Produkte knackig und prägnant beschreibst und präsentierst.
Wie du mit Storytelling Interessenten begeisterst und wie das ganz einfach geht.
Wie du Selbstmarketing machst, dass zu dir passt und Smalltalk leicht zum Kundentalk machst.


WIE WÄRE ES,...
…WENN DU GENAU WEISST, WIE DU DICH UND DEIN BUSINESS BEI EINER VERANSTALTUNG ODER IN DEN SOCIAL-MEDIA-KANÄLEN VORSTELLST
…WENN ANDERE DICH UND DEINE ANGEBOTE DIREKT VERSTEHEN UND BEGEISTERT SIND?
…WENN DU BEI VORSTELLUNGSRUNDEN UND POSTINGS NIE WIEDER INS SCHWITZEN KOMMST?


Und, wer bin ich überhaupt?
Hey, ich bin Bianca und ich zeige Selbständigen, wie sie mit starken Worten begeistern und überzeugen – ob in Textform, bei einem Vortrag oder in Videos.
Ich liebe Worte, Sprache und Reden. Von mir hörst du sehr selten nur 3-Wort-Sätze. Ich mag Adjektive, Wortschöpfungen und Humor. Was ich nicht mag, ist Geschwurbel, „man müsste mal“ und Fachspeech, wo ich erst ein Expertenstudium brauche.
Nebenbei finde ich es schade, wenn Menschen sich nicht gut verkaufen können. Wenn sie ihre coolen Angebote nicht stark und verständlich rüberbringen können. Oder wenn ich 5-mal hinschauen muss, um zu verstehen, was sie eigentlich für mega Produkte im Angebot haben.
In diesem Workshop bekommst du mein ganzes Wissen aus meinem Studium, Aus- und Weiterbildungen. Viel Kommunikations-Praxis i.S.v. „Handwerkszeug“ aus 20 Jahren Beratungen, Vorträgen und eigenen Pitches kommt obendrauf und ist mehr als das Sahnehäubchen.




DIE MODULE IM ÜBERBLICK


Modul 1
Selbstmarketing und Business.
Wieso du immer einen starken Pitch brauchst.
Wie du ganz leicht einen starken (ersten) Eindruck machst!


Modul 2
Was sollst du eigentlich alles über dich erzählen - und was auch nicht?
So weckst du ganz einfach Neugier und Interesse.
Wie du dich ausdrücken musst, damit es auch verständlich ist.


Modul 3
Die Selbstpräsentation - ein ungeliebtes Must-have.
Die Blaupause für deinen Elevator Pitch für alle Fälle.
Kurz Pitchen, wenn es nur ein Satz sein darf.


Modul 4
Warum du auch parat haben solltest, wieso du deinen Job machst.
Pitch mit deinem WHY.
…, weil du so einfach und schnell Vertrauen und Einzigartigkeit schaffst und dich deine Kunden dafür lieben.


Modul 5
So kannst du deine Angebote und Produkte überzeugend pitchen.
Die Pitch-Blaupause für alle Erklärbären.
Wie du deine Dienstleistungen charmant präsentieren kannst.


Modul 6
Warum du unbedingt Storytelling für deine Kundengewinnung nutzen solltest.
Pitch doch mal mit einer Geschichte!
Wie gutes Storytelling richtig und nach einem einfachen Prinzip funktioniert.


Modul 7
Wie du nach deinem Pitch leicht ins Gespräch kommst.
Netzwerken. Smalltalk. Kontakte... So machst du entspannt das Beste daraus.
Welche Schlüssel du für dein Networking mit starken Pitches brauchst.


Bonus
Bonusvideo: Pitchen ist wie tindern
Bonusvideo: Selbstmarketing ist Tagesgeschäft




Und das ist für DICH...

7 Module plus Bonusmodul
14 Videos (insgesamt 2,5 Stunden Videomaterial)
Input auch als Texte, 6 Worksheets mit Checklisten und Übungen
3 Bonusvideos
freie Zeiteinteilung
target_audience: Selbständige

courses.title: Podcast nasıl yapılır ? (Ücretsiz bir şekilde )
courses.bio: Podcast yapmanın ücretsiz ve en kolay yolu .
objectives: Podcast'in ne olduğu.
Ücretsiz bir şekilde podcast yayıncılığı yapabilmeyi.
Yayıncılık yaparken insanların nelere dikkat ettiği neye göre talep oluştuğu.
Fikir olduktan sonra önünde hiç engel olmadığının farkına varman gerektiği

Yeni tarz Yayıncılık (Podcast): Mikrofon tavsiyesi veya ses kaydetme araçlarına bakış
Ses dosyalarını düzenleme ve kaydetme programı Audacity uygulaması kullanımı
Çoklu kişili online kayıtlar için OBS kullanma teknikleri
Podcast Profili oluşturme ve yayınlama Anchor kullanımı

requirements: Herhangi bir gereksinimiz olmasına gerek yok. Sadece internete bağlanabilen bir cihazınız olsun ve mikrofon kaydebilme özelliğine sahip olsun.
courses.description:
Çoğumuz hayatımızın belirli zamanlarında radyo dinlemiş yada dinlemektedir. Ancak eskisi gibi günlerce belirli bir programı bekleyip, uzun sürelerce ve zevkle dinlediğimiz bir radyo alışkanlığımız kalmadı. Artık radyolar trafikte haber ve müzik dinlediğimiz bir araç oldu. Her şeyin evrimleştiği günümüz dünyasında, bu alışkanlığımız da doğal olarak evrimleşti.
Temel olarak Podcast kelimesinin ne anlama geldiğini açıklamak bu konuyu aydınlatmada çok faydalı olacaktır. Her konuda devrim yapan Apple firması, gene bu konuda öncülük etmede vesile olmuş ve bu konuda da büyük bir rol oynamıştır. Apple firmasının ülkemizde de çok fazla satmış olduğu ”iPod” ürünleri vardı hatırlarsanız. Bu ürün aslında bize hiçte yabancı olmayan Müzik Çaların gelişmiş versiyonuydu. Günümüz Podcastlerinin ilk örnekleri iPod için geliştirildiği için isminin ilk kısmını buradan almaktadır. ”Cast” sözcüğü ise ingilizcede ki ”broadcast”(yayın) cümlesinden gelmektedir.
Podcasting radyo programlarının internet aracılığıyla bilgisayar veya taşınabilir cihazlara indirilebilecek yada ulaşabilecek şekilde yayın yapmaktır. Podcast ise bu indirilen veya ulaşılabilen dosyalara yada bölümlere verilen isimdir.
Bu başlığı yazmada en büyük neden ,bu başlık altında yazacaklarım olacak. İşin mutfağını bilmeyenler podcast yapmanın o kadar kolay olmadığını, kayıt yapılsa dahi nasıl yayınlayacağız diye düşüneceklerini tahmin eder gibiyim. İlk olarak kendi kanalımın bir reklamını yapmadan geçmeyeceğim. ”Kafamda Deli Sorular ” isminde yaklaşık olarak 2 yıl gibi bir süredir yayın yapıyorum. Bu süre zarfında 40-50'den fazla bölüm yaptım ve daha fazlasının geleceğini umuyorum. Benim podcast maceram 3 veya 4 yıl öncesinde başlayan dinleyici kişiliğime dayanmakta. Podcast kanalımın içeriği hakkında bir bilgi veremiyorum her şey çıkabilir içinden , bir kanala bakıp dinlemenizi tavsiye ediyorum.
Pandemi döneminin verdiği uzun zamanlar ve kendim ile baş başa kalışlarım sonucunda. Uzun süredir vakit geçirdiğim bu platformda neden bende yayın yapmıyorum düşüncesini oluşturdu. İnternette yaptığım araştırmalar ve podcast üzerine yapılan toplantılara katılarak, bu konuda teknik ve teorik işler kısmını öğrendim. İşin teknik ve teorik kısmını bundan sonra ki başlık altında kısaca bahsedeceğim. Ancak her şeyden önce ortaya bir malzeme koymak önemli. İnsanlar neden beni dinlesin bu soruyu kendinize sormanız gerekli. Ben insanları eğlendirecek bir kanal mı yapacağım yoksa bilgi veren ciddi bir kanal mı olacağım. Kendi kanalımda ben bu ikisini harmanlamaya çalıştım, ilk bölümlerde bireysel yapmaya çalışsam da karşılıklı biriyle bölüm yapmak hem daha rahat hem de daha sürükleyici ve eğlenceli hale getiriyor. Bunların hepsini planladıktan sonra bir podcast kaydı yapmamak için hiç bir neden yok !
target_audience: Podcast dinleyicileri ve podcast yapmak isteyenler.

courses.title: Speaking Made Easy: Master Public Speaking with AI, ChatGPT
courses.bio: Overcome fear, speak with power, and grow your brand using the ME System, AI tools like ChatGPT, and GHL automation
objectives: Master the ME System for Speaking Made Easy to overcome fear, captivate any audience, and deliver talks with clarity, confidence, and connection.
Craft Signature Talks and Engaging Stories using simple frameworks, AI tools (like ChatGPT), and practical templates that make your message unforgettable.
Develop High-Impact Speaking Skills — voice control, storytelling, body language, and emotional engagement — even if you’re starting from scratch.
Use AI and Automation to Accelerate Growth by creating instant speaking prompts, refining delivery with feedback simulations, and building a speaker funnel with
Turn Speaking into a Scalable Brand Asset by consistently practicing, publishing, building audience trust, and capturing leads using systems and automation.

Welcome to Speaking Made Easy: Why Speaking = Influence (Even If You're Not on a Stage)
How This Course Works + What You’ll Achieve
Meet the ME System + Tools You’ll Be Using (AI + GoHighLevel)
M – Mindset Reset: Public Speaking Fear Is a Lie: Here’s What to Do Instead
Identity Shift: Becoming a Confident Communicator
Daily Rituals to Rewire Your Speaking Mindset
A – Audience Connection: How to Make Any Audience Instantly Feel Seen
The ABC Formula – Attention, Believability, Connection
Speaking to Emotion, Not Just Logic
D – Delivery Mastery: The 4 Levers of Magnetic Delivery (Volume, Rate, Melody, Tone)
The Speaking Mirror - Record, Reflect and Refine
Aligning Voice, Face, and Body for Maximum Impact
Delivering Your Elevator Pitch with Confidence
E – Expressive Storytelling: Why Stories Sell and Data Fails
AI Boost: Use ChatGPT for Story Scaffolding + Metaphor Generator
E – Energized Practice: How Great Speakers Rehearse (And What They Don’t Do)
Create a Feedback Loop to Improve 10x Faster
AI Boost: Practice Q&A Simulations with ChatGPT
Z – Zone of Genius (Your Signature Talk): Your “One Big Idea” – Why Clarity Beats Complexity
Signature Talk Structure – Start to CTA
Present It Anywhere: Events, Webinars, Reels, Pitches
AI-Powered Speaker Toolkit: Using AI as Your On-Demand Speaking Coach
Best AI Tools for Speakers (ChatGPT, Descript, Otter, Gamma, Canva)
20 AI Prompts to Improve Faster and Speak Smarter
Automate Your Speaker Brand with GoHighL: Speaker Funnel Demo – Let People Book You 24/7
Build Your Signature Talk Page & Booking Calendar
Automate Feedback, Rehearsal Reminders & CRM Follow-up
Convert Talks Into Leads: Opt-ins, SMS Follow-ups, and Workflows
Final Steps & Speaking Growth Plan: You’re Now a Speaker – What Comes Next?

requirements: No prior public speaking experience required — this course is designed for beginners and intermediate speakers alike.
A willingness to practice and apply small steps consistently to build speaking confidence and mastery.
A smartphone, laptop, or basic recording device to record practice sessions and speaking exercises.
Internet access to use free or freemium versions of AI tools like ChatGPT (or any AI chatbot), Canva, and Descript for practice exercises.
An open mindset — be ready to receive feedback, experiment, and grow outside your comfort zone.
courses.description:
Do you feel anxious about speaking in public—even on Zoom?
Are you unsure how to communicate your ideas clearly and confidently?
Do you want to build a personal brand, attract clients, or inspire change through your voice?
You’re in the right place.
Speaking Made Easy is a modern public speaking course that teaches you how to speak confidently, connect deeply, and deliver unforgettable talks—using the ME System, powerful AI tools like ChatGPT, and automation systems like GoHighLevel.
Whether you want to speak on webinars, reels, stages, or team calls—this course gives you a step-by-step system to:
Reprogram fear into excitement
Create stories and talks that move people
Practice smarter using AI
Automate your speaker brand and follow-up with GoHighLevel
This isn’t theory. You’ll be speaking, recording, and building as you go—with real-world projects and downloadable resources in every section.
What You’ll Learn
By the end of this course, you’ll be able to:
Overcome fear and anxiety using the ME System
Master your voice, tone, and body language to deliver impactfully
Connect with any audience—even cold or skeptical ones
Craft your Signature Talk using our plug-and-play templates
Use AI tools (ChatGPT, Descript, Otter) to rehearse and improve faster
Create a personal brand funnel with GoHighLevel to get booked as a speaker
Turn every talk into a lead magnet with automated follow-ups
Practice daily with speaking rituals and feedback systems
Who This Course is For
This course is designed for:
Coaches, creators, and consultants who want to speak to grow their brand
Freelancers, professionals, or team leaders who present online or on stage
Entrepreneurs who want to pitch, teach, and build trust with audiences
Beginners who’ve never spoken before and want a clear system
Anyone tired of “rah-rah” speaking advice and wants a grounded, practical approach
Requirements
No speaking experience needed
No fancy tools—just a laptop or phone
A willingness to practice, reflect, and grow
(Optional) Free accounts on ChatGPT, GoHighLevel, and AI tools (links provided)
Course Includes
10 sections and 60+ action-based video lessons
AI + GoHighLevel tech demos and walkthroughs
Templates: Signature Talk, Speaking Funnel, Feedback Tracker
Downloadable tools, planners, and challenge sheets
Certificate of completion
Extra Learning:(Included Free)
Speaker Funnel Template (GoHighLevel)
Signature Talk Generator (AI-powered prompts)
Rehearsal & Feedback Loop System
AI for Speakers Toolkit (PDF)
Speaking CRM Template (GHL Pipeline)
target_audience: Aspiring public speakers who want a simple, powerful system to speak with confidence on any stage, webinar, or video.
Coaches, consultants, and creators looking to craft a magnetic signature talk that attracts clients, opportunities, and leads.
Business owners and service professionals who want to communicate more persuasively in meetings, sales calls, and live events.
Content creators, podcasters, and course instructors who want to deliver more engaging, emotional, and memorable messages.
Students, career professionals, and entrepreneurs who want to overcome fear, build influence, and amplify their personal brand through powerful speaking.
Anyone ready to use AI tools and automation to accelerate their speaking skills, storytelling, and brand-building faster than ever before.

courses.title: Mejora tu Presencia Online
courses.bio: Mini curso para aquellas personas que quieren tener una buena imagen o presencia en Internet y Redes Sociales.
requirements: El ordenador no necesita ningún programa especial.
Tener ganas y el deseo de aprender.
Buscar mostrar la mejor versión de ti mismo en el mundo On-line.
courses.description:
¿Qué es esto de Presencia On-Line?
En el curso me refiero a todos los puntos de contacto que hay entre una persona que busque empleo e Internet, y en cómo todo cuanto hace o deja de hacer tiene su impacto en la red. Me centro en ese impacto, en ayudarte a que sea el mejor posible y sirva para acercarte aún más a tu objetivo:conseguir el empleo que más deseas.
¿Cómo está estructurado el curso?
El curso está compuesto de 6 capítulos / clases:
1. Presencia Profesional
2. Actitud
3. Comunicación no verbal
4. Comunicación escrita
5. Networking
6. Redes sociales
A lo largo de estos 6 capítulos / clases abordo temas que en mi día a día tanto trabajando con candidatos como haciendo procesos de selección observo que son especialmente importantes, y que aunque alguno pueda parecer obvio es muy alto el número de personas que fallan en estos aspectos.
El curso es eminentemente práctico y va al grano: te digo lo que en mi opinión considero qué se debe hacer y qué es mejor no hacer.
target_audience: Personas que usan las Redes Sociales
Buscadores de empleo
Candidatos
Personas que quieren cuidar la imagen que ofrecen en Internet
Personas que buscan mejorar su marca personal

courses.title: Vortragen & Präsentieren: Rhetorik & Public-Speaking Experte
courses.bio: Werde Meister im Vortragen und Präsentieren. Lerne Schritt für Schritt vor Publikum selbstsicher zu sprechen!
objectives: Lerne wie du den perfekten Vortrag vorbereitest
Werde Meister im Menschen beeinflussen
Steuer die Emotionen mit Stimme, Betonung und Körpersprache
Lerne wie du unterhaltsame PowerPoint Präsentationen in wenigen Minuten erstellen kannst
Ich zeige dir, wie du dein Lampenfieber überwindest
Werde Experte in Gestik und Mimik mit praxiserprobten Übungen
Du wirst Profi im selbstsicheren Auftreten
Fessle dein Publikum mit geheimen Techniken der TOP Speaker
Störenfriede mit meinen TOP 4 Tipps überwinden
Du lernst, welche 8 Tools für dein Vortrag wichtig sind
Ich zeige dir, wie du im Falle eines Blackouts agieren solltest
Du lernst, wie du dich in einem Raum bewegen solltest
Ich erkläre dir, anhand eines Vortrags von mir, welche Techniken ich anwende
Vermeide diese Top Fehler und spare dir Zeit und Blamagen

Einführung: Herzlich Willkommen / Was du lernen wirst
Mehr KOSTENLOSE Inhalte? Dann schau unbedingt DIESES Video!
Der perfekte Vortrag von A-Z: Wie bewege ich mich im Raum?
Abschluss: Was ich dir noch sagen wollte

requirements: Offen für Tipps und Techniken sein, auch wenn sie für das erste ungewöhnlich klingen
Durchhaltevermögen haben, um den ganzen Kurs sich anzuschauen
Den Willen die Übungen umzusetzen
courses.description:
Wenn du das Bedürfnis hast besser im Vortragen und Präsentieren zu werden, dass ist dieser Kurs perfekt für dich geeignet!

Besser Vortragen
Menschen beeinflussen
Selbstvertraut Präsentieren
Lampenfieber überwinden
Eine mitreißende PowerPoint Präsentation
Gestiken und Mimiken lernen die dein puplikum fesselt
Stimme und Betonung so Formen, dass du deine Message übermitteln kannst

Duzende Übungen zum Thema Rhetorik und Auftreten


All diese Punkte und natürlich vieles mehr wirst du hier lernen und vor allem kinderleicht nachmachen und anwenden können!


Du bist Anfänger/in und hast noch keine Ahnung vom Präsentieren? Kein Problem Du lernst Step by Step wie du Schrittweise selbstverstraut vortragen wirst.


Du hast schlechte Erfahrungen gemacht und hast oft Lampenfieber? Auch hier zeige ich dir, wie du diese Herausforderung meisterst.


Du bist schon routinierter und suchst nach Optimierungen an deinem Vortragsstil? Dann ist dieser Kurs perfekt, denn ich zeige dir, wie du dein Präsentationsstil auf ein neues Level hebst.


Du suchst einen Kurs der kinderleicht nachzuvollziehen., praxiserprobt und auch anzuwenden ist?
Optimal, du wirst kaum glauben, wie einfach ich dir die Schritte erkläre, sodass sich durch den kompletten Kurs ein roter Faden durchzieht.
_____________________________________________________


Du wirst lernen wie du…


…dich perfekt vorbereitest, sodass keine Pannen entstehen
…die Aufmerksamkeit auf dich richten kannst
…dein Publikum fesselst mit beeindruckenden Techniken
…dich im Raum bewegst, damit deine Zuschauer dir leicht folgen können
…Fehler vermeidest und somit dir Jahre an Erfahrungen sparst
…deinen Vortrag perfekt strukturierst, den du immer wieder kopieren kannst
…eine schnelle, einfach und unterhaltsame PowerPoint in 30 Minuten erstellen kannst
…wann welche Gestik, Mimik und Betonung anwenden solltest
…selbstsicher auftreten kannst bei völliger Ahnungslosigkeit
…mit Störenfriede wie Quatscher oder kritische Menschen umgehst
…dein Lampenfieber in den Griff bekommst


und natürlich vieles mehr!
_____________________________________________________


Hier kannst du dir einen Überblick über die Agenda des Kurses verschaffen:


1. Einführung
Du bekommst von mir kurz gezeigt, was dich in diesem Kurs erwartet und was du lernen wirst.
Ich zeige dir zusätzlich, warum es aus mehreren Gründen intelligent ist, gut präsentieren und vortragen zu können.


2. Wichtige Tools
Ich zeige dir die wichtigsten und unerlässlichen Tools um dich perfekt auf den Vortrag vorzubereiten. Du lernst mit den verschiedenen Tools umzugehen, wann du sie anwenden solltest und wann nicht.
Werde Experte/in im Anwenden dieser Tools und deine Zuschauer werden so unterhalten wie noch nie zuvor!


3. Der perfekte Vortrag von A-Z
Ich zeige dir, was es mit der 7/38/55 Methode auf sich hat und was Menschen brauchen, damit du ihre volle Aufmerksamkeit genießen kannst. Du wirst Fachfrau/mann im Bereich Menschenkenntnis und deren Bedürfnisse vor allem wenn es um das Thema Vortragen und Präsentieren geht.

Du lernst ein System kennen, wie du jeden beliebigen Vortrag immer gleich aufbauen kannst, sodass dein Publikum einen roten Faden erlebt und sie dir immer folgen können. Das hat den enormen Vorteil, dass du dieses einfache, aber wirksame Prinzip immer anwenden kannst.


Lerne den optimalen Einstieg in einen Vortrag. Werde sicher in der Abfolge im Hauptteil und Beende den Vortrag mit einem Feuerwerk an Emotionen.
Lerne aktiv am Kurs teilzunehmen mit den beigefügten Übungen.


4. Werde Meister/in in PowerPoint Präsentationen
Ich zeige dir, wie ich anhand eines Praxisbeispiels spielend leicht mit kostenlosen Webseiten eine unterhaltsame PowerPoint erstelle.
Du wirst Schritt für Schritt und Folie für Folie jeden Effekt, jede Animation und jeden erstaunlichen Übergang lernen, sodass du danach PowerPoint sehr gut beherrschen wirst!
Lernen PowerPoint von einer neuen Seite kennen und ich zeige dir wie du kinderleicht eine atemberaubende PowerPoint erstellen kannst.


5. Rhetorik meistern mit diesen Übungen
Ich verrate meine TOP 4 Übungen, welche ich seit fast 7 Jahren selbst angewendet habe und auch an meinen Seminarteilnehmern immer wieder erfolgreich erprobte. Diese Übungen werden dich zu eine/r/m außergewöhnlichen Speaker/in machen.
Du wirst in einfach Schritten lernen, welche Techniken du wann anwenden musst, damit du deine Zuschauer mit deiner Begeisterung anstecken kannst.


6. Selbstsicheres Auftreten bei völliger Ahnungslosigkeit
Stell dir vor du könntest über JEDES Thema referieren, obwohl du darüber keine Ahnung hast. Stell dir vor, ich zeige dir, wie du in 4 Schritten zum Profi wirst und deine Zuschauer nicht unterscheiden könnten, ob du Ahnung von diesem Thema hast oder nicht.
Genau das ist „SSABVA“. Ich zeige dir Übungen wie du NIE wieder den Faden verlierst oder einen Blackout bekommst.
Du wirst Meister/in im selbstsicheren Auftreten, selbst wenn du manchmal den Anschluss verlierst – deine Zuschauer werden es nicht mal merken.
Lerne dir beliebtesten Übungen und gewinne schon an Tag 1 der Anwendung der ersten Übung, Ergebnisse die erstaunlich sind!


7. Abschluss
Hier möchte ich dir meine TOP Fehler zeigen, vor denen ich dich bewahren möchte und ich die ich damals oft gemacht habe.
Spare dir Zeit, Nerven und Erfahrung, wenn du diese Fehler vermeidest und werde ich wenigen Tage zum Vortragsgenie!


Du lernst mit einfach Tipps, wie du mit Störenfrieden wie Quatscher oder Besserwisser umgehen kannst. Einfach aber genial – du wirst begeistert sein!


_____________________________________________________


Du kannst dich noch nicht entscheiden, da du noch nicht einschätzen kannst, was in diesem Kurs gezeigt wird?
Kein Problem! Schaue dir KOSTENLOSE, von mir zu Verfügung gestellte, Videos an um dich davon zu überzeugen, dass dieser Kurs dir weiterhelfen wird.


Buche jetzt diesen Kurs und lass uns sofort damit anfangen, dass du dein Potential als TOP Speaker/in entfalten kannst!


Ich freue mich auf dich!

Sascha
target_audience: An alle, die besser werden wollen im Vortragen und Präsentieren
An alle, die ihre Rhetorik auf ein neues Level heben wollen
An alle, die sich besser verkaufen wollen
An Anfänger, Fortgeschrittene und die, die auch schlechte Erfahrungen gemacht haben

courses.title: Marketing Pessoal para o Sucesso Profissional
courses.bio: Alcance Os seus Objectivos, Trabalhe na Área que realmente Gosta, Crie a Auto-Confiança que tanto Deseja e Comunique com
objectives: O processo de ‘personal branding’, ou seja a criação de uma marca pessoal forte ajuda-o a mostrar de forma clara como pode ajudar os seus (potenciais) clientes com aquilo que sabe fazer bem e de forma singular. Saber a sua marca pessoal facilita a chegar aos clientes ou empregadores com os quais quer trabalhar, que partilham os mesmos valores que você e que o valorizam da forma como quer ser valorizado. Isto só é possível com um profundo autoconhecimento e uma comunicação eficaz para o seu grupo alvo, tanto presencialmente como online. Também significa que saberá melhor para onde evoluir com base nas tendências do seu mercado e ao nível global num mundo que está a ficar cada vez mais digital.

Introdução & Autoconhecimento - O Valor: Parte I: Introdução - Valor Interior: Autoconhecimento & Marca Pessoal
Parte III: Vestir a Sua Marca Pessoal: Aula 1: A importância da imagem pessoal
Parte IV: Valor atribuído & Avaliação co: Aula 1: Como os outros nos veem
Aula 5: Dicas para continuar a crescer

requirements: Um PC, uma vontade de se desenvolver, uma mente aberta e persistência
courses.description:
Este curso online muito prático consiste em 4 módulos, que têm uma duração entre 30 e 40 minutos com um total de aprox. 7 horas (com os exercícios incluídos). Os módulos são subdivididos em vários passos de forma a aprender e pousar quando quiser.
O processo de ‘personal branding’, ou seja a criação de uma marca pessoal forte ajuda-o a mostrar de forma clara como pode ajudar os seus (potenciais) clientes com aquilo que sabe fazer bem e de forma singular. Saber a sua marca pessoal facilita a chegar aos clientes ou empregadores com os quais quer trabalhar, que partilham os mesmos valores que você e que o valorizam da forma como quer ser valorizado. Isto só é possível com um profundo autoconhecimento e uma comunicação eficaz para o seu grupo alvo. Isto também significa que saberá melhor para onde evoluir com base nas tendências do seu mercado e ao nível global num mundo que está a ficar cada vez mais digital. Por exemplo eu não adevinhava uns anos atrás que estaria neste momento a elaborar um curso online, apesar de saber que era uma das tendências. Achava que não seria necessário tão rápido mas não é verdade. A tecnologia está presente em todo o lado e negá-la significa prejudicar o seu próprio crescimento ou mesmo pôr em causa o seu trabalho ou negócio.

Na primeira parte do curso vai conhecer-se melhor a si mesmo. Com exercícios que pretendem aumentar o seu autoconhecimento, criamos as raízes, o fundamento no qual a sua marca pessoal vai florescer. A seguir, quando temos bem claro a sua essência e o seu factor de diferenciação, iremos descobrir como pode comunicar a sua marca pessoal de forma autêntica e com impacto através dos vários meios que existem. Iremos abordar os temas de comunicação verbal, não verbal, online e a imagem pessoal. Por fim, na quarta parte, irá ver como pode continuar a crescer e aumentar a sua visibilidade através de uma avaliação contínua.
target_audience: – A todos os profissionais que querem ter mais sucesso, com base nos seus valores, que querem trabalhar nas áreas que realmente gostam e onde podem ser especialista por oferecer algo que é diferenciador, num mundo que já tem muitos serviços e produtos semelhantes    – A profissionais querem subir na sua carreira e precisam de ter mais visibilidade    – A quem está numa fase de transição entre dois empregos    – A pessoas que estão a ponderar criar o seu negócio próprio    – A quem está inativo e precisa de avaliar e reposicionar-se no mercado de trabalho    – A quem já tem o seu próprio negócio e acha que pode ter melhores resultados ao saber como comunicar de forma mais eficaz a sua mais valia para os clientes e assim ganhar novos projetos.

courses.title: Dijital Butik Yönetimi: Instagram’da Nasıl Satış Yapılır?
courses.bio: Instagram'da butik hesabı açan/açmayı planlayan herkes için gerekli hap bilgiler sunduğum bu eğitimi kaçırmayın.
objectives: Instagram üzerinden satış yapmaya çalışan butikler için hap bilgiler
El emeği ürün yapanların içerik üretiminden kargo ve ödeme süreçlerine dair tüm detaylar
Instagram butikleri ile ilgili dağınık olan tüm bilgileri bir arada sunuyorum.
İçerik, ödeme alımı, kargo süreçleri, müşteri iletişimi, en çok yapılan hatalar gibi başlıklarda taze ve temiz bilgiler veriyorum.
requirements: Herhangi bir ön bilgi gerekmiyor.
courses.description:
15 yıldan fazla bir süredir kurumsal şirketlerde ve ajanslarda pazarlama alanında çalıştım ve üst düzey yönetici olarak bu alanda çalışmaya devam ediyorum. Şu anda uluslararası hizmet veren bir bankada Pazarlama Müdürü olarak çalışmaktayım. 2013'ten bu yana ise aktif bir Instagram kullanıcısıyım. Yıllar içinde edindiğim tüm bilgileri ve deneyimleri yolun başında olan, nasıl başarılı olacağını bilemeyen, parça parça sunulan bilgileri tek seferde öğrenip yoluna devam etmek isteyen Instagram butikleri ile paylaşmak üzerine eğitimler hazırlamaya başladım. Bunlardan birisi de "Dijital Butik Yönetimi: Instagram’da Nasıl Satış Yapılır?"


"Dijital Butik Yönetimi: Instagram’ da Nasıl Satış Yapılır?" eğitimi grup dersi olarak hazırlandı. Eğitimin başlıkları:
Butik Nedir?
Dijital Pazarlama Nedir?
Instagram Nedir?
Hedef Kitle Kimdir?
Ürün&Maliyet&Fiyatlama
Nasıl Satış Yapacağım?
İçerik Nasıl Olmalı?
Ödeme, Kargo, Satış Sonrası Destek
Müşteri İletişimi
En Sık Yapılan Yanlışlar
Faydalı Araçlar


Eğitim, yolun başında olan bir Instagram butiği için bilmesi gereken temel konulara odaklanıyorum. Bu eğitim genel olarak A'dan Z'ye her butik sahibinin bilmesi gerek konulara işaret eder. Reklam verme panelleri gibi daha teknik konular içermiyor.


Eğitimin daha çok kitleye ulaşması ve kendimi geliştirebilmem için lütfen eğitim sonrasında soru-cevap kısımlarında birlikte olalım. Siz değerli Instagram kullanıcılarının yaşadığı her bir sorun benim daha geniş kitlelere ulaşmam için önemli :)


Keyifli ve verimli bir eğitim olması dileğiyle!
target_audience: Instagram'da butik hesabı açmış ama nasıl satış yapacağını bilmeyenler ya da Instagram dünyası ile yeni tanışmış olan herkes bu eğitimden faydalanabilir.

courses.title: Mastering Personal Branding with ChatGPT
courses.bio: Discover how to identify your core values, craft compelling content, and engage your target audience using AI tools

Personal Brand Power: Building on Your U: Ideas Why You Need Your Personal Brand That Will Keep You Forever Motivated
Discover Your Core Values and Brand DNA
Own Your Strengths: SWOT Analysis for Personal Branding
ChatGPT For Visual Strategy: logos, colours, website design, printed materials
СhatGPT Can Help You Create Your Unique Selling Proposition Prompt

requirements: No requirements
courses.description:
Hey there! I’m Natalia, and I’m super excited to introduce you to my brand-new mini course on Personal Branding and ChatGPT. Whether you’re a budding entrepreneur, a professional looking to up your game, or just someone curious about harnessing the power of AI, this course is tailor-made for you!


In this course, you'll dive into the essentials of personal branding, discovering what makes you unique and how to present that to the world. You'll walk away with a clear, actionable strategy that highlights your values, strengths, and unique selling proposition. Plus, you'll learn how to leverage ChatGPT to enhance your brand's communication, making sure your message is always on point and engaging.




Here’s what you can look forward to:
Personal Branding Basics: Get a solid foundation on what personal branding is and why it’s crucial in today’s world.
Strategy Creation: Step-by-step guidance to develop a personal branding strategy that truly reflects who you are.
Values and Strengths: Deep-dive exercises to help you uncover and articulate your core values and strengths.
Unique Selling Proposition: Craft a compelling USP that sets you apart from the competition.
Visual Strategy: Tips and tricks to create a visual identity that resonates with your audience.
Coaching Exercises: Practical exercises to apply what you’ve learned and see real results.
Effective AI Prompts: Learn how to create prompts that get the best responses from ChatGPT, including two tried-and-tested templates to get you started.


This course is perfect for anyone looking to boost their personal brand and learn how to use AI effectively. Whether you’re a freelancer, small business owner, content creator, or just curious about personal development and technology, you’ll find immense value here. No prior experience needed – just bring your enthusiasm and willingness to learn!


So, what are you waiting for? Join me on this exciting journey to discover the power of personal branding and AI. Click the link below to enroll now and start transforming the way you present yourself to the world. Let’s make your brand unforgettable together!


Thanks for considering my course. I can’t wait to see you inside and help you shine like never before. Let’s get started!
target_audience: Individuals looking to start their own business and build a personal brand that sets them apart in a competitive market
Those working in marketing who want to enhance their personal brand to advance their careers and establish themselves as thought leaders
Independent professionals seeking to attract more clients by strengthening their personal brand and online presence
Individuals in the job market who want to create a compelling personal brand that makes them stand out to potential employers
Creators aiming to build a loyal following and monetize their personal brand through engaging and consistent content
Owners looking to differentiate themselves from competitors and connect with their target audience on a personal level
Young professionals entering the workforce who want to start building their personal brand early to enhance their career prospects

courses.description:
Ghost is an open source, easy to learn alternative to WordPress for creating blogs.

This course has been completely updated based on rapid changes and improvements in Ghost since its earlier release!


If you're a writer looking for a way to express yourself, Ghost is for you. You'll be able to focus on your writing, not on learning how to use a complex Content Management System (CMS) like WordPress.

You should take this course if you want to create a blog, but you are intimidated by WordPress or heavier Content Management Systems.
At the end of this course, you will be able to take advantage of Ghost's features to produce a great looking, high quality blog, and posts to your blog.

Topics covered include:
What a blog is
Choosing a topic
When Ghost is the right blogging tool for you
When you may want to use a tool other than Ghost
Creating a free Introductory account at Ghost
Introduction to the Ghost User Interface (UI)
Getting started with Ghost
What Themes are
Where to get free or paid themes
Ghost Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
Ghost vs. WordPress for SEO
How to change the look and feel of your blog by changing Themes

Adding content

Using Imgbb for images
Why you should purchase your own Domain Name

courses.description:
Public Speaking disasters happen to everyone from time to time. Imagine that you can speak with confidence and authority, no matter what disasters might be happening as you speak. Wouldn't it be nice to know that if you forget what to say or if a slide doesn't work properly, you can still speak in a confident and relaxed manner, and your audience will never know there was a problem?
In this How to Recover from Public Speaking Disasters course, you will learn the following
* How to recover if you forget what to say
* How to project calm on the outside even if you are panicking on the inside
* What not to say when mistakes or disasters occur
* How to avoid the most common mistakes that derail speakers
* How to keep Public Speaking mistakes from being remembered by your audience.
This Public Speaking course is delivered primarily through spoken lectures. Because the skill you are learning is speaking related, it only makes sense that you learn through speaking.
The Public Speaking skill you will learn in this class is not primarily theoretical or academic. It is a skill that requires physical habits. That is why you will be asked to take part in numerous exercises where you record yourself speaking on video, and then watching yourself. Learning presentation skills is like learning how to ride a bicycle. You simply have to do it numerous times and work past the wobbling and falling off parts until you get it right.
This Public Speaking course contains numerous video lectures plus several bonus books for your training library.
TJ Walker has been coaching and training people on their Public Speaking skills for 30 years. Now, through the power of Udemy's online platform, he is able to give you the same high quality training that he gives in person to CEOs, Fortune 500 executives, and Presidents of countries. Only you can now receive the training at a tiny fraction of the normal fee for in-person training.
How long this Public Speaking course takes is up to you. The longest part of the course involves you speaking on video, critiquing yourself, and doing it over until you like it. But if you get to the point where you love how you look and sound when you present it will be well worth the time spent. And having this skill will save you time for all future presentations in your life.
You can begin improving your Public Speaking skills right now. You may have an opportunity to speak out as soon as tomorrow, so why waste another day worried that your presentation skills are not up to high standards.
Enroll in this course today.
What others say:

“TJ Walker's single-minded devotion to presentation has made him the #1 expert for executives seeking guidance on speaking to the public and media." Bob Bowdon, Anchor/Reporter, Bloomberg Television
“TJ Walker is the leading media trainer in the world." Stu Miller, Viacom News Producer

courses.bio: Mastering Piping Engineering Fundamentals for Interview Preparation
objectives: All About Pipes & Tubes
Pipe NPS, DN

Jacketed pipes
Pipe Fittings_Olets

Role Play: Q&A session-2: Advanced Piping Concepts & Specialized Components Q&A

requirements: No programming languages
courses.description:
Welcome to the Mastering Piping Engineering Fundamentals for Interview Preparation course! This comprehensive course is designed to help piping engineers build a solid foundation in the core concepts of piping engineering. With a combination of detailed lectures, multiple-choice questions, and in-depth discussions, you will gain the knowledge necessary to excel in interviews and enhance your practical understanding of piping systems.
Course Highlights:
Lecture 1: Pipe vs Tube – Understand the key differences between pipes and tubes, and their unique applications in various industries.
Lecture 2: NPS, DN & NB – Learn about the terminology used for pipe sizing and the distinctions between Nominal Pipe Size (NPS), Diameter Nominal (DN), and Nominal Bore (NB).
Lecture 3: Pipe Schedule – Explore the concept of pipe schedules, wall thicknesses, and their relevance in pressure rating and applications.
Lecture 4: ERW & EFW Pipes – Delve into the manufacturing processes of Electric Resistance Welded (ERW) and Electric Fusion Welded (EFW) pipes, and their uses.
Lecture 5: FRP Pipes – Get introduced to Fiberglass Reinforced Plastic (FRP) pipes and their advantages in specific applications.
Lecture 6: Types of FRP Pipes – Gain insights into the various types of FRP pipes used in different industries and their properties.
Lecture 7: Pros & Cons of FRP Pipes – Understand the benefits and limitations of FRP pipes to determine their suitability for your projects.
Lecture 8: HDPE Pipes – Learn about High-Density Polyethylene (HDPE) pipes, their features, and their applications in different environments.
Lecture 9: Pros & Cons of HDPE Pipes – A detailed discussion of the advantages and drawbacks of HDPE pipes in various industrial settings.
Lecture 10: Pipe Spools – Learn the basics of pipe spools, their fabrication, and how they contribute to the assembly of piping systems.
Lecture 11: Types of Pipe Spools – Explore the different types of pipe spools and their specific uses in the construction of piping systems.
Lecture 12: Inch Dia – Understand the concept of "Inch Dia" for pipe measurement and how it's used in engineering designs.
Lecture 13: Application of Inch Dia – Explore the real-world applications of Inch Diameter pipes in various sectors.
Lecture 14: Inch Meter – Learn about the use of inch meters in pipe measurement and their importance in the industry.
Lecture 15: Jacketed Pipes – Dive into jacketed pipes, their construction, and how they are used in industries that require temperature control.
Lecture 16: Applications of Jacketed Pipes – Learn about the wide range of applications for jacketed pipes, including chemical, pharmaceutical, and food industries.
Lecture 17: Piping Branch Fittings_olets – A detailed overview of branch fittings and olets, their designs, and how they’re used in piping systems.
Lecture 18: Bill of Material (BOM) – Understand how to prepare a Bill of Material for piping projects and its significance in procurement and project management.
Lecture 19: Spring Hangers in Piping Systems – Discover the role of spring hangers in maintaining pipe alignment and reducing stress in piping systems.
Lecture 20: Monel Alloy – Learn about the unique properties of Monel alloy and its applications in corrosive environments.
Lecture 21: Hot Tapping – Explore the process and considerations involved in hot tapping, including safety protocols and system maintenance.
Throughout this course, you will not only grasp the theoretical aspects but also gain practical insights through MCQs and detailed discussions. courses.bio: Mindset, Wissen und Sales-Funnel für den Aufbau deines Herzensbusiness als Holistik Life Coach

Einführung: Mythen über das Wirken des Life-Coaches

requirements: Interesse an dem Thema Life-Coaching
courses.description:
Ich zeige dir in diesem kleinen Mini-Workshop, wie du dir als angehender Life-Coach oder auch als Interessent am Life-Coaching ein eigenes haupt- oder nebenberufliches Business aufbauen kannst. Dieser Workshop bietet dir einen Leitfaden, um erfolgreich in die Welt des Life-Coachings einzusteigen und deine berufliche Karriere auf ein neues Niveau zu heben.
Ich räume dabei zunächst mit einigen Mythen auf, um dein Mindset zu stärken. Es gibt viele falsche Vorstellungen darüber, was es bedeutet, ein Life-Coach zu sein, und ich werde diese Vorurteile beseitigen, um dir einen klaren und positiven Blick auf deine zukünftige Tätigkeit zu ermöglichen.
Anschließend zeige ich dir ein 6-Schritte-Programm, mit dem du dir die Fertigkeiten als Life-Coach aneignen und einen sinnvollen Lernpfad für dich entwickeln kannst. Diese Schritte beinhalten alles von der Entwicklung deiner Coaching-Fähigkeiten bis hin zu praktischen Übungen und Techniken, die dir helfen, dein Wissen zu vertiefen und anzuwenden.
Dann zeige ich dir, wie du dir in 6 Schritten eine Marketing-Strategie aufbauen kannst, die dir Kunden und Klienten generiert. Man nennt diese Strategie auch Sales-Funnel. Dieser Prozess wird dir helfen, deine Dienstleistungen effektiv zu bewerben und eine stetige Kundschaft aufzubauen.
Zum Schluss erfährst du, wer dein ganz persönlicher Lieblingsklient ist, damit du mit dieser Vision die erste Energie im Innern aufbaust, um den Klienten auch in dein Leben zu ziehen. Dieses Wissen wird dir helfen, gezielt die Menschen anzusprechen, mit denen du am liebsten arbeitest und die am meisten von deinen Fähigkeiten profitieren können.
Ich erzähle dir das alles aufgrund meiner eigenen Erfahrung und langjährigen Tätigkeit als Life-Coach und Dozentin in diesem Bereich. Meine bewährten Methoden und Strategien werden dir den Einstieg erleichtern und dir zeigen, wie du dein volles Potenzial als Life-Coach entfalten kannst.
target_audience: Coaching-Interessierte und Life-Coaching-Anwärter, sowie Persönlichkeitsentwickler

I will show you, step by step, to self-publish your book and/or ebook. By the end of the course, you can take your manuscript and it will be published in one day. In this course, I'll teach you exactly how to self-publish your book or eBook quickly, efficiently, and professionally. Whether you have a finished manuscript or are polishing your final draft, this step-by-step guide will walk you through the entire publishing process so you can become a published author—in just one day.

By the end of this course, you’ll have the confidence and skills to upload, publish, and sell your book within 24 hours just like I did. Get ready to hold your published book in your hands—fast and easy!

courses.title: Spectacular Introductions Are Important
courses.bio: VETERANSWERS Supporter
objectives: Section 1
Section 2
Section 3
Section 4
Section 5
Section 6
Trust and Safety
requirements: No experience, All who wish to continue their learning journey.
courses.description:
Absolutely, spectacular introductions are crucial in many aspects of life, from public speaking and writing to social interactions and business presentations. A compelling introduction serves several key purposes:
Capturing Attention: A spectacular introduction grabs the audience's attention right from the start. This is vital because people's attention spans are often limited, and you need to pique their interest to keep them engaged.
Setting the Tone: The introduction sets the tone for the rest of your presentation or content. It provides a preview of what's to come, creating expectations and building anticipation.
Establishing Credibility: A strong introduction can establish your credibility and expertise on the subject matter. It gives your audience a reason to trust what you're saying.
Engaging Emotionally: Spectacular introductions often tap into emotions. They can make your audience feel excited, curious, inspired, or empathetic, depending on the context.
Providing Context: An introduction should offer context and background information to ensure your audience understands the subject matter or topic. It answers the "why" and "what" questions.
Creating a Connection: When done effectively, introductions can create a connection between you and your audience. They can relate to your story or the issue you're addressing.
Generating Interest: A great introduction should generate interest and curiosity, leaving the audience eager to learn more.
In various contexts, such as academic essays, novels, movies, or even casual conversations, a spectacular introduction can make the difference between grabbing someone's attention and losing it. It's an art that requires creativity and skill to master. Whether you're delivering a speech, writing a book, or simply meeting someone new, investing time and effort into crafting a spectacular introduction is often time well spent.
target_audience: For all users on and off platform.

courses.description:
Looking for a job and not getting hired yet? The 30-Day Remote Hiring Plan is a day-by-day system designed to help you get hired for a remote job—fast. Whether you're new to remote work or tired of applying and hearing nothing back, this course gives you the tools, templates, and tactics to stand out, get interviews, and land the remote job you deserve—all in just 30 days.
Can I Start a Remote Career with No Experience?
Yes, you absolutely can. This beginner-friendly course was created specifically for job seekers who want to work from home or from anywhere in the world—even without prior remote experience. You’ll learn how to position yourself for remote roles, write a resume that gets past applicant tracking systems (ATS), stand out in virtual interviews, and complete remote job assessments with confidence.
We’ll also show you how to avoid job scams, negotiate offers, and succeed in your new role from day one.
This Course Is Perfect For:
New grads, freelancers, or career changers
Stay-at-home parents or caregivers
Digital nomads or people seeking work-from-anywhere jobs
Anyone who wants time, location, and income freedom through remote work
What You’ll Learn in This Course
Understand how the remote hiring process works—and how to stand out
Identify the best remote jobs for your background and skills
Write a resume and cover letter that gets noticed by hiring managers
Prepare for and ace virtual interviews with confidence and professionalism
Complete remote job assessments and work samples with ease
Spot and avoid fake job listings and scams
Negotiate salary, benefits, and schedule flexibility
Set yourself up for long-term success in your new remote role
Follow a clear 30-day job search plan that produces results
What’s Included in This Course
Instructor-led video lessons that are clear, focused, and beginner-friendly
Downloadable templates and tools including resumes, cover letters, and checklists
Real-world examples that show you exactly how to apply what you learn
Quizzes and exercises to reinforce your learning
Lifetime access so you can learn at your own pace and revisit anytime

Get to Know the Course Outline

Meet Your Instructor
I’m Joe Correa, President and CEO of Finibi Mortgage. Over the years, I’ve hired and managed remote employees across the U.S. and internationally. I understand exactly what employers are looking for in remote candidates—because I’ve been on the other side of the hiring table.
Through my businesses, online courses, and mentorship, I’ve helped thousands of students get hired for remote roles and succeed once they’re in. Now, I’m sharing the exact step-by-step system I’ve developed to help you do the same.
Take Action and Get Results
This course is more than just watching videos—it's a hands-on hiring system. You’ll complete practical tasks, build real momentum, and follow a proven path to getting hired.
By the end, you’ll know exactly what to do to land the remote job you want—and have the tools to make it happen.

requirements: Aucun pré-requis
courses.description:
« On naît poète, on devient orateur », disait Cicéron. Thierry Watelet livre ici les clés de la prise de parole qui, comme les apôtres, sont au nombre de douze. Pour devenir un orateur brillant, ou efficace. Ou même les deux si on a le choix, comme Cicéron dans ses catilinaires. « Jusqu’à quand, Catilina, abuseras-tu, enfin, de notre patience ? ». Mais attention, avoir les clés ne donne pas encore la parfaite maîtrise. Appliquez-les dans l’ordre, l’une après l’autre, en se glissant avec un peu de patience dans la patience du temps. Et vous progresserez. Vous progresserez irrésistiblement. Encore une petite chose comme disait Steve Jobs : autorisez-vous à être vous-même. Acceptez vos qualités et vos défauts, sans jouer. L’art d’être soi est le soubassement du succès dans les prises de parole en public. Ensuite seulement vient la technique.

À propos de l’auteur
Thierry WateletJournaliste, rédacteur en chef à France Télévision après avoir travaillé pendant vingt ans à RTL. Maître de conférence à l’ENA, à Centrale, à Science Po et à l’Ecole Supérieure de Journalisme de Lille. Il intervient dans de nombreuses entreprises et auprès d’hommes politiques.

courses.title: So überzeugst du dein Umfeld mit deiner Körpersprache
courses.bio: Meistere die Kunst effektiver Körpersprache für erfolgreiche Beziehungen und mehr Erfolg
objectives: Verstehe die fundamentalen Prinzipien und die immense Bedeutung nonverbaler Kommunikation in deinem täglichen Leben.
Lerne, wie du durch gezielte Körpersprache in den ersten Sekunden eines Treffens Sympathie und Vertrauen aufbaust.
Entwickle die Fähigkeit, die Körpersprache anderer Menschen präzise zu lesen und ihre wahren Gefühle und Absichten zu erkennen.
Erlerne Techniken, wie du durch deine Körperhaltung Selbstvertrauen ausstrahlst und in jeder Situation souverän auftrittst.
Lerne, wie du unbewusste Signale erkennst und verstehst, um tiefere Einblicke in die Gedankenwelt deines Gegenübers zu gewinnen.
Erfahre, wie du durch den gezielten Einsatz von Gesten deine Botschaften kraftvoll und überzeugend unterstreichen kannst.
Lerne, wie du durch die bewusste Nutzung von Mimik und Blickkontakt Vertrauen und Nähe aufbaust.
Verstehe die Bedeutung von Proxemik (Raumnutzung) in der Kommunikation und wie du diese nutzen kannst, um deine Interaktionen zu optimieren.
Entwickle die Fähigkeit, durch das Spiegeln der Körpersprache deines Gesprächspartners eine harmonische und vertrauensvolle Atmosphäre zu schaffen.
Erfahre, wie du durch gezielte Körpertechniken Stress und Nervosität in wichtigen Situationen reduzieren und deine Ruhe bewahren kannst.

Einführung: Körpersprache ist von Land zu Land unterschiedlich
Wie schaffst du es eine Einheit zwischen Körpersprache und Worte

requirements: Keine bestimmten Vorkenntnisse notwendig, der Kurs eignet sich für Anfänger.
courses.description:
In diesem aufregenden Kurs entschlüsseln wir gemeinsam das faszinierende Phänomen der Körpersprache! Tauche ein in die Welt der nonverbalen Kommunikation und entdecke, welche bewussten und unbewussten Signale unser Körper an seine Umwelt sendet und was er damit wirklich ausdrücken möchte. Du wirst lernen, diese Signale bei anderen Menschen zu erkennen und zu deuten, um stets angemessen darauf reagieren zu können. Noch besser: Du wirst auch erfahren, wie du proaktiv die richtige Körpersprache anwenden kannst, um in jeder Situation souverän und überzeugend aufzutreten.


Während des Kurses werden wir tief in verschiedene Aspekte der Körpersprache eintauchen. Dazu gehören unter anderem:


Körpersprache lesen: Erlerne die Kunst, die häufigsten nonverbalen Signale zu erkennen und zu interpretieren, die Menschen in verschiedenen Situationen aussenden. Ob Gesten, Körperhaltung, Gesichtsausdrücke oder andere Bewegungen – du wirst zum Körpersprache-Experten!


Emotionen erkennen: Entschlüssle, wie Emotionen oft durch Körpersprache ausgedrückt werden, auch wenn Worte etwas anderes sagen. Du wirst Anzeichen von Freude, Ärger, Traurigkeit, Angst und anderen Emotionen mühelos erkennen können.


Authentizität und Glaubwürdigkeit: Entdecke, wie du durch eine kongruente Körpersprache als glaubwürdiger und authentischer Kommunikator wahrgenommen wirst. Lerne, wie du deine Körpersprache mit dem Gesagten in Einklang bringst, um stets eine klare und überzeugende Botschaft zu vermitteln.


Eigenes Verhalten optimieren: Neben dem Verständnis der Körpersprache anderer wirst du lernen, deine eigene Körpersprache bewusster einzusetzen. Dies ermöglicht es dir, selbstbewusster aufzutreten, dich in verschiedenen Situationen besser zu präsentieren und deine zwischenmenschlichen Beziehungen zu verbessern.


Fehlinterpretationen vermeiden: Vermeide Missverständnisse und falsche Schlussfolgerungen, indem du Techniken erlernst, um die Körpersprache anderer präzise zu interpretieren und die Gesamtsituation besser zu verstehen.


Dieser Kurs ist deine Chance, ein echter Meister der nonverbalen Kommunikation zu werden! Melde dich jetzt an und starte deine Reise in die faszinierende Welt der Körpersprache. Gemeinsam werden wir deine Kommunikationsfähigkeiten auf das nächste Level heben. Ich freue mich darauf, dich auf diesem spannenden Weg zu begleiten!
target_audience: Der Kurs eignet sich sowohl für Anfänger in Sachen Kommunikation und Rhetorik, als auch für Profis und Fortgeschrittene.

courses.title: Write a Bestselling Non-Fiction Book in a Week
courses.bio: Unleash the book inside you and share your unique story with the world. Finish your manuscript in less than 20 hours
objectives: you will learn how to plan, outline, write, and edit your manuscript efficiently and effectively within a week.
Create a full manuscript within a week using my reliable 20-hour system from start to finish.
Learn the structure of bestselling books and how to plan, structure, and outline your own book to ensure its success.
This course will provide practical techniques to help you overcome writer's block and get your book idea out of your head and onto paper.
You'll learn strategies to break down the writing process into manageable steps and techniques for getting into the writing flow.
Explore the true purpose behind your book: gain clarity on your motivations and intentions for writing, to create a meaningful and impactful manuscript.
Take the first step of becoming an accomplished author by gaining the skills and knowledge needed to confidently write and publish your upcoming paperback book.

Welcome and congratulations: This course is part of Write a Book in a Week
Later becomes never: why you should start on your book today
Elevate Your Life: Unlock Success through Authorship

Your First Steps To Becoming An Author

Why is a book so effective?

Unveiling the Journey: From Aspiring Writer to Bestselling Author
Your First Steps To Becoming An Author

Writing A Book That Makes A Difference I: Author Bio & Back Cover Copy Builder
Author Logistics: Getting Your Work Orga: Generating more ideas to write about
Write Your Book: Can you really write a book in a week?
Write a Book in a Week: The System
Overcoming Writer’s Block: A Rapid Recovery Plan

The Write a Book in a Week System
Homework: Wrap up the Write a Book in a Week System
6 Reasons To Not Give Up On Your Writing Dream
Thank You and more resources: The next step and a final word of advice

requirements: You do not need any prior writing experience to enroll in this course.

To get the most out of this course, it is recommended that you have an existing business or career, along with sufficient life or work experience to draw from when deciding on topics to write about, as well as a strong desire to share your insights and knowledge with the world. No previous writing experience is required.
To benefit from this course, you should possess an open mind and a desire to take your life, business, and/or career to the next level.
courses.description:
Have you been carrying around a book idea for months — or even years — but struggle to get it out of your head and onto paper? Do you dream of becoming a published author but feel overwhelmed by the process? You're not alone — and you're much closer than you think.
As a bestselling author myself, I know exactly how intimidating writing a book can feel. That’s why I created this course: to simplify the entire process and show you a system that works — even if you’ve never written anything before.
In Write a Bestselling Non-Fiction Book In Less Than 20 Hours, I’ll walk you through my proven system that has helped me, and many of my students, successfully write and publish their books — faster than they ever thought possible.
You’ll learn how to:
Finally get started on your author journey, even if you don’t know where to begin
Structure your book for clarity, flow, and reader engagement — before you write a single chapter
Break through writer’s block and avoid common mistakes that stall most first-time authors
Develop a repeatable writing system you can use for this — and every future book
Set a realistic publication date and actually stick to it
By the end of the course, you’ll have your book fully outlined, your first chapter written, and a complete roadmap to finish your full manuscript — often in less than 20 hours of actual writing time.
Whether this is your first book or your next one, this system will help you finally share your story, expertise, and message with the world — without the stress, overwhelm, or endless procrastination.
What you'll learn
How to start your author journey and overcome the fear of getting started
How to structure your book into a clear, logical, and marketable outline
How to create a simple writing system that eliminates writer’s block
How to write your manuscript draft in less than 20 hours — even with a busy schedule
How to set a publication date and confidently move toward publishing your book
How to replicate the system for future book projects
Who this course is for
Aspiring authors who want to finally write and publish their first non-fiction book
Existing writers looking for a faster, more effective system to complete new book projects
Entrepreneurs, coaches, consultants, and professionals ready to share their expertise in book form
Anyone who has struggled with writer’s block, procrastination, or feeling overwhelmed by the book-writing process
target_audience: In order to achieve success, it's essential to allocate sufficient time and effort to this course. This will enable you to develop or enhance the content of your writing and increase your chances of creating a compelling and impactful book. Additionally, it's important to remain committed and motivated throughout the course, as writing a book can be a challenging but rewarding process.

This course focuses solely on the process of writing the first draft of your manuscript. It does not cover topics related to publishing, self-publishing, or marketing/selling your book. Please see my additional author courses on those topics.

This course is designed to help aspiring authors start their journey by identifying book ideas from their previous business ventures and personal experiences. It is geared towards new and budding writers who want to take the first step towards writing their own book.
This course welcomes existing authors who want to expand their portfolio. Our proven system will provide you with the tools to achieve your goals faster and better than ever before!
This course is specifically designed for non-fiction authors, and is not intended for those interested in writing fiction, children's books, or other forms of creative writing.

requirements: Không cần bất kỳ kinh nghiệm gì. Chỉ cần bạn có tinh thần học hỏi và sẵn sàng hành động.
courses.description:
- Bạn đang loay hoay với câu hỏi: “Tôi là ai? Tôi khác biệt ở điểm nào? Làm sao để người khác biết đến giá trị thật của mình?”
- Bạn muốn phát triển bản thân, tạo dấu ấn riêng và mở ra những cơ hội nghề nghiệp mới trong thời đại số – nhưng lại chưa biết bắt đầu từ đâu?
- Bạn đã từng học cách làm nội dung, từng xây profile cá nhân, nhưng vẫn cảm thấy mình “mờ nhạt”, thiếu định hướng hoặc chưa dám thể hiện mình một cách rõ ràng?
- Bạn nhìn thấy người khác xây thương hiệu cá nhân rất bài bản – còn bạn thì vẫn đang chật vật… giữa hàng chục lời khuyên nhiễu loạn trên mạng?


Khóa học "Personal Branding - Ứng dụng AI xây dựng thương hiệu cá nhân, chiến lược tạo thương hiệu cá nhân chuyên nghiệp, thu hút cơ hội phát triển sự nghiệp & bứt phá thu nhập thời đại số" sẽ giúp bạn:
- Không cần phải nổi tiếng.
- Không cần phải hoàn hảo.
- Chỉ cần bạn muốn chia sẻ giá trị thật của mình một cách chân thành và có chiến lược, bạn hoàn toàn có thể bắt đầu hành trình xây dựng thương hiệu cá nhân – từ con số 0.


Tại sao khóa học này quan trọng với bạn?
Trong thời đại AI và nội dung bùng nổ, thương hiệu cá nhân không còn là đặc quyền của người nổi tiếng.
Đó là cách bạn:
- Làm rõ mình là ai
- Thu hút cơ hội phù hợp
- Và tạo thu nhập từ chính điều bạn biết, điều bạn sống thật


Khóa học này sẽ giúp bạn:
- Định vị thương hiệu cá nhân rõ ràng, xác định điểm nổi bật (Unique Selling Point) chỉ mình bạn có - kể cả khi bạn còn mông lung, nghi ngờ bản thân
- Xây dựng hồ sơ online và hiện diện số chuyên nghiệp, đúng người – đúng cách
- Sản xuất nội dung chân thật nhưng chiến lược để thu hút đúng khán giả
- Khám phá 7 mô hình kiếm tiền bền vững và tiềm năng từ chính thương hiệu cá nhân chân thật của riêng bạn
- Ứng dụng AI thông minh để tiết kiệm thời gian, nâng cao hiệu quả sáng tạo


Khóa học này dành cho bạn nếu bạn là:
- Người đi làm muốn phát triển song song công việc & thương hiệu cá nhân
- Freelancer, chuyên gia tự do hoặc nhà sáng tạo nội dung muốn tạo dấu ấn & thu hút khách hàng
- Người đang khởi nghiệp cá nhân bằng kiến thức, kỹ năng sẵn có
- Bất kỳ ai mong muốn xây dựng thương hiệu cá nhân một cách bền vững – chân thật – có chiến lược


Giảng viên đồng hành cùng bạn là ai?
Ms. Lê Phương Thanh - Founder của Skill Sharing School đã xây dựng thương hiệu cá nhân online và phát triển được sự nghiệp riêng từ chính chuyên môn cá nhân của mình.
Mr. Thế An - giảng viên kỹ năng mềm và phát triển cá nhân đã đồng hành cùng nhiều tổ chức, cá nhân qua các chương trình đào tạo được đánh giá cao về chất lượng.
Khóa học này là đúc kết từ hành trình cá nhân và kinh nghiệm thực chiến của đội ngũ giảng viên.
Chúng tôi ở đây để giúp bạn không chỉ “có mặt” trên mạng xã hội, mà tỏa sáng đúng cách – đúng người – đúng thời điểm.


Tại sao bạn nên bắt đầu xây dựng thương hiệu cá nhân ngay hôm nay?
- Vì không ai có thể kể câu chuyện của bạn tốt hơn chính bạn.
- Vì AI có thể thay thế kỹ năng, nhưng không thể thay thế góc nhìn – cá tính – trải nghiệm sống của bạn.
- Và vì cơ hội sẽ không chờ đến khi bạn thấy “đủ tốt” – bạn phải bắt đầu thì nó mới đến.


Bạn nhận được gì trong khóa học?
- Video bài giảng dễ hiểu, kèm hướng dẫn thực hành
- Mẫu prompt ứng dụng AI để định vị – lên kế hoạch – viết nội dung
- Tài nguyên checklist, content planner, worksheet, ...


Hãy bắt đầu từ chính con người bạn – và để chúng tôi đồng hành cùng bạn trên hành trình xây thương hiệu cá nhân từ những điều giản dị nhưng chân thật nhất.


Bấm MUA KHÓA HỌC để bắt đầu ngay hôm nay.
Hẹn gặp bạn trong lớp học!
– Ms. Lê Phương Thanh & Mr. Thế An
target_audience: Người muốn xây dựng thương hiệu cá nhân gắn liền với chuyên môn
Người đi làm, freelancer, chuyên gia, quản lý, ... muốn xây dựng uy tín, mở rộng cơ hội nghề nghiệp, thu hút khách hàng, đối tác, nhà tuyển dụng, ...

courses.description:
Nowadays, you know you need to be branded, but your schedule is too overloaded. You are too busy working on your daily tasks than working on your career.
However, you are very aware that you need to know more and be more to achieve your goals.
With this course, you will learn how to create a targeted and consistent impression that can help you achieve your professional and personal goals.
What is needed from yourself? You just need to focus on determining what do you want to do with your life, who you are, what activities are you enjoying, what are your strengths and values.

courses.description:
Personal Branding: Aprende a distinguirte entre un mundo de creadores y a atraer un flujo constante de clientes a través de tu marca personal.


¿Sabías que el 92% de los consumidores confían más en las marcas personales que en las empresas?
Si aún no estás utilizando tu historia y tus pasiones para crear una marca personal, estás desaprovechando esta oportunidad.
Pero cuando se trata de establecer tu marca personal en redes sociales, el camino es muy confuso y es difícil saber por dónde empezar.
Resulta que... el camino para crecer una marca personal en redes sociales, no es simplemente publicar videos aleatoriamente en tus redes sociales y esperar que algún día funcione y mágicamente obtengas una comunidad.
La realidad es que, sin la estrategia adecuada, corres el riesgo de crear contenido que no resuena, perder clientes potenciales y caer en la trampa de invertir tus recursos y esfuerzos en donde no hay ningún retorno o crecimiento.
Teniendo una guía detallada sobre la estrategia adecuada para tu marca personal en Tiktok, Instagram o incluso YouTube, puedes ampliar tu alcance, crear una comunidad y un flujo constante de clientes, crecer como freelance. ¡Todo mientras dedica MENOS tiempo y esfuerzo!


Claridad + estrategia + acción = los resultados que realmente quieres y que están alineados a tus objetivos.


¿Cómo puede ayudarte la estrategia de Personal Branding?


• Eficiencia y enfoque: Cuando entiendes y defines tu mensaje central y la audiencia que quieres atraer, garantizas que cada movimiento sea intencional e impactante.
• Deja de preocuparte por algoritmos y tendencias: Una marca personal sólida permanece resistente y garantiza su relevancia en un panorama digital en constante evolución.
• Impulsar el crecimiento orgánico: Una estrategia de marca bien diseñada actúa como un imán, atrayendo seguidores, clientes y oportunidades de forma natural, sin la necesidad de promociones pagadas.
• Eleva tu credibilidad: Una marca personal coherente y auténtica aumenta su credibilidad como creador de contenido, convirtiéndose en una persona de impacto en las redes sociales en su industria.
• ROI maximizado: Cada contenido, cada campaña, cada interacción se convierte en una inversión con retornos asegurados, gracias a una estrategia de marca clara.




Esto significa decir adiós a…
- Resultados impredecibles: Postear sin estrategia esperando que "algo funcione" es perder el tiempo, teniendo una estrategia clara es dejar de adivinar.
- Recursos desperdiciados: no más invertir tiempo y dinero en tácticas que no dan resultados.
- Estancamiento y agotamiento: libérate del ciclo de esfuerzo sin progreso y del contenido agotador.


Domina el arte de la marca personal


En este curso vas a:
1.  Aprender a  usar tu historia: usar técnicas de Storytelling y crear una narrativa que te distinga de otros creadores.
2.  Aprovechar técnicas de marketing de Instagram y TikTok: maximiza tu influencia en las plataformas de redes sociales, impulsando la participación y el crecimiento utilizando métodos probados.
3. Construir una imagen de marca personal coherente: desde fotógrafos, filmmakers, artistas, ingenieros, YouTuber y lo que sea que hagas; creando una marca coherente mejorarás tu reconocimiento y confianza en todas las plataformas.
4. Mejorar tu trabajo como Freelance: aprende cómo una marca personal sólida puede ser la herramienta más potente en tu carrera, atrayendo clientes y estableciendo credibilidad.
5. Definir las bases y elementos diferenciadores de tu marca: Descubre los elementos esenciales del branding, aprende a reconocer las historias y características que te hacen diferente y magnético.


¿Porqué confiar en este curso?
- Presentación atractiva y dinámica: a diferencia de otros cursos, este curso se imparte con entusiasmo y compromiso genuinos, lo que garantiza que los participantes permanezcan atentos e inspirados en todo momento. ¡No te quedarás dormido!
- Plan de estudios avanzado y estructurado: Diseñado tanto para profesionales nuevos como experimentados, el contenido de nuestro curso está cuidadosamente estructurado, evitando repeticiones y ofreciendo información relevante y procesable para todos los grados laborales.
- Práctico y basado en la investigación: nuestro curso se basa en una investigación exhaustiva que presenta conocimientos actualizados de la industria.
- Información clara y puntual: vayamos al grano, más allá de la teoría, damos prioridad a las aplicaciones del mundo real, garantizando que los participantes puedan implementar de inmediato lo que han aprendido.


Este curso es para ti si...
1. Eres un emprendedor o freelance: crear tu marca personal le da mayor credibilidad y presencia a tu carrera, sin importar la industria.
2. Eres un influencer o creador de contenido y quieres entender más sobre el arte de contar historias y cómo resonar con tu público ideal.
3. Eres un entusiasta del diseño: profundiza en los elementos visuales que hacen que una marca se destaque.
4. Estás atravesando una transición profesional: si estás cambiando o quieres cambiar de carrera de forma eficaz y segura, crecer tu marca personal en redes es una gran estrategia.
5. Te apasiona el crecimiento personal: empieza encontrando tu "porqué" y tu misión, para transformarlos en algo único.


Acerca de tu instructor de marca personal:
Conoce a Itzel Garrido, una maestra del branding personal, que combina de manera única su experiencia como fotógrafa, mercadóloga y ambientalista. Inspirándose en su profundo amor por la naturaleza y los viajes, al haber crecido su propia marca personal, Itzel comprende el arte de capturar y presentar tu propia esencia dentro del paisaje digital. Con más de nueve años de experiencia en marketing digital, incluido un puesto importante en Ford Credit, conoce de primera mano el poder de una marca personal convincente. Ya sea a través de imágenes, narrativas o alcance estratégico, a Itzel le apasiona enseñarle a las personas a definir y hacer más potente su propia historia; garantizando que su marca resuene de manera creativa y auténtica con su público objetivo.


Requisitos
• Una libreta o bloc de notas
• Un bolígrafo
• Una mente abierta


¡Explora el poder de crear tu marca personal con total confianza!
Aprovecha esta oportunidad para definir una identidad de marca que refleje quién eres y te vuelva magnético.


¡Nos vemos dentro!
-Itzel y Phil

courses.description:
This Personal Branding MasterClass helps you identify your strengths and develop the qualities that recommend you. On one hand it teaches you to communicate these strengths effectively and turn them into key messages; on the other hand, it shows you how to use them as unique competitive advantages for your career or business - in short, to differentiate what you have to offer professionally.

The course is right for you if:
You are at the beginning of your career or wish a change and want to promote yourself either in the company where you are working or among the potential employers.
